Uyu mugabo wâ€™imyaka 70 wanabaye Umujyanama wihariye wa Perezida kuva mu 2000 kugeza 2006, iyo myaka yamaze muri dipolomasi yamuhaye kumenya byimbitse imiyoborere itandukanye ku Isi irimo nâ€™iya Gaddafi utaravugwaho rumwe.
Yateze utwuma dufata amajwi intumwa zâ€™u Rwanda
U Rwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu bitiyumvisemo cyane Libya, byâ€™umwihariko nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.

Uruhande u Rwanda rwafashe rufite impamvu.
Hari amakuru yizewe IGIHE ifite yâ€™uko ahagana mu 2010, Polisi yâ€™u Rwanda yatahuye ko hari intwaro muri Ambasade ya Libya mu Rwanda zashoboraga kwifashishwa mu bikorwa bimwe na bimwe byo gutera ama-gerenade mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Umwe mu bakozi bâ€™iyi Ambasade niwe watanze aya makuru, hanyuma Polisi ikoze iperereza izitahura muri iyo nyubako.
Mu kiganiro Archives du Rwanda gitambuka kuri IGIHE, Prof Nsengima yavuze ko imyitwarire ya Gaddafi yatangiye kurakaza u Rwanda ubwo yategaga utwuma dufata amajwi intumwa zarwo zirimo na Perezida Pasteur Bizimungu.
Nubwo Nsengimana atibuka neza igihe byabereye, mu isesengura IGIHE yakoze yasanze bishobora kuba byarabaye muri Nzeri 1999, ubwo Gaddafi yizihizaga imyaka 30 amaze ahiritse ubutegetsi.
Intumwa zâ€™u Rwanda zitabiriye ibyo birori nkâ€™abandi batumirwa, bageze muri Libya Perezida Bizimungu ahabwa inzu yo gucumbikamo nkâ€™uko bigenda ku bakuru bâ€™ibihugu.
Iyo nzu ni nayo yahuriragamo intumwa zamuherekeje mu gihe hagiye gukorwa nkâ€™inama.
Umunsi wo kugaruka mu Rwanda, baje kuvumbura ko bari baratezwe utwumwa dufata amajwi (recorders).
Ati â€œYaje (Gaddafi) no kudusura muri iyo nzu.

Rero ikintu nkâ€™icyo kikwereka uwo yari we.

" Prof Nsengimana yasobanuye ko Gaddafi utavuga ko yari akunzwe cyangwa yanzwe na bose muri Afurika, ari nayo mpamvu igihe ibihugu byafataga umwanzuro wo gushyigikira abashaka kumuhirika, byinshi bya Afurika byamwihoreye.

Gusura abarwayi byahawe umurongo
Mu muco nyarwanda iyo umuturanyi arwaye ntumusure wumva umufitiye umwenda, yabyara ntumushyire igikoma ukibaza aho uzaca ujya guterura umwana ukahabura.
Muri iki gihe cyo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, imvugo yâ€™uko ifuni ibagara ubucuti ari akarenge, yabaye yirengagijweho gato kuko ako karenge gashobora gukurura kabutindi kuri nyirako, abo yasuye nâ€™abo babana bose.
Mu bitaro gusura abarwayi byabaye bihagaritswe.
Nko mu bitaro bya Kaminuza bya Kigali (CHUK), abantu bagemuriraga ibiryo abarwariye muri ibi bitaro, babigeza aho abantu binjirira, umuntu umwe urwaje wa murwayi akaba ari we ujya kubyakira.

Kugeza ubu umurwayi agomba kuba afite umurwaza umwe gusa, niyo yagira umusimbura ariko na we agomba kuba ari umwe kandi urujya nâ€™uruza mu bitaro rwaragabanutse.
Ibi byose bigamije kugabanya ubucucike mu bitaro.
Buri munsi usanga muri CHUK hari abarwayi bari hagati ya 400-500 baba baharwariye.
Kubera kandi serivisi nyinshi zitangirwamo, bituma mu gihe gisanzwe buri munsi hari abantu bari hagati ya 1000-1500 basura ibi bitaro.
Ufite uwe urwaye kandi ashobora no kwifashisha uburyo bwâ€™ikoranabuhanga akamwoherereza amafaranga kuri telefoni akamufasha kubona ibyo yari kumushyira, na we agakomeza kuguma mu rugo, bityo twese tukazaririmba intsinzi twishimira ko twatsinze Coronavirus.

Urwego rwa serivisi rwashinze imizi
Mu 2015, urwego rwa serivisi rwazamutse ku kigero cya 7% rugira uruhare mu musaruro mbumbe wose rwa 47%.
Mu 2016 serivisi zazamutse ku kigero cya 6%.

Mu 2018 umusaruro wa serivisi wazamutse ku rugero rwa 9% naho mu 2019 uzamuka ku rugero rwa 8% ndetse zigira uruhare rwa 49% muri GDP.

Hirya yayo gato hahoze hacukurwa amabuye yâ€™agaciro ndetse amateka yerekana ko ari ho hambere yacukuwe mu Rwanda nâ€™Ababiligi.
Ni stade abenshi bitirira Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa [ Charles Leon Pierre] watwaye u Rwanda kuva mu 1931 kugeza 1959, bivugwa ko yakundaga kureba aho bakinira umupira wâ€™amaguru cyane ko nawe yajyaga acishamo akawukina.

Ababiligi ngo bazanye abakongomani 300 barimo na Musafiri kugira ngo bafatanye nâ€™abandi basore bâ€™abanyarwanda kuyacukura.
Uko Stade ya Rwinkwavu yubatswe
Kabemba Musafiri avuga ko iyi stade ijya kubakwa yari ahari ariko ko atibuka neza umwaka, gusa ngo byaturutse ku muzungu wâ€™umubiligi wari umuyobozi mukuru wâ€™abacukura amabuye yâ€™agaciro ndetse akanaba inshuti yâ€™Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa.

â€œYari stade nziza cyane ifite igipangu, hari ikipe yâ€™abacukura amabuye yâ€™agaciro hakaba nâ€™ikipe yâ€™abazungu, hari nâ€™andi makipe yadusuraga ku cyumweru aturutse ahandi hantu hose bacukuraga amabuye, amakipe yacu yose yabaga afite abajyanama.
Uko abakinnyi bahembwaga
Kabemba Musafiri yavuze ko abakinnyi batahabwaga amafaranga ahubwo bahabwaga inka zabaga zatanzwe nâ€™Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa.

Umwami Rudahigwa yacishagamo agakina umupira

Bamwe mu baturage bo mu Murenge wa Rwinkwavu bavuze ko bifuza kubona iyi stade yavuguruwe ikajya iberaho imikino ikomeye, abandi basabye ko hashyirwa ibimenyetso byerekana ko ariyo stade yubatswe bwa mbere mu Rwanda.

Mu mwaka wa 2016, hari inshuti yanjye yitwa Ken Chartrand twigeze kuganira turi gutembera i New York, ambwira ko mu mpano nziza ashobora guha umuntu akunda ko hadashobora kuburamo igitabo, mubajije impamvu arambwira ngo igitabo ni inshuti nziza muganira ukunguka ubwenge nâ€™ubuhanga, kikaba urwibutso rurambye kandi rudashira.
Ken yambwiye ko igitabo ari urwibutso rwâ€™ubushuti, ko buri kwezi agura ibitabo bibiri byo gusoma kandi ko adashobora kuryama adasomye igitabo kuko gituma aruhuka neza, akunguka ubumenyi burushijeho.
Nyuma yâ€™ikiganiro twagiranye, nahise nkunda birushijeho igitabo, mpitamo kwimakaza umuco wo kwandika, kugura ndetse no gusoma ibitabo.
Kugeza ubu maze kwandika ibitabo bine.
Mu biro byanjye harimo ibitabo naguze nsoma kenshi, mu rugo umuryango wanjye nawuguriye ibitabo byo gusoma kandi bamaze kubikunda.
Birakwiye ko twimakaza uyu muco mwiza ufasha kubaka u Rwanda twifuza ndetse nâ€™Afurika, tugura ibitabo, tubiha agaciro gakomeye, tubitangamo impano ku nshuti dukunda, tubisoma aho turi hose, bityo bizadufashe kurushaho gutera imbere dufite ubuhanga bwimbitse.
Ibi kandi bizadufasha kwihuta mu iterambere ndetse turusheho kumenya aho tuva, aho tugeze ndetse nâ€™icyerekezo cyâ€™u Rwanda na Afurika.
Bizadufasha kurushaho kuba abarinzi bâ€™ibyagezweho mu Rwanda no muri Afurika bityo tubisigasire ndetse tunabyubakireho ibindi bikorwa byinshi kandi byiza.

Yavukiye mu Rwanda anahafite umuryango nubwo atahaheruka

Kimwe mu byo abakristu ba mbere bazize mu ntangiriro ya Kiliziya ni ugushyira mu bikorwa iri jambo Yezu yivugiye ubwe ati â€œNdababwira ukuri koko: nimutarya umubiri wâ€™umwana wâ€™umuntu ntimunywe nâ€™amaraso ye, ntimuzagira ubugingo muri mwe" (Yh 6, 53).
Ibyo rero byatumye babarega, barabahiga, barabatoteza ngo barya abantu.
Icyakora iyo urebye neza, kwari ukudasobanukirwa neza nâ€™ayo magambo ya Yezu bwite.
Nkâ€™uko Papa Piyo wa 12 yabisobanuye mu Ibaruwa ye â€œMystici Corporis Christi", Ukaristiya ni umubiri wuje ikuzo wa Yezu Kristu udusabanya na we.
Ni igihango gikomeye Yezu yadusigiye kugira ngo tujye tumwibuka kandi bitume twigiramo ubugingo (reba 1Kor 11, 24-25).
Igisobanuro cyâ€™ijambo
Ijambo â€œUkaristiya", rikomoka ku ijambo ryâ€™ikigereki â€œEucharistia", riva ku nshinga â€œEucharistein bivuga gushimira; rikavuga kandi kimwe nâ€™irindi jambo â€œEulogein".
Aya magambo yibutsa ugushimira kwâ€™Abayahudi, igihe bamamazaga ibikorwa byâ€™Imana cyane cyane mu gihe cya Pasika (Lk 22, 19; 1 Kor 11, 24).
Ukaristiya ni isengesho rikuru, risingiza Imana kandi rikayishimira.
Nkâ€™uko Gatigisimu ibitubwira â€œUkaristiya ni isakramentu ririmo Yezu Kristu ubwe rwose nâ€™umubiri we nâ€™amaraso ye, mu bimenyetso byâ€™umugati na Divayi, akatubera icyarimwe igitambo, ifunguro nâ€™inshuti tubana".
Gutura igitambo cyâ€™Ukaristiya rero, ni ugusangira isengesho ryo kwibuka gushimira Imana ibyo yadukoreye.

Ishingiro ryâ€™Ukaristiya muri Bibiliya
Ukaristiya ni urwibutso Yezu yadusigiye avuga atiâ€œIbi mujye mubikora munyibuka" (1Kor 11, 24-25; Lk 24, 13-31).
Bityo igihe cyose duhazwa, tuba dusangira na Kristu Pasika (reba Lk 22, 19).
Mu Ivanjiri ya Yohani, Yezu yagize ati â€œNi jye mugati muzima wamanutse mu ijuru.
Urya uwo mugati azabaho iteka; kandi umugati nzatanga ni umubiri wanjye, kugira ngo isi igire ubugingo" (Yh 6, 51).
Ni byo koko! Twacungujwe amaraso yâ€™igiciro gikomeye.
Amateka yo gutambagiza Isakramentu
Gutambagiza Isakramentu ritagatifu ryâ€™Ukaristiya ni ukwakira Yezu aho dutuye, tukamuha icyubahiro, tukamupfukamira, tukamuramya kandi tukamusingiza.

Igihe kimwe arimo gutura igitambo cyâ€™Ukaristiya, Umugati wahindutse inyama na Divayi ihinduka amaraso.

Nkâ€™uko tubisoma muri Bibiliya, umutambagiro wâ€™Isakramentu ritagatifu wibutsa uburyo dukwiye guha agaciro gakomeye ubushyinguro butagatifu, twagereranya uyu munsi na Taberinakoro (reba 1Bami 8): Ubwo Umwami Salomoni yatambagizaga ubushyinguro butagatifu abuvana mu ihema akajya kubwimika mu Ngoro yâ€™Imana yari amaze kuzuza.
Ukaristiya mu buzima bwacu
Ukaristiya ni ikimenyetso cyâ€™urukundo mu bantu â€œUko yagakunze abe bari munsi, abakunda byimazeyo" (Yh 13, 1), maze adusigira umubiri we ngo tubeshweho na we muri uru rugendo rwacu hano ku isi nkâ€™uko kandi byari byaragenuwe kuva na kera ngo â€œByuka urye kuko urugendo rukiri rurerure" (1 Bami 19, 7).
Bityo Ukaristiya ni ifunguro ryâ€™abagenzi.
Burya umuntu asa nâ€™ibimutunga.
Abakristu dukwiye guharanira gusa nâ€™uwo duhabwa.
Ntiducike intege zâ€™uko muri ibi bihe nta buryo buraboneka hirya no hino bwo guturira hamwe igitambo cyâ€™Ukaristiya nkâ€™umuryango mugari wâ€™abakristu.

Mu bihe byiza nâ€™ibibi ntajya adusiga.
Twigire ku Bayisiraheli igihe bari impunzi i Babiloni.
Nta Muherezabitambo, nta Jambo ryâ€™Imana, nta Kiliziya, nta Rusengero bari bafite ariko basengeraga mu mitima yabo, mu mahema yabo, bagakumbura Yeruzalemu cyane kuko batigeze bibagirwa ibyiza baharonkeye (reba Zab 137).

Umwanzuro: Ni byo koko, Yezu ni Muzima mu Ukaristiya, ni ukwemera kubihamya.
Ku buryo butagaragarira amaso yacu, Yezu Kristu ni muzima mu Isakramentu ryâ€™Ukaristiya.

Ukaristiya nkâ€™umubiri wa Kristu duhabwa wari warashushanyijwe nâ€™igitambo cya Izaki, nâ€™ituro ryâ€™intama ya Pasika ndetse na Manu yâ€™abakurambere bacu.
Dusenge: Nyagasani Yezu Kristu, wowe wadusigiye urwibutso bwâ€™ububabare bwawe mu Isakramentu ryâ€™agatangaza, turakwinginze: Muri uyu mwaka wâ€™Ukaristiya duhimbaje mu bihe bidasanzwe, ngwino iwacu utambagire mu mitima yacu, utambagire mu ngo zacu, utambagire aho dukura umugati utunga imibiri yacu maze uduhe kuzirikana kuri urwo rukundo ruhebuje wadukunze, ukatubera igitambo, ifunguro nâ€™inshuti tubana Igihe cyose.

Imana ni Urukundo iteka ryose
Imana ni Urukundo iteka ryose nkuko Ijambo ryâ€™ Imana ribivuga, bikanahurirwaho nâ€™ abayemera bo mu madini nâ€™amatorero menshi.
Imana ni yo rukundo rwuzuye; kandi ukunda byâ€™ukuri agira undi akunda; naho uwikunze, ntibavuga ko afite urukundo rwuzuye, ahubwo babyita ubwikunde, inda mbi cyangwa inda nini, ubugugu, umururumba nâ€™ibindi bibi bitaba mu Mana, ntibinagire umwanya aho iganje.
Ukunda abandi akirinda guhemuka ahubwo akagira neza, niwe bashima bavuga ko afite urukundo, kuko akunda inshuti ze, abaturanyi, ababyeyi be, abana be, umufasha we, yaba akunda abababaye cyangwa abanzi be akabababarira nkuko Imana ibitugirira, bati â€œafite urukundo rukomeye, rwuzuye, nta rwango agira".
Ni ko nâ€™Imana yaturemye mu ishusho ryayo iteye.
Imana yibwiye Musa iti "Ndi Uhoraho, Uhoraho Imana igira impuhwe nâ€™ineza, itinda kurakara, yuje ubuntu nâ€™ubudahemuka"( Iyim 34, 6).
Imana yari Urukundo na mbere yâ€™ iremwa ryâ€™ ibindi biriho byose, ni Urukundo kandi izahora ari Urukundo, ntacyo ijya ibura ku rukundo rwayo.

Ibi bidufashe kwakira ibyo twahishuriwe mu Ijambo ryâ€™ Imana ko Imana ari imwe mu Batatu bakundana, bunze ubumwe bwuzuye, ku buryo batari Imana eshatu, ahubwo ari Imana Imwe mbere yâ€™iremwa, ubu ndetse nâ€™iteka ryose.

Tukaba tubyemera kuko yabiduhishuriye mu Ijambo ryayo kuruta kure uko ubwenge bwacu bwabyiyumvisha.
Urukundo Imana yifitemo ruhuza Data na Mwana na Roho Mutagatifu ntiyarwihariye, yararudukunze iturema, tunacumuye, iduha amahirwe yo kwemera kureka icyaha no gukira ingaruka zacyo, nuko iduha Mwana ngo nitumwemera dukire ingaruka mbi zâ€™icyaha.

Abaturage ku ruhembe rwo kubungabunga Gishwati
Mu gutunganywa iri shyamba, habanje umushinga Gishwati Area Conservation Program (GACP) wateraga ibiti muri iri shyamba hagamijwe ko ryongera kugira isura, ribungwabunga kuva mu 2008-2011.
Umaze guhagarara nibwo hibajijwe niba intambwe yatewe itazasubira inyuma, abaturage bagerageza kwishyira hamwe ngo barebe icyo bakora.

Uru rubuga ruzanafasha abanyeshuri bifuza gukomeza amasomo yabo muri ibi bihe bya COVID-19 ariko bakaba bafite imbogamizi zo kubona abarimu cyane ko batabasanga mu rugo kuko bitemewe.

Urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Twitter rwatangiye kugerageza uburyo bushya uretse kuba abantu basangiza abandi amagambo nâ€™amafoto muri tweet, noneho bashobora gushyiraho ijwi ryabo.
Ni uburyo bwatangiranye ariko nâ€™abakoresha Twitter kuri iOS.

Inzira izajya ikoreshwa mu gutangaza tweet ukoresheje ijwi ntaho itaniye no gukoresha amagambo.
Bizajya bisaba kujya ahandikwa, ukabona akantu gashya kongewemo gafite ishusho yâ€™imirongo igaragaza amajwi.
Ukanzeho hahita haza ifoto ukoresha kuri twitter nâ€™ahantu ho gufatira amajwi ahagana hasi, ukahakanda ugatangira gufata ijwi ushaka gutangaza.
Muri ubu buryo bushya, ubutumwa utangaza mu buryo bwâ€™amajwi buba bufite amasegonda atarenga 140, ni ukuvuga iminota ibiri nâ€™amasegonda makumyabiri.

Twiter yakomeje iti "Abantu bazabona ubutumwa bwawe aho barebera ibyo abandi batangaje (tweets).
Igihe ushaka kubwumva, ukanda mu ifoto.

Ijwi rifungukira ahagana hasi, ugakomeza kuryumva nâ€™igihe waba urimo gusoma ibindi byatangajwe kuri Twitter cyangwa igihe unavuye muri iyi application ya Twitter kuri iOS ukaba ugiye mu bindi, kereka urihagaritse.
Twitter yakomeje iti "Gukora Tweets zo mu majwi biraza kugaragara ku bantu bake bakoresha Twitter kuri iOS mu ntangiriro, ariko mu byumweru biri imbere buri wese ukoreha iOS azaba ashobora gutangaza ubutumwa binyuze mu ijwi.
Buri wese azaba ashobora kubwumva no gusubiza.
Kuri iyi nshuro ariko bizaba bishoboka gusa gukoresha ijwi nka tweet, ntabwo birashoboka ko ukoresha ijwi mu gusubiza ku byo undi yatangaje (reply) cyangwa kubisakaza wongeyeho igitekerezo cyawe (Retweet with Comment).

Amatangazo azajya akumirwa ku bakoresha Google Chrome ni ashobora gukoresha internet ya megabit 4 cyangwa se ashobora kwiharira 27 % bya internet yose yakoreshejwe nâ€™amatangazo yamamaza.
Google chrome ni isiakiro rya Internet ryatangijwe mu 2008, rihanganye nâ€™andi mashakiro nka Internet Explorer na Firefox yari yarabanje mu kibuga.
Chrome yakomeje guhatana iza kwigarurira benshi mu bakoresha internet.
Kugeza mu mpera za 2019, telefone miliyari eshanu ku isi zari zirimo porogaramu ya Google Chrome.
Kurangiza imanza za cyamunara nâ€™inyandiko mpesha byatangiye gukorerwa mu ikoranabuhanga (Video)
Minisiteri yâ€™Ubutabera yatangije uburyo bwâ€™ikoranabuhanga buzajya bwifashishwa mu kurangiza imanza za cyamunara nâ€™inyandiko mpesha, bwitezweho gukemura byinshi mu bibazo byajyaga bigaragara mu kurangiza izi manza, birimo gutinda kwa zo, uburiganya nâ€™ibindi byaturukaga kâ€™uregwa, urega cyangwa umuhesha wâ€™inkiko.
Minisiteri yâ€™Ubutabera yatangije uburyo bwâ€™ikoranabuhanga buzajya bwifashishwa mu kurangiza imanza za cyamunara nâ€™inyandiko mpesha, bwitezweho gukemura byinshi mu bibazo byajyaga bigaragara mu kurangiza izi manza, birimo gutinda kwa zo, uburiganya nâ€™ibindi byaturukaga kâ€™uregwa, urega cyangwa umuhesha wâ€™inkiko.
Mu kiganiro nâ€™abanyamakuru cyo kuri uyu wa Gatatu, tariki ya 13 Gicurasi 2020, cyari kigamije gusobanura byimbitse ibijyanye nâ€™iteka rya Minisitiri ryerekeye uburyo bwo guca imanza hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga; Minisiteri yâ€™Ubutabera yasobanuye ibizahinduka mu mirangirize yâ€™imanza za cyamunara nâ€™inyandiko mpesha [inyandiko itegeka ko umuntu ahabwa umutungo runaka].
Umuyobozi Mukuru Ushinzwe Serivisi yo Kwegereza Ubutabera abaturage muri MINIJUST, Urujeni Martine, yavuze ko gutangira gukoresha iri koranabuhanga bifitiye akamaro impande zitandukanye zifite aho zihuriye nâ€™ubutabera, haherewe ku muturage.
Kuva iri teka ritangajwe, hashyizweho urubuga rwa internet ruzajya rwifashishwa nâ€™abahesha bâ€™inkiko bose, abaturage bafite imitungo byanzuwe nâ€™urwego rubifitiye ububasha cyangwa habarabayeho ubwumvikane hagati yâ€™impande ebyiri ko izatezwa cyamunara, nâ€™izindi nzego zizajya zikurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ryâ€™imyanzuro yâ€™imanza zishingiye ku mitungo itezwa cyamunara.
Urujeni yavuze ko zimwe mu mpinduka zazanywe nâ€™iri koranabuhanga ari uko nta rubanza rwa cyamunara cyangwa inyandiko mpesha bizongera kurangizwa bidakorewe mu ikoranabuhanga, kandi ko hari nâ€™uburyo bwateganyijwe igihe habayeho ikibazo muri iryo koranabuhanga.
Ati "Bizihutisha irangizamanza nâ€™inyandiko mpesha; ubundi hari hari ibibazo bitandukanye byaturukaga ku mpande zose, ugasanga uregwa, urega cyangwa umuhesha wâ€™inkiko [â€¦] umwe muri bo agize uruhare mu kudindira kwâ€™irangizarubanza.
Yakomeje avuga ko bizongera umucyo mu guca urubanza, aho umuhesha wâ€™inkiko azaba afite inzira zose zifashishwa mu kurangiza urubanza mu buryo bukwiye, byose bikorewe mu ikoranabuhanga.
Bizafasha kandi inzego zitandukanye gukurikirana no kugenzura imikorere yâ€™abahesha bâ€™inkiko ku buryo bukurikije amategeko.
Umwanditsi Mukuru mu Kigo cyâ€™Iterambere, RDB, Richard Kayibanda, ashimangira ko iri koranabuhanga rishya rizagura isoko muri cyamunara kuko buri wese azagira uburenganzira bungana nâ€™ubwa mugenzi we mu kugura umutungo aho yaba ari hose.
Ati "Bizanakemura ikibazo cyâ€™abakomisiyoneri bajyaga bateza akavuyo ku munsi wa cyamurana, bikanica isoko rimwe na rimwe ku buryo hari nâ€™aho cyamunara yasubikwaga.
Mu byo umuntu unyuze muri iri koranabuhanga azajya asabwa kugira ngo yemererwe gupiganwa muri cyamunara, harimo ko azajya atanga ingwate ingana na 5% yâ€™agaciro kâ€™umutungo upiganirwa; akayasubizwa igihe atawegukanye, mu gihe kitarenze iminsi itatu, uwawegukanye we akazajya ayaheraho yishyura igiciro cyose.
Ingwate ya 5% iteganyijwe ku mitungo ifite agaciro gahera kuri miliyoni eshanu kuzamura, mu gihe umutungo ufite agaciro kari munsi yayo nta ngwate itangwa.
Ibindi byitezwe ko bizahindurwa nâ€™ikoranabuhanga mu kurangiza imanza za cyamunara nâ€™inyandiko mpesha harimo gukurikirana uburyo imanza zirangizwa mu gihugu hose ku buryo bwizewe, harebwa umusaruro bitanga.
Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Imisoro nâ€™Amahoro na cyo kizabasha gukurikirana neza itangwa ryâ€™umusoro ku bahesha bâ€™inkiko, hashingiwe kuri raporo yâ€™imirimo bakoze.
RDB ivuga ko gutangizwa kwâ€™iri koranabuhanga bizunganira gahunda yo kurushaho guteza imbere ishoramari no gukora ubucuruzi binyuze mu mucyo.
Iteka rya Minisitiri ryerekeye uburyo bwo guca imanza hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, riteganya ko mu gihe hatatanzwe byibura 75% byâ€™agaciro kâ€™umutungo utezwa cyamunara; nyirâ€™umutungo cyangwa ikigo cyâ€™imari gicunga uwo mutungo bafite uburenganzira bwo gusaba ko cyamunara ihagarikwa, hagashakwa ubundi buryo cyangwa ikimurwa.
Sobanukirwa uko internet ya 5G izahindura ubuzima bwa muntu
Umunsi ku wundi, ikoranabuhanga rikomeje guhindura ubuzima bwâ€™abatuye Isi, ndetse ubu umuyoboro wa internet yihuta ya 5G niwo uhanzwe amaso nkâ€™ugiye kugira uruhare rukomeye mu guhindura ubuzima bwâ€™abantu.
Umunsi ku wundi, ikoranabuhanga rikomeje guhindura ubuzima bwâ€™abatuye Isi, ndetse ubu umuyoboro wa internet yihuta ya 5G niwo uhanzwe amaso nkâ€™ugiye kugira uruhare rukomeye mu guhindura ubuzima bwâ€™abantu.
Ni umuyoboro ugereranywa nkâ€™intambwe nshya ndetse na none nkâ€™itafari rizaganisha ku rugendo ruhindura buri kimwe, uhereye ku buvuzi bwifashishije ikoranabuhanga nkâ€™aho umuganga ashobora kubaga umuntu kandi batari kumwe, ikoranabuhanga mu modoka, mu buzima busanzwe ku buryo waba uri ku kazi ugacana imbabura wasize mu rugo nâ€™ibindi bizwi nka Internet of Things.
Ni byinshi, ariko wakwibaza impamvu abantu muri iki gihe bashishikariye 5G! Ni iki cyayo cyiza gitandukanye nâ€™ibisanzwe cyangwa se ni ibiki izahindura mu buzima bwa muntu?
Mu Kinyarwanda cyoroshye, 5G wayisobanura nkâ€™icyiciro cya gatanu cyâ€™ikoranabuhanga ryihutisha amakuru kurusha ibisanzwe.
Gusa iyo tuvuze kwihuta bisobanurwa kwinshi.
Nko muri Amerika, sosiyete yâ€™itumanaho ya Verizon iherutse gukora igerageza kuri 5G, isanga ishobora kwihuta nkâ€™igihe umuntu amanura ibintu (download), akabona gigabits 1.
0 ku isegonda (1.
Ni ukuvuga ngo ni nkâ€™inshuro ziri hagati yâ€™icumi na 100 zâ€™umuvuduko usanzwe, ndetse ni umuvuduko mwinshi utanabona no ku miyoboro ya fibre optique, bisobanuye ko uyifashishije ushobora kumanura kuri internet ibintu amagana ku muvuduko wo hejuru.
Ntabwo ari umuvuduko gusa.
Niba uri kuri internet ugakanda ku kintu runaka ugiye gusoma, hari umwanya bifata kugira ngo rwa rupapuro wakanzeho rufunguke (mu cyongereza bizwi nka Latency).
Ubusanzwe bishobora kumara milliseconde 20 [mu isegonda rimwe harimo milliseconde 1000) kugira ngo rwa rupapuro rufunguke, ariko kuri 5G ni munsi ya milliseconde imwe.
Bifate nkâ€™aho ari nkâ€™igihe bitwara kugira ngo telefoni yawe itere umurabyo mu gihe uri gufotora.
Ikindi cyiza cyayo ni uko yo ifite ubushobozi bwo kuba wacomekaho ibikoresho byinshi byâ€™ikoranabuhanga kurusha ibyo washyira kuri internet isanzwe, ukayifashisha mu rugo wenda ucometseho firigo yawe ikaza kuguha amakuru ko ibintu birimo harimo ibyakonje cyane cyangwa se ibigiye kubora nâ€™ibindi.
Wumvise ibyo ikora, uhita wibaza ku giciro cyayo.
Ubu mu Rwanda ntabwo ihari wenda ku buryo twarebera ku bintu byo hafi yacu, ariko nko muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, sosiyete zâ€™itumanaho ziri kwishyuza nibura amadolari 10 yiyongera ku yari asanzwe yishyurwa nâ€™umuntu ku kwezi; uru ni urugero rwa Verizon.
Kugira ngo ukoreshe 5G bisaba ko uba ufite igikoresho kiyakira, ntabwo ari ikibonetse cyose.
Urugero nka telefoni, nyinshi ziri gusohoka zigezweho zakira 5G, kimwe nâ€™uko hamaze iminsi hasohoka izakira 4G.
Umwaka ushize Sumsung yashyize ku isoko Samsung Galaxy S10 ishobora kwakira 5G.
Ikindi ni uko telefoni nyinshi zashyizwe ku isoko mu ntangiriro zâ€™umwaka ushize usanga zikoresha ikoranabuhanga rizifasha kwakira no gutanga amakuru ryakozwe na Qualcomm, [Snapdragon X50], rizibashisha no kwakira 5G.
Uyu mwaka byitezwe ko hazashyirwa ku isoko telefoni nyinshi zakira 5G kurusha ushize.
Hasobanuwe impamvu Internet ya 4G Unlimited ikoreshwa muri telefoni igiye kuvanwa ku isoko
Hashize iminsi ibigo byagurishaga internet ya 4G Unlimited biha ubutumwa abakiliya babyo ko bigiye guhagarika kugurisha iyo Internet muri za telefone zabo.
Hashize iminsi ibigo byagurishaga internet ya 4G Unlimited biha ubutumwa abakiliya babyo ko bigiye guhagarika kugurisha iyo Internet muri za telefone zabo.
Tariki 8 Kamena Ikigo cyâ€™Itumanaho MTN Rwanda cyatangaje ko guhera ku wa 1 Nyakanga kizahagarika kugurisha internet ya 4G Unlimited umuntu yajyaga agura agakoresha ikarangira mu gihe runaka.
4G Unlimited ni internet yatangwaga mu gihe runaka nkâ€™icyumweru cyangwa ukwezi, umukiliya akishyura ubwo akaba azi ko icyo cyumweru cyangwa ukwezi azabimara ataguze indi.
Ikigo cyâ€™abanya-Koreya, KTRN Rwanda ari nacyo rukumbi cyemerewe kuranguza internet ya 4G mu Rwanda, cyatangaje ko guhera tariki 1 Nyakanga 2020 internet ya 4G Unlimited muri za telefone itazongera kuboneka ku isoko.
Umuyobozi Mukuru ushinzwe ikoranabuhanga nâ€™itumanaho muri KTRN Rwanda, Elijah Iragaba, yatangaje ko izo mpinduka zigamije gukemura ikibazo cyâ€™ireme rya internet batangaga ku bakoresha telefone zigezweho.
Yavuze ko ubusanzwe internet ya 4G Unlimited yatangwaga muri za telefone nubwo yari ihendutse, mu ikorwa ryayo hari imwe mu mipaka yashyizweho ku bijyanye nâ€™uburyo yihuta mu gihe habayeho kuyisangira nâ€™abandi (tethering) cyangwa kuyivana kuri telefone ngo ikoreshwe no kuri mudasobwa.
Iragaba yavuze ko iyo abakiliya bayifashishaga mu bindi bitari telefone, yagendaga gahoro bigatuma babyinubira.
Ati â€œ (4G unlimited) yakorewe gukoreshwa muri za telefone ariko hari abantu bajyaga bayisangiza ngo bayikoreshe no ku bindi bikoresho nka mudasobwa zo mu biro bigatuma babona internet ifite ireme ritari ryiza kuko hari ibyo iyo internet itagomba kurenza.
Byatumaga rero binuba.
Iragaba yijeje ko ubu internet ya 4G isanzwe yavuguruwe irimo ibyo abakiliya bakeneye byose kandi ihendutse kurushaho.
Icyakora, ibyo byumvikanisha ko ubu umukiliya azajya agura internet ya 4G agahabwa ingano runaka bitewe nâ€™amafaranga yishyuye, igashira bitewe nâ€™uburyo yayikoresheje.
Bivuze ko ushobora kugura internet ya 5000 Frw, wayikoresha gahoro ikaba yamara igihe kinini, wayikoresha cyane igashira vuba ariko umuvuduko wo ugakomeza kuba wa wundi.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Ikoranabuhanga mu Rwego Ngenzuramikorere (RURA), Gahungu Charles, yavuze ko KTRN yabamenyesheje ukwinuba abakiliya bari bafite, bakavuga ko uko byari bimeze mbere byicaga isura ya internet ya 4G muri rusange.
Internet ya 4G Unlimited yakoreshwaga ni iyo mu bwoko bwa â€˜Speed-basedâ€™ igenda ku muvuduko umwe bitewe nâ€™igihe umukiliya yahawe kuyimarana, ubu hasigaye Internet yo mu buryo bwa â€˜volume-basedâ€™ ishira bitewe nâ€™uko yakoreshejwe.
Abakoreshaga Google Play Music bahawe uburyo bwo kwimukira kuri YouTube Music
Google Play Music yatangaje ko izafunga imiryango yayo mu mpera zâ€™uyu mwaka, ariko abari abakiliya bayo bashyiriweho uburyo bwo kuvana ibyo bari bafite kuri Google Play Music bakabyohereza kuri YouTube Music yayisimbuye.
Google Play Music yatangaje ko izafunga imiryango yayo mu mpera zâ€™uyu mwaka, ariko abari abakiliya bayo bashyiriweho uburyo bwo kuvana ibyo bari bafite kuri Google Play Music bakabyohereza kuri YouTube Music yayisimbuye.
Kubera kunanirwa guhangana ku isoko rya porogaramu zumvirwaho imiziki, Google Play Music yahisemo gukuramo akayo karenge.

Hashyizweho uburyo, aho uwari usanzwe afite indirimbo ze yashyize kuri Google Play Music azajya yinjiramo akabona ahantu hamusaba kuba yakohereza indirimbo ze kuri YouTube Music.

U Rwanda rwishimiye ifatwa ry'uwahoze ayobora inyeshyamba
Minisitiri wâ€™ubutabera mu Rwanda yavuze ko guverinoma ye yishimiye itabwa muri yombi ku wa Mbere ryâ€™uwahoze ari umuyobozi wâ€™inyeshyamba ushinjwa kuba yarateguye itsembabwoko no guhonyora uburenganzira bwa muntu ku banyarwanda ndetse nâ€™abaturage bo muri Kongo mu 1994.
Abategetsi b'Abafaransa bata muri yombi Callixte Mbarushimana, wahoze ayobora ingabo za demokarasi zizwi cyane zo kubohoza u Rwanda (FDLR), umutwe w'inyeshyamba zâ€™Abahutu.
Tharcisse Karugarama yishimiye icyemezo cy'abategetsi b'Abafaransa cyo gushyira mu bikorwa icyemezo mpuzamahanga cya guverinoma ye ndetse n'Urukiko mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha (ICC) cyo guta muri yombi uwahoze ari umuyobozi w'inyeshyamba.
Ni inkuru nziza ko Callixte Mbarushimana yatawe muri yombi n'ubuyobozi bw'ubutabera bw'Ubufaransa. 
Amakuru meza mu buryo bw'uko, mbere, hari icyemezo mpuzamahanga cyo kumuta muri yombi cyatanzwe na guverinoma y'u Rwanda ku bijyanye n'igikorwa (nk'uko bivugwa) ku bijyanye na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda mu 1994.
Karugarama yavuze ko urukiko ruherereye i La Haye rwasabye guta muri yombi uwahoze ari umuyobozi w'inyeshyamba bakekaga ko yihishe mu Bufaransa.
Urwibutso rwa Jenoside mu Rwanda
Urukiko mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha (ICC) rwakoze iperereza ryarwo ku bindi bikorwa bye maze basanga ibimenyetso bihagije byemeza icyaha cyâ€™intambara nâ€™ibyaha byibasiye inyokomuntu byakorewe muri DRC maze batanga icyemezo cyo kumuta muri yombi, inzego zâ€™ubutabera zâ€™Ubufaransa zikaba zarakoze.
Urukiko rufite icyicaro i La Haye rwashinje Mbarushimana n'abandi bigometse muri FDLR kuba barahohoteye abaturage badafite intwaro nk'igikoresho cyabo nyamukuru mu gikorwa cyo gushaka ingufu za politiki ku mutwe w'inyeshyamba.
"Nkâ€™uko ICC ibivuga, ""biturutse kuri uku gusebanya kwica (bikorwa nâ€™inyeshyamba za FDLR), abahohotewe bariciwe, bafatwa ku ngufu, barimurwa ku gahato, kandi imidugudu yose yarasenyutse ishyirwa hasi."""
Karugarama yavuze ko Mbarushimana n'ingabo ze z'inyeshyamba za FDLR bagize uruhare runini muri jenoside yo mu 1994 yahitanye abantu ibihumbi magana.
Twizera ko, mu byumweru bibiri biri imbere nyuma yâ€™ibikorwa bikwiye mu Bufaransa, agomba kwimurirwa i La Haye mu Buholandi kugira ngo akurikiranwe kandi akurikiranweho ibyaha byâ€™intambara nâ€™ibyaha byibasiye inyoko muntu byakorewe muri ako karere ka DRC. 
Minisitiri wâ€™ubutabera yavuze kandi ko Kigali izafatanya nâ€™urukiko mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha mu bushinjacyaha bwa Mbarushimana.
""
Abaminisitiri bâ€™ububanyi nâ€™amahanga bâ€™Ubwongereza, Ubufaransa mu kongera ingufu mu bikorwa byâ€™amahoro bya DRC - 2002-01-18
Ku wa mbere, abaminisitiri bâ€™ububanyi nâ€™amahanga bâ€™Ubwongereza nâ€™Ubufaransa berekeje muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo kugira ngo batangire urugendo rwâ€™iminsi itatu, bazenguruka ibihugu bine by'akarere gafite ibibazo muri Afurika yo hagati.
Ubu butumwa buzayoborwa nâ€™umunyamabanga wâ€™ububanyi nâ€™amahanga wâ€™Ubwongereza Jack Straw na mugenzi we wâ€™Ubufaransa Hubert Vedrine.
Bazasura Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo, u Rwanda, Uburundi na Uganda.
Intego yabo y'ibanze ni uguhumeka umwuka w'ubuzima bushya mu nzira y'amahoro muri Kongo yibasiwe n'intambara.
By'umwihariko, Abongereza n'Abafaransa bifuza kubona ikurwaho ry'ingabo z'amahanga zishyigikiye guverinoma ya Kongo-Kinshasa, gusezerera mu gisirikare inyeshyamba zigarurira igice cya kabiri cy'igihugu, n'ibiganiro by'amahoro kugira ngo amakimbirane arangire.
Umunyamabanga wâ€™ububanyi nâ€™amahanga wâ€™Ubwongereza Straw yavuze ko ubwo butumwa bufite intego nini yo kureba niba Kongo itazaba indi Afuganisitani.
"Ati: ""Ku ya 11 Nzeri birihutirwa cyane ko dufata ingamba zo kurwanya ibihugu byananiranye, kandi bikinanirana""."
I Kinshasa, abaminisitiri bazahura na Perezida wa Kongo, Joseph Kabila. Yafashe ubutegetsi umwaka ushize, nyuma yuko se, Perezida Laurent Kabila, yishwe n'umwe mu bamurindaga.
Aho niharangira hazakurikiraho Kigali kugira ngo baganire na Perezida wâ€™u Rwanda, Paul Kagame, nâ€™umuyobozi wâ€™inyeshyamba zo muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo, Adolphe Onusumba.
Abaminisitiri bazasura u Burundi akanya gato kugira ngo baganire ku ntambara ya gisivili yo muri icyo gihugu na Perezida Pierre Buyoya.
Uruzinduko ruzarangirira muri Uganda, aho hateganijwe inama na Perezida Yoweri Museveni na Jean-Pierre Bemba uyobora Umuryango uharanira kubohoza inyeshyamba za Kongo.
""
UNICEF irashyira ingufu mu kuvana abana mu gisirikare mu karere k'ibiyaga bigari bya Afurika - 2002-10-07
Ishami ryâ€™umuryango wâ€™abibumbye ryita ku bana, UNICEF, rirasaba ko abana bâ€™abasirikare bavanwa mu gisirikare mu karere kâ€™ibiyaga bigari bya Afurika, kubera ko amahoro menshi ari ho agaragarira. 
Iki kigo kivuga ko inkunga ihari yo gufasha abana kuva mu gisirikare no gutangira ubuzima bwabo.
Umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe kurengera abana muri UNICEF, Manuel Fontaine, avuga ko ingamba zâ€™amahoro muri Uganda, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo no mu Rwanda zituma bishoboka ko abana benshi bari munsi yâ€™imyaka 18 bava mu mitwe irwana. 
Ariko, ikigaragara ni uko iki ari igihe cyiza cyo kubikora. Bizadufasha cyane nibava mu gisirikare, Bwana Fontaine ni ko yavuze.
Avuga ko muri Uganda muri iki gihe hari abasirikare 1200 b'abana, barwana ahanini n'ingabo za Lord Resistance Army. Avuga ko mu myaka 14 ishize, iryo tsinda ryashimuse abana bagera ku 10,000, abahungu bajyanwa kurwana n'abâ€™abakobwa kugira ngo bagirwe imbata zâ€™imibonano mpuzabitsina.
UNICEF ivuga ko Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo igifite abana bagera ku 10,000 binjijwe mu ntambara, mu gihe u Rwanda rufite abana bagera ku 2000 bagize uruhare mu ntambara.
UNICEF ivuga ko, nubwo bamwe mu bana batishora mu mirwano, bahura n'ingaruka nyinshi. 
Bashobora gukoreshwa nk'abatwara ibintu, batwara imitwaro iremereye cyane, cyangwa nk'intumwa cyangwa abatasi batanga amakuru kandi bagashakisha agace k'umwanzi.
Rimwe na rimwe, abahungu, ariko cyane cyane abakobwa, bakoreshwa nk'abacakara. Bahura nâ€™ihohoterwa na Virus itera SIDA n'izindi ndwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina.
Abakobwa bashobora gusama, bikabagora gusubira mu miryango yabo.
Manuel Fontaine wa UNICEF avuga ko gusubiza mu buzima busanzwe bitwara igihe n'amafaranga. 
Avuga ko abana bagomba kubanza kuboneka, hanyuma bakavanwa muri guverinoma cyangwa mu mitwe y'inyeshyamba. 
Noneho, ibikoresho bikabona gukenewe kugira ngo bibafashe kubaka ubuzima bwabo. Ibyo bikubiyemo gutanga amashuri, amahugurwa y'imyuga no kwita ku buzima.
Rero, uragerageza kubaka serivisi muri iyo miryango ari serivisi zagutse, zizahabwa abo bana bose , Bwana Fontaine.
Bwana Fontaine avuga ko, mu rwego rwo guharanira amahoro atandukanye mu karere k'ibiyaga bigari, Banki y'Isi n'abandi baterankunga batanga miliyoni 500 z'amadolari yo gufasha abana mu bikorwa.
Avuga ko ikibabaje ari uko inzego za Leta zikenewe zitarashyirwaho mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe kugira ngo inzira igerweho vuba bihagije. 
Avuga ko ari yo mpamvu UNICEF irihatira kubona izo nzego zitera imbere, kugira ngo abana basubire mu rugo batangire kubaho ubuzima busanzwe.

Guharanira amahoro mu karere
Bihamba ahuza umuryango witwa Synergy y'abagore wo kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina.
Abajyanama hamwe n'itsinda baratewe kandi babangamiwe n'ibikorwa byabo. 
Umunsi umwe ubwo Bihamba yari ku kazi, abasirikari ba congo bateye iwe, basambanya umwe mu bakobwa be.

"Rostagno ati: ""Ibyinshi mu bikorwa bikorwa kugira ngo harebwe ingaruka, gukorana n'abagore bahohotewe, ariko ntibihagije kugira ngo harebwe ibitera gufata ku ngufu n'amakimbirane."""
Ibintu byifashe nabi kandi biteye impungenge isi

Kwiyongera k'ubutegetsi bw'igitugu
Koreya ya ruguru ikomeje kuba igihugu kibi ku rutonde kikaba icya 180. Ahandi hose mu karere ka Aziya-Pasifika, imvururu za politiki, amakimbirane hamwe nâ€™ubutegetsi bw'igitugu byiyongereye byahanaguyeho iterambere.
Ihirikwa ryâ€™ubutegetsi bwo mu 2021 muri Miyanimari ryagaragaje ko hasubijwe imyaka 10 uburenganzira bwâ€™itangazamakuru, abanyamakuru barafungwa, impushya zâ€™itangazamakuru zivanwaho, ndetse nâ€™ibitangazamakuru byinshi bisubira mu buhungiro. 
Ku butegetsi bwa gisirikare, Miyanimari iri ku mwanya wa 176, ni hamwe mu hafunze abanyamakuru bakomeye ku isi.
Muri Afuganisitani, inyeshyamba zâ€™abatalibani ziyemeje guharanira ubwisanzure bwâ€™itangazamakuru igihe zabafatiye ku butegetsi muri Kanama 2021. 
"Nyamara, RSF yavuze ko ""kwigarurira ubutegetsi bwâ€™abatalibani byarushijeho kuba bibi ku banyamakuru nâ€™imiryango itangaza amakuru, bakaba ari bo bakorerwa iterabwoba nâ€™urugomo."" Afuganisitani iri ku mwanya wa 154."
RSF yavuze ko hirya no hino muri Afurika, amategeko ahana itangazamakuru ku rubuga rwa interineti yagize ingaruka nshya ku burenganzira bwo kumenya amakuru, mu gihe ikwirakwizwa ryâ€™ibihuha, poropagande, ndetse nâ€™amakuru yanduye byagize uruhare mu guhungabanya amakuru meza.
Muri Etiyopiya, intambara yo mu karere ka Tigray, hamwe nâ€™itumanaho no kubuza kwinjirira amakuru, ni byo bintu nyamukuru byashyize igihugu ku rutonde rwa 114. 
Abaturanyi ba Eritereya na Djibouti ho ni bibi cyane, biza hafi ya 179 na 164.
Ibitangazamakuru byo muri Afurika bikomeje guhangana mu byâ€™ubukungu, RSF yavuze ko isesengura rihari riherekeje.
"Iri tsinda ryagize riti: ""Nubwo mu myaka ya za 90 habaye umudendezo wo kwishyira ukizana, haracyari, kenshi na kenshi, ibibazo byo kugenzura uko bishakiye, cyane cyane kuri interineti, rimwe na rimwe bifunga imiyoboro mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe, ifatwa ry'abanyamakuru ndetse n'ibitero by'urugomo."""
Clayton yavuze ko igitugu kigenda cyiyongera.
"Ati: ""Iyo twemeye ko umuco wo kudahana ubaho aho abategetsi b'igitugu bemerewe gukurikirana abanyamakuru, kubatoteza, kubafata, kubakubita mu mihanda no kubica, bigira ingaruka mbi"". "
Irashimangira ubwo butegetsi bumwe bwo kuzongera kubikora ubutaha, kandi bugashimangira abandi bayobozi bareba ko babikora.
Amerika ntabwo Ari intunganye
"Nyuma y'igihe kinini cyo kubona itangazamakuru ryacyo ryibasiwe ""n'amakuru y'ibinyoma"" n'uwahoze ari perezida Donald Trump, Amerika yagumanye umwanya wa 42 ukurikije urutonde rwa RSF. "
Ibyo ahanini tubikesha kugaruka kwa White House bisanzwe hamwe n'abanyamakuru ba federasiyo.
"Ariko RSF yavuze ko ibibazo bikomeje, harimo ""ibura ry'ibinyamakuru byaho, itumanaho rya buri gihe ry'itangazamakuru, ndetse no gutsemba abanyamakuru ku mbuga za interineti mu gihe hari inzangano n'ibitero byibasiye abanyamakuru, n'ibindi."""
Inzitizi zirahari, nk'urugero, mu gihe cyo gusigasira inzego za leta nâ€™imyigaragambyo.

"Umuntu ku giti cye arimo gusobanura nabi niba umunyamakuru ashobora kwitabira ibirori runaka."""
Ahantu hakeye
Nubwo muri rusange bigenda bigabanuka, Clayton yavuze ko hari ibyiza.
Guverinoma zimwe na zimwe zitanga inkunga mu bitangazamakuru zitivanze mu bikorwa byabyo, mu kugaragaza ubwigenge ko nta ruhare rwa politiki rurimo.
"Ati: ""Iyo urebye hejuru y'urutonde rwacu, bimwe mu bigaragara ni ibi bihugu bifite inkunga ya Leta mu itangazamakuru"", akomeza agira ati: ""Buri gihe ni ngombwa gutandukanya inkunga ya Leta mu bitangazamakuru no kugenzurwa na leta."""
Ibihugu bitatu bya Scandinaviya - Noruveje, Danemarke na Suwede - biza ku isonga ku rutonde rwa RSF. Esitoniya yahoze ari repubulika yâ€™Abasoviyeti, iri ku mwanya wa 4.

Ati: ""Niba abantu bateraniye hamwe mu bihe aho usanga ubundi buryo bushya bukwirakwira, uzabona ubwinshi bwo kwandura."""

Iyicwa, Gufungwa bamanitse Kuvugurura Amategeko yo muri Arabiya Sawudite
Arabiya Sawudite irihatira kuvugurura imikorere yâ€™ubutabera ikarishye ariko ivugurura rirengerwa nâ€™iyicwa ndetse nâ€™ifatwa rikomeye ryâ€™abatavuga rumwe nâ€™ubutegetsi, bitera kwibaza niba byinshi bizahinduka.
Ubwami buzwiho gusobanura byimazeyo amategeko ya shariya ya kisilamu, agize ishingiro ryubucamanza.
Ariko mu mezi ashize yateye imbere hamwe n'ivugurura abasesenguzi bavuga ko rishobora gutuma inkiko zayo zikora nk'abandi bo mu burasirazuba bwo hagati.
Iyo mbaraga ishingiye ku ruhererekane rw'amategeko mashya ku bibazo byoroshye nk'uburenganzira bwo gutandukana kw'abagore n'ububasha bw'abacamanza bwo kumenya ibihano.

Sisitemu izwi
Amategeko abiri mashya yamaze kwemezwa na Guverinoma ya Arabiya Sawudite. Umuntu agenga iyakirwa ryibimenyetso, mbere kubushake bwabacamanza.
Iya kabiri, amategeko yumuryango, agomba gukurikizwa muri kamena. Muri gahunda gakondo yiganjemo abagabo, yagura uburenganzira bwabagore bahukanye kubatunga no kurera abana babo.
"Mu kwezi kwa Werurwe, igikomangoma Mohammed yatangaje iryo tegeko rishya, yavuze ko rihagarariye ""gusimbuka ubuziranenge"" ku burenganzira bw'umugore no ""gutekana mu muryango."""
Adel al-Saeed, visi perezida wâ€™umuryango wâ€™ubumwe bwâ€™ibihugu byâ€™Uburayi ushinzwe uburenganzira bwa muntu, Adel al-Saeed yavuze ko iryo vugurura risa nkaho ryita ku masosiyete yâ€™amahanga ashora imari mu bwami.
"Ati: ""Ba nyir'imari bafite ubwoba bwo gushora imari muri iki gihugu, kizwiho amategeko, bityo aya mategeko agamije guhindura isura""."
Igitabo gishya cy'amategeko ahana, kitarashyirwa ahagaragara, gishobora kuzana izindi mpinduka zikomeye.
Muri shariya, ubuhakanyi, ubujura, kwigomeka, ubujura bwitwaje intwaro, gusambana, kunywa inzoga no gusebanya bitwara ibihano byateganijwe. Abacamanza basigaye bagena ibihano mu zindi manza.
"Hamwe nâ€™amategeko ahana, ""leta izateganya ko abacamanza batashingira ku mahugurwa yabo bwite muri shariya ahubwo bakurikiza amategeko (ashingiye kuri shariya) yemejwe na leta"", ibi bikaba byavuzwe na Nathan Brown, umunyeshuri muri kaminuza ya George Washington."
"Brown wize ku ivugurura rya Arabiya Sawudite yagize ati: ""Kubera iyo mpamvu, Arabiya Sawudite izasa cyane na gahunda yâ€™amategeko mbonezamubano, kimwe na Leta nyinshi zo mu karere."""
"Ibisubizo bigomba kurushaho kuba ""guhanura"", nk'uko byavuzwe na Abdullah Alaoudh, impuguke mu by'amategeko ukomoka muri Amerika akaba anenga guverinoma, kubera ko amategeko mashya ""akuraho inzira ... abacamanza bari bafite."""
"Yongeyeho ko ariko gukurikiza amategeko agenga ubwami nabyo ""bitera ikibazo kinini: kubura ubwigenge""."
Umwami ni umuyobozi wubutabera bwa Arabiya Sawudite kandi akora nkurukiko rwa nyuma rwubujurire.
Se wa Alaoudh, umunyamadini ukomeye Salman al-Awdah, afunzwe kuva mu 2017, bisa nkaho ari ukwihorera ku rubuga rwa Twitter ruvuguruzanya na politiki ya Arabiya Sawudite mu gihe cyo guha akato Qatar.
Ni umwe mu bantu benshi bafunzwe mu rwego rwo guhashya abatavuga rumwe nâ€™ubutegetsi ndetse nâ€™abashobora guhangana nâ€™ubutegetsi bwa Muganwa Mohammed.
Imwe mu ngero zikomeye ni uwahoze ari igikomangoma cyâ€™ikamba, Mohammed bin Nayef, umufasha wa CIA wubahwa mu Burengerazuba kubera umuhate we wo kurwanya ubuhezanguni, ariko Umwami Salman yirukanye ku murongo w'izungura.
Igikomangoma Nayef ntabwo yagaragaye mu ruhame kuva amakuru avuga ko yafashwe muri Werurwe 2020. Ifungwa rye ntiryigeze ryemezwa ku mugaragaro.
Igicucu cya Khashoggi
Kubatavuga rumwe na leta, imanza nkizo zishimangira ibibazo bijyanye nâ€™itandukaniro ivugurura ryâ€™ubutabera rizagira.
"Madawi al-Rasheed, umunyeshuri ukomoka muri Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika akaba n'umuvugizi w'ishyaka ryâ€™inteko ishinga amategeko ritavuga rumwe nâ€™ubutegetsi ryashinzwe nâ€™abajyanywe mu bunyage, yagize ati: ""Njye mbona, ibi byose byambaye idirishya""."
Biragoye cyane, kubona icyo iryo vugurura risobanura usibye umushinga wo kwerekana (Prince Mohammed) nk'umuntu uvugurura.
Kuzamura ikiganiro icyo ari cyo cyose cyerekeye ubutabera nâ€™ivugurura ryâ€™amategeko muri Arabiya Sawudite ni ubwicanyi no gutandukanya abanegura nâ€™umwanditsi Jamal Khashoggi muri konsulasi yâ€™ubwami ya Istanbul.
"Isuzuma ryâ€™ubutasi ryâ€™Amerika ryasanze igikomangoma Mohammed ubwe ""yemeye"" igikorwa cyo gufata cyangwa kwica Khashoggi, nubwo abayobozi ba Arabiya Sawudite babihakana bakavuga ko ari igikorwa ""kibi""."
Muri Mata, mbere yuko Perezida wa Turkiya, Recep Tayyip Erdogan asura Riyadh ku wa kane maze ahobera igikomangoma Mohammed, Turukiya yimuriye urubanza adahari abantu 26 bakekwaho icyaha cya Khashoggi muri Arabiya Sawudite.

"Inshuti y'igikomangoma Salman bin Abdulaziz wafunzwe na se kuva mu 2018, yagize ati: ""Ndashaka, benshi barabikora, ariko dufite ubwoba."""

Kuva mu mwaka wa 2019, amahugurwa yahawe kandi abagore bahamwe n'icyaha hakurikijwe itegeko ryo kurwanya iterabwoba muri Maroc. "Iyi gahunda yiswe ""Moussalaha,"" bisobanura ""ubwiyunge"" mucyarabu, iyi gahunda ihabwa imfungwa zagaragaje ko ziteguye kwanga ubuhezanguni."
"Mohsin yavuze ko yavuye kurwana muri Siriya mu 2012. Yataye ishuri akiri ingimbi, yavuze ko ""yari azi gusoma no kwandika kandi ko adashobora gutandukanya icyiza n'ikibi."" "" kubyerekeye inshingano ziva ku Mana zo kurwanya abadakurikiza amahame ya kisilamu no kwica abatari Abayisilamu. """""
"Ati: ""Muri Siriya,"" Nabonye ubwicanyi, gufata ku ngufu n'ubujura "". ""Nafashe umwanzuro nyuma y'igihe ko intambara ikorwa mu izina rya Islamu ntaho ihuriye n'idini ryacu."""
Yahungiye muri Turukiya mu 2018, afungirwa umwaka umwe mbere yo koherezwa muri Maroc.
Avuga ko ubu yanze ubuhezanguni.
"Ati: ""Icyo gihe cy'ubuzima bwanjye cyarashize."""
Abanyamerika benshi bagiye muri Siriya, Iraki n'ahandi kugira ngo binjire mu mitwe y'intagondwa. Maroc nayo yahuye n'ibitero byinshi ubwayo. Ibitero bitanu byo kwiyahura byabereye i Casablanca mu 2003 byahitanye abantu 33. Mu 2011, igisasu cyaturikiye ikawa i Marrakech, gihitana abantu 17, abenshi muri bo bakaba ari ba mukerarugendo b'abanyamahanga.
Al Mustapaha Razrazi, inzobere mu by'imitekerereze ya muntu akaba n'umwe mu bagize komite ishinzwe ubumenyi muri iyo gahunda, yavuze ko mu bantu 156 barekuwe nyuma yo kwitabira amasomo, umwe gusa yongeye gufatwa akora icyaha.
Yavuze ko uwo muntu yahamijwe n'icyaha kijyanye n'iterabwoba.
""
Irani ibonye amahirwe yo kugurisha ibice by'imodoka ku Barusiya bakora imodoka.
Ibitangazamakuru bya Leta byatangaje ko umunyamuryango wa syndicat ya Irani yâ€™ibicuruzwa byâ€™imodoka avuga ko abakora muri Irani bafite amahirwe yo kohereza ibicuruzwa byabo mu ruganda rukora imodoka mu Burusiya.
"Raporo yo ku wa mbere yarangiye ivuga ko Hossein Bahrein yavuze ko ""uruganda rukomeye rwâ€™imodoka yo mu Burusiya"" rwasabye ibice muri Irani. Ntiyavuze uwabikoze. Yavuze ko isaba ibice bya feri, ibikapu byo mu kirere, ibyuma bifata ibyuma bikonjesha n'ibindi bikoresho."
Irani n'Uburusiya byombi bihanishwa Amerika ariko kohereza imodoka za Irani n'ibice by'imodoka ntabwo bihanwa.
Gutumiza imodoka muri Irani nabyo ntabwo bihanwa. Icyakora, Tehran ntabwo yatumije imodoka kuva mu 2018, nyuma yâ€™uko Amerika ivuye mu masezerano ya kirimbuzi hagati ya Irani nâ€™ibihugu byâ€™isi ndetse ikanafatira Irani ibihano bya peteroli na banki.
Ibihugu byâ€™iburengerazuba byahagaritse kohereza mu Burusiya nyuma yo gutera Ukraine.
Irani mu myaka yashize yohereje mu Burusiya imirasire yâ€™imodoka na sisitemu zo guhagarika. Kera yoherezaga imodoka muri Iraki, Siriya na Venezuwela.
Tehran na Moscou bafitanye umubano wa hafi mu myaka yashize, cyane cyane nyuma yâ€™uko uruganda rukora ingufu za kirimbuzi rukumbi rwa Irani rujya kuri interineti mu 2011 babifashijwemo nâ€™Uburusiya.
Ku wa kabiri, Irani yavuze ko yagize uruhare mu bunzi mu ntambara yo muri Ukraine.
"Minisitiri wâ€™ububanyi nâ€™amahanga Hossein Amir Abdollahian mu kiganiro kuri telefoni na mugenzi we wa Irlande yagize ati: ""Kugeza ubu inshuro ebyiri zose nagejeje ubutumwa kuri minisitiri wâ€™ububanyi nâ€™amahanga wa Ukraine kuri mugenzi wanjye wâ€™Uburusiya."" Yavuze ko Irani ishyigikiye ibisubizo byâ€™ububanyi nâ€™amahanga mu kugarura amahoro nâ€™amahoro."
"Abdollahian ntabwo yabisobanuye ariko yavuze ko Irani ""irwanya intambara no kwimura abantu muri Ukraine,"" ndetse n'indi ntera nka Yemeni, ibihugu bya Palesitine na Afuganisitani."
""
Dutandukanye, Ibitekerezo bishya bikoreshwa muburasirazuba bwo hagati
Nataliya Sancha yamye afata inzira yo gufatanya mubanyamakuru. Iyo asohotse mukoro, avugana nabandi bavuga inkuru imwe kubitekerezo byabo.
Ibi bimwe bituruka ku gushimishwa no kuvuga inkuru zidasobanutse, ariko nkumunyamakuru wumugore mukarere kariganjemo abagabo, avuga ko ubufatanye no gutera inkunga abagore bakorana byahoze ari ngombwa.
"Umunyamakuru w'imyaka 42 yagize ati: ""Naganiriye n'abanyamakuru b'abagabo n'abagore, kandi buri gihe nabonaga ko abagore bafite imyumvire imwe, kuko natwe twagize ibyabaye mugihe twatangaga inkuru""."
Ubwo buryo bwo gufatanya bwatangiye gukurikizwa mu 2020 ubwo umubwiriza yabazaga Sancha niba ashishikajwe no kwandika igitabo kivuga kuri Siriya.
Yarwanyije icyifuzo cyiza.
"Ati: ""Namubwiye ko inkuru rusange y'abanyamakuru b'abagore ivuga ku karere kanini byagira ingaruka zitandukanye."" ""Nanjye ubwanjye nashoboraga kwandika igitabo, ariko ntabwo cyari kumva kimwe."""
Sancha ukomoka muri Andalusiya mu majyepfo ya Espagne, Sancha yamaze imyaka 14 ishize mu burasirazuba bwo hagati yerekana amakimbirane yo muri Iraki, Siriya na Yemeni, kandi atanga raporo avuye muri Egiputa, Libani na Tuniziya.
Aherutse gukorana nâ€™ishami ryâ€™itumanaho ryâ€™umuryango wâ€™ubumwe bwâ€™ibihugu byâ€™Uburayi, nyuma yo kuva i Beirut kubera impamvu zâ€™ubuzima nyuma yâ€™igiturika kinini cyibasiye umujyi muri 2020.
"Sancha yabwiye VOA ati: ""Abagore"" bafite uburambe butandukanye kuko twajya ahantu bagenzi bacu b'igitsina gabo batamenyereye. Ntabwo ari ukubera ko turi abanyabwenge, ahubwo ni ukubera ko igice kinini cy'akarere kikiri abarabu, abayisilamu ndetse n'abagabo."""
Yavuze ko kugira abanyamakuru b'abagore bigira ingaruka.
Niba nishyize mu mwanya w'abasomyi, nahitamo kugira umugore umbwira inkuru kuko igiye kuba hafi 100 ku ijana by'abaturage, bivuze ko uzaba ufite inkuru zuzuye zirimo amakimbirane.
Ku gitabo cye, Sancha yageze ku bandi bagore bavuga iburasirazuba bwo hagati, kugira ngo babone ibitekerezo bitandukanye n'abanyamakuru bo mu mahanga ndetse n'abenegihugu.
Ibisubizo byubufatanye bwimyaka hafi ibiri ni Bullets kuri Bose, yasohotse mu cyesipanyoli muri Mata.
"Muri iki gitabo, Sancha yagize ati: ""Muri iki gitabo,"" tuvuga inkuru imwe n'amajwi atandukanye ahagarariye abagore bose ""."
Buri kimwe gitanga icyerekezo cyihariye cyo kwerekana ibihe byamateka, harimo gusenyuka kwa guverinoma yigenga, imyigaragambyo yamamaye nintambara. Irasuzuma kandi ivangura n'ihohoterwa abagore bahura nabyo mu cyumba cy'amakuru no ku mukoro.
Gukora amasano
Maya Gebeily avuga ko gusobanukirwa ururimi n'umuco bigana inzira igana ku iterambere. Umuyobozi w'ikigo cya Reuters muri Libani, Siriya na Yorodani ni umwe mu bagize uruhare muri iki gitabo.
"Ati: ""Hariho byinshi byo kuvuga no kwerekana nkurikije uko abanyamakuru b'abagore na bo bahise bayoborwa n'abagore bahuye igihe bakoraga raporo zabo""."
Gebeily yavukiye muri Amerika ku babyeyi bo muri Libani, yatangiye umwuga we w'itangazamakuru mu 2013 akoresheje urubuga rw'amakuru i Beirut, muri Libani. Yakomeje yerekeza mu karere ka Agence France-Presse mbere yo kwinjira muri Reuters.
Gebeily yavuze ko amateka ye y'Abanyamerika na Libani yamufashije kumva neza akarere, ari nako kagize uruhare mu gutanga raporo. Kumenya ururimi rwaho nigice cyingenzi cyibyo.
"Ati: ""Iyo ubajije minisitiri cyangwa umuntu wimuwe cyangwa umurwanashyaka, ikintu cy'ingenzi ni ukugirira icyizere."" ""Niba ushoboye kuvuga ururimi no gutuma bumva bamerewe neza kuva mu ntangiriro, bihindura byose. Iraguha uburyo bwiza cyane bwo kwinjira."""
Usibye Iraki na Libani, Gebeily w'imyaka 30 yanagiye muri Siriya kugira ngo akurikirane intambara yo kurwanya umutwe w'abarwanyi ba Leta ya Kisilamu (IS).
"Ati: ""Ive nagize amahirwe yo kugera ku baturage mu buryo butaziguye ntiriwe nkorana n'umusemuzi cyangwa uwakosoye, ibyo bikaba binerekana uburyo inkuru zisohoka""."
Umunyamakuru wa Siriya-Kurdiya, Khabat Abbas, wanditse ku ntambara yo muri Siriya, ahamya akamaro kayo.
"Yatangarije VOA avuye i Qamishli, muri Siriya ati: ""Kumenya ururimi n'umuco biha abantu ihumure ryo kukwugururira."""
Ubwo bumenyi bwafashije igihe Abbas w'imyaka 34 yari mu butumwa na Sancha muri Werurwe 2021. Baragiye mu kigo cyâ€™imfungwa cyâ€™Abanyakorde mu majyaruguru yâ€™amajyaruguru ya Siriya maze babaza abajihadiste bâ€™abagore bafitanye isano na IS, kugira ngo babone inkuru muri El Pais.
"Sancha yagize ati: ""Nkiri i Qamishli [mu majyaruguru y'uburasirazuba bwa Siriya], nahungiye mu banyamakuru babiri b'Abongereza, abo dukorana cyane, batengushye nyuma yuko Shamima Begum n'abandi bagore bari mu nkambi banze kuvugana nabo."" wavuye iwe mu Bwongereza afite imyaka 15 yinjira muri IS."
Umukosora wabo yari umugabo, ku buryo abagore ba jihadiste batavuganye nabo kubera ko ari intagondwa, kandi ntibavugana n'abagabo. Ariko rero nashoboye kwicarana na Shamima n'abandi bagore, batanga ibiganiro bitangaje bivuye mu mahema yabo. Sancha ati.
Yongeyeho ko Abbas yagize uruhare mu kubona abo bagore.
Unlike Sancha and Gebeily, Abbas grew up in the marginalized Kurdish region of Syria, where until the war began in 2011, journalism effectively didnt exist.
Bitandukanye na Sancha na Gebeily, Abbas yakuriye mu karere ka Siriya kâ€™abasigajwe inyuma na Siriya, kugeza igihe intambara yatangiriye mu 2011, itangazamakuru ntiryabayeho.
Itangazamakuru ryaramushimishije kubera ko inkuru yo mu burasirazuba bwo hagati yagiye ivugwa n'abanyamakuru b'abagabo, baba abo mu mahanga ndetse n'abanyamahanga.
"Abbas yagize ati: ""Ibitekerezo ntabwo byahindutse kubera ibyo, ariko niba abanyamakuru bâ€™abagore bo mu karere ndetse nâ€™amahanga babonye amahirwe nyayo yo kuvuga amateka yâ€™iburasirazuba bwo hagati, iyo nkuru ishobora guhinduka, ibyo bikaba byagira ingaruka ku kuntu abandi babona aka karere."""
Sancha yizera kandi ko abagore mu itangazamakuru bagira ingaruka ku buryo ibibazo bigaragara mu karere, birimo ihungabana ryâ€™ihungabana ndetse nâ€™ingaruka bigira ku buzima bwâ€™umugore, ndetse nâ€™ihohoterwa nâ€™inzoga.
"Ati: ""Turaganira kuri ibyo bibazo byose abagabo ubusanzwe batavuga."""
""
Umuyobozi w'ingabo za Irani avuga ko Isiraheli ishyiraho uburyo bwo kurimbuka
Ku wa gatanu, umuyobozi wâ€™ingabo zâ€™abasirikare barinda impinduramatwara ya Irans, yatangaje ko ibikorwa bya Isiraheli bitera uburyo bwo kurimbuka kwayo.
Televiziyo ya Leta yavuze ko miliyoni z'Abanyayirani bitabiriye imyigaragambyo yizihizaga umunsi wa Quds, izina ry'icyarabu ryitwa Yeruzalemu, mu rugendo rwateguwe na leta mu gihugu hose.
"Yerekanye ibendera rya Isiraheli ritwikwa hamwe nitsinda ryabantu hirya no hino basakuza koreografiya ""Urupfu muri Amerika, Urupfu kuri Isiraheli""."
Umuyobozi w'ikirenga, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, mu ijambo rye kuri televiziyo yavuze ko imyigaragambyo n'ibitero byo kurwanya Isiraheli byerekanaga ko Abanyapalestine banze kumvikana n'abayobozi b'Abarabu na Isiraheli.
Kurwanya Isiraheli ni ibuye rikomeye ku myizerere ya Irani, ishyigikiye imitwe yitwara gisirikare ya kisilamu ya Palesitine na Libani irwanya amahoro na Isiraheli, Tehran ikaba itemera.
"Mu magambo ye, Khamenei yagize ati: ""Ibyabereye muri Palesitine mu myaka yashize bivanaho gahunda zose zo kumvikana nâ€™umwanzi wâ€™abaziyoniste (Isiraheli) kuko nta gahunda ya Palesitine ishobora gushyirwa mu bikorwa idahari cyangwa binyuranye nâ€™ibitekerezo bya ba nyirayo, Abanyapalestine"". Icyarabu no kuvugana nabanyapalestine nabandi barabu."
"Ni yo mpamvu, Khamenei yavuze ko amasezerano yâ€™amahoro yabanjirije aya - nkâ€™amasezerano ya Oslo yo mu 1993, igisubizo cyâ€™ibihugu byombi kugira ngo gikemure amakimbirane hagati ya Isiraheli na Palesitine, ndetse nâ€™umugambi wahoze ari Perezida wa Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump wise amasezerano yâ€™ikinyejana ""nta gaciro ufite."" "
Perezida Ebrahim Raisi, abayobozi b'ingabo za Irans n'abayobozi bakuru na bo bitabiriye imyigaragambyo aho abantu bemerewe kugenda mu mihanda, ku nshuro ya mbere kuva icyorezo cya coronavirus gitangira mu myaka ibiri ishize.
Igiterane cyâ€™umunsi wa Yeruzalemu cya Irani kiba buri mwaka mu rwego rwo gushyigikira Abanyapalestine, bifuza ko Yeruzalemu yâ€™iburasirazuba iba umurwa mukuru wâ€™igihugu kizaza mu turere twafashwe na Isiraheli mu ntambara yo mu 1967, ku wa gatanu wanyuma wâ€™ukwezi kwa Ramazani kwisonzesha kwâ€™abayisilamu.
"Umuyobozi w'ingabo zishinzwe impinduramatwara, Hossein Salami, yabwiye Isiraheli, yabwiye abigaragambyaga i Tehran ati: ""Hagarika ibikorwa byawe bibi. Uzi neza ko turi abantu bakora kandi bakitwara neza."""
Ibisubizo byacu birababaje. Ushiraho uburyo bwo kurimbuka kwawe. Ntabwo tuzagutererana wenyine ... Uzi kundusha ibizakubaho uramutse ufashe nabi.
Igisirikare cya Irani cyiyemeje kwihorera bikabije igitero icyo ari cyo cyose cyagabwe na Isiraheli, cyakunze kugaragaza impungenge kuri gahunda ya kirimbuzi ya Irani. Tehran ivuga ko gahunda igamije amahoro gusa.
Isiraheli, repubulika ya kisilamu itabaho, imaze igihe kinini itera ubwoba ibikorwa bya gisirikare byo kurwanya Irani niba ibiganiro hagati ya Tehran nâ€™ibihugu byâ€™ibihugu bidashoboye guhagarika ibikorwa bya kirimbuzi bya Irani. Irani ivuga ko intego zayo za kirimbuzi ari amahoro.
"Muri Gashyantare, Repubulika ya Kisilamu yashyize ahagaragara misile yayo ""Kheibar Buster"" ifite uburebure bwa kilometero 1,450."
Irani, ifite imwe muri gahunda zikomeye za misile mu burasirazuba bwo hagati, ivuga ko misile zayo zo mu bwoko bwa ballistique zifite uburebure bwa kilometero zigera ku 2.000 kandi ko zishobora kugera ku birindiro byazo bya Isiraheli ndetse n'ibirindiro byâ€™Amerika muri ako karere.
Kheibar bivuga oasisi ya kera y'Abayahudi yo mu gace ka Hijaz ka Arabiya yâ€™Abarabu yigaruriwe n'abarwanyi b'Abayisilamu mu kinyejana cya 7.
Tehran ibona gahunda yayo ya misile ballistique nk'ikintu gikomeye cyo gukumira Amerika, Isiraheli ndetse n'abanzi bayo, kandi yanze icyifuzo cy'iburengerazuba cyo kuyihagarika.
Mu mwaka ushize, Irani na Amerika byaganiriye na Vienne mu biganiro bifatika kandi bitaziguye kugira ngo byongere kubyutsa amasezerano ya kirimbuzi yo muri 2015 icyo gihe Perezida Donald Trump yanze kuva muri 2018 kandi ko Irani nayo yatangiye kurenga muri 2019.
Mu masezerano ya 2015, Irani yemeye kugabanya gahunda zayo za kirimbuzi mu rwego rwo gukuraho ibihano byâ€™ubukungu.
Mu gihe basaga nkaho bari hafi kubyutsa ayo masezerano muri Werurwe, ibiganiro byahagaritse icyifuzo cyâ€™Uburusiya ku munota wa nyuma ndetse nâ€™uko Washington ishobora gukuraho abashinzwe umutekano wâ€™impinduramatwara ya Irani ku rutonde rwâ€™umuryango wâ€™iterabwoba wâ€™amahanga.
""
Nk'uko Abanyamerika bake Bajya mu Itorero, Amaduka ya Kawa Yuzuza Icyuho?
Amatorero n'andi mazu asengeramo yagiye akora amateka akomeye mubikorwa bya politiki na politiki muri societe y'Abanyamerika. 
Ariko abantu bake ni bo bitabira ibikorwa byâ€™amadini, kandi kugabanuka kwamatorero nandi mazu yo gusengeramo bikangisha gusiga icyuho gishobora kuzuzwa n'amaduka ya kawa.
"Umuyobozi w'ikigo, Daniel Cox agira ati: ""Mu mateka menshi y'Abanyamerika, itorero ryabaye - cyangwa amatorero yabo yabaye ngombwa - kugira uruhare rudasanzwe mu gutanga ubumwe no guhuza abaturageâ€¦ gushishikariza uruhare rw'abaturage no kugira uruhare muri politiki."" Ubushakashatsi ku Buzima bw'Abanyamerika na mugenzi wawe mukuru muri American Enterprise Institute."
"Cox agira ati: ""Ntabwo byari ibintu by'uruhurirane cyangwa amahirwe kuba umuryango uharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu wavuye mu itorero."""
Kandi urabona ko imico itandukanyeâ€¦ haba mu baturage biganjemo abazungu bo mu cyaro, mu nkengero, ahantu hose, amatorero yabaye amateka mu by'ukuri, ni ngombwa.
Cox avuga ko amatorero n'andi mazu asengeramo nabyo byagize uruhare mu gufasha abimukira kwimuka bamaze kugera muri Amerika.
Mu 1999, 70% by'Abanyamerika bavuze ko bari mu rusengero, umusigiti cyangwa mu isinagogi.
Muri 2020, iyo mibare yari yagabanutse kugera kuri 47%. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe mu mwaka wa 2019 bwerekanye ko Abanyamerika bagera kuri batatu gusa ari bo bavuga ko bitabira amadini ya buri cyumweru.
"Umwanya wa gatatu Kutagira uruhare no gufatanya n'amatorero, imisigiti n'amasinagogi bivuze ko abantu bashobora kubura icyo umuhanga mubya societologue wo mumijyi Ray Oldenburg yise ""umwanya wa gatatu"" - ahantu hateranira abantu benshi batanga ikintu murugo, ""umwanya wa mbere,"" nakazi, ""umwanya wa kabiri,"" ntabwo."
Oldenburg yavuze ko umwanya wa gatatu ari ingenzi ku mibereho y'abaturage.
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe mu Kwakira 2021 bwakozwe nâ€™ikigo cyâ€™Abanyamerika gishinzwe ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko ahantu hâ€™ubucuruzi nkâ€™amazu ya kawa bitera kwizerana no guhuza imiryango y'Abanyamerika kandi bikaba byafasha kuziba icyuho cyasizwe n'amatorero.
"Inzobere mu by'imitekerereze ya muntu, Dr. Maria Espinola, umwarimu wungirije mu ishami ryâ€™indwara zo mu mutwe, agira ati: ""Niba usanzwe muri cafe, barista irashobora kumenya icyo usanzwe utumiza, kandi barashobora kukugukorera, kandi ibyo ni byiza."" na Neuroscience Imyitwarire muri kaminuza ya Cincinnati College of Medicine."
Ni byiza kumenyekana, kumenya ko abantu bagutegereje, kumenya ko abantu bakwitayeho, kumenya ko uri uwawe, kuko gukenera kuba hamwe no guhuza abantu nikintu cyibanze twese dufite, kandi ni ngombwa kugira ngo ibyo bisohozwe mu buryo butandukanye, Espinola.
Rero, ahantu nka gatatu harashobora kutwemerera kubikora.
Mu bihe byashize, amatorero n'andi mazu yo gusengeramo yabaye umwanya wa gatatu ku Banyamerika benshi.
Muri 2019, 67% by'abantu babajijwe bavuze ko bafite umwanya wa gatatu - iduka rya kawa, akabari, resitora, parike cyangwa ahandi hantu basura buri gihe.
Umubare wagabanutse kugera kuri 56% muri 2021 - umubare washoboraga kwanduzwa nicyorezo cya COVID-19.
"Cox agira ati: ""Icyo twabonye ni uko abantu bafite umwanya wa gatatu bari bahuze cyane n'abaturage babo"". ""Birashoboka cyane ko bakora ibikorwa bindi."
"Barizera cyane abaturanyi babo. Hano hari byinshi byiza byagezweho mu mibereho bifitanye isano no kugira umwanya wa gatatuâ€¦ kandi ku Banyamerika benshi, ni ikawa cyangwa ikawa. """
Icyo amaduka yikawa abifitemo inyungu nuko ashobora kuboneka hafi ya hose, mugihugu cyose, kandi umuntu wese ubishaka ashobora guhagarara buri gihe.
Kandi benshi barakinguye iminsi myinshi yicyumweru.
Cox avuga ko no guhura kwa kawa bigufi bishobora kongera imyumvire.
"Cox agira ati: ""Ntekereza ko hano hari byinshi bishoboka, kandi ibyinshi muri byo ntabwo bishoboka."""

Ibyo abayobozi ba Amerika bahangayikishijwe cyane na byo nyuma y'icyorezo
Abayobozi ba Amerika bahangayikishijwe cyane nâ€™ingaruka ziterwa nâ€™ubuzima bwo mu mutwe bwâ€™icyorezo cya COVID-19, nkâ€™uko ubushakashatsi bwakozwe mu gihugu hose bwakorewe ku bayobozi 126 bwakozwe mu mpeshyi ya 2021.
Ababajijwe bayoboye imijyi byibuze abaturage 75.000. Abayobozi b'inzego z'ibanze baracyibanda ku bibazo gakondo nk'ibyaha by'urugomo, ubukungu n'ibikorwa remezo, ariko bahangayikishijwe cyane n'ingaruka z'icyorezo ku buzima bwo mu mutwe bw'abatoye.
Ubuzima bwo mu mutwe bwibanze kuri Michael Udine ubwo yarahiraga kuba umuyobozi wâ€™intara ya Broward, muri Floride, mu Gushyingo 2021.
"Agira ati: ""Ikintu cyose cyashoboraga kuba ikibazo mbere yâ€™icyorezo cyarushijeho kwiyongera kubera icyorezo."" "
Hariho ibibazo byagiye mu cyorezo, kandi byagendaga birushaho kuba ingenzi kuri ecran ya radar ya buri muntu ku bijyanye n'ubuzima bwo mu mutwe bw'abantu b'ingeri zose. Kandi ndatekereza ko icyorezo cyarenze ibyo bibazo.
Ntibisanzwe ko icyorezo kinini cyâ€™indwara kigira ingaruka mbi ku buzima bwo mu mutwe, nkâ€™uko ikigo gishinzwe kurwanya no gukumira indwara kibitangaza, ngo raporo yâ€™uko abantu bahangayitse ndetse nâ€™indwara yo kwiheba yiyongera mu gihe cyâ€™icyorezo.
Icyorezo kandi cyagize ingaruka mbi ku buzima bw'amarangamutima no mu mutwe by'urubyiruko rwo muri Amerika.

Amerika Yaguye Bituje Imipaka Yubuhunzi Mugihe Yitegura Kubarangiza
Ku wa gatatu, abayobozi bavuze ko ubuyobozi bwa Biden bwatangiye kwirukana Abanyakanani na Nikaragwa muri Mexico kubera ububasha bujyanye nâ€™icyorezo bwo kwima abimukira amahirwe yo gusaba ubuhungiro, kwagura ikoreshwa ryâ€™iryo tegeko nubwo rivuga ku mugaragaro ko ryagerageje kubireka.
Amerika yagiranye amasezerano na Mexico yo kwirukana abanya Cuba 100 na Nikaragwa 20 kumunsi ahantu hatatu: San Diego; El Paso, muri Texas; n'ikibaya cya Rio Grande, muri Texas, nk'uko byatangajwe n'umuyobozi wa Amerika ufite ubumenyi butaziguye bw'imbaraga.
Iyirukanwa ryatangiye ku ya 27 Mata rikazarangira ku ya 22 Gicurasi, nk'uko uyu muyobozi yabitangarije ibiro ntaramakuru by'Abanyamerika kugira ngo atamenyekana kubera ko ayo masezerano atashyizwe ahagaragara.
Bikorerwa munsi yumutwe wa 42, itegeko ryubuzima rusange ryakoreshejwe mu kwirukana abimukira ku mpamvu zo gukumira ikwirakwizwa rya COVID-19. Umutwe wa 42 ugomba kurangira ku ya 23 Gicurasi, keretse umucamanza abigizemo uruhare.
Nkâ€™uko byatangajwe n'umuyobozi wo mu rwego rwo hejuru wo muri Megizike wavuze ko atigeze atangazwa kubera ko batemerewe kugira icyo batangaza ku mugaragaro, Amerika na Mexico byumvikanye ku ya 26 Mata ku mubare muto cyane wo kwirukana Abanyakanani na Nikaragwa.
Byatewe numubare munini wâ€™abimukira bava muri ibyo bihugu byombi baza kumupaka wa Amerika.
Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko Mexico kandi yazirikanye ko guverinoma y'Amerika yatangiye gutunganya viza muri Cuba. Mexico nayo yari yatangiye gutunganya viza kubanya Cuba.
Undi muyobozi wo muri Megizike, na we utemerewe kugira icyo atangaza ku mugaragaro, yemeje ko Abanyakanani bagera kuri 100 na Nikaragwa 20 birukanwa muri San Diego ku mutwe wa 42.
Minisiteri ishinzwe umutekano mu gihugu cya Amerika ntabwo yahise isubiza icyifuzo cyo gutanga ibisobanuro.
Kugeza mu cyumweru gishize, Mexico yemeye gufata Guatemala, Hondurans na El Salvadorans - usibye Abanyamegizike - ku butegetsi bwa 42. Abandi benegihugu bagengwa na Umutwe wa 42 ariko ikiguzi, umubano wububanyi nâ€™ububanyi nâ€™ibindi bitekerezo akenshi biragoye kubasubiza mu bihugu byabo.
Bikurikira ntibishoboka ko Amerika yirukana abimukira muri Cuba cyangwa Nikaragwa kubera umubano mubi na guverinoma. 
Ibyo byateje ikibazo ubuyobozi bwa Biden mugihe abantu benshi baturuka muri ibyo bihugu bashaka ubuhungiro muri Amerika.
Nkâ€™uko byatangajwe na gasutamo ya Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika, ngo abanya Cuba bahagaritswe n'abayobozi b'Abanyamerika inshuro zirenga 32.000 ku mupaka wa Mexico, bakubye kabiri muri Gashyantare ndetse bakubye inshuro zirenga eshanu Ukwakira. Nikaragwa yorohereje imbogamizi zâ€™ingendo ziva muri Cuba mu Gushyingo, byorohereza Abanyakanada gukomeza ku butaka kugera ku mupaka wa Amerika. Benshi binjira muri Amerika cyangwa hafi ya Yuma, Arizona, na Del Rio, Texas.
Muri Werurwe, Nikaragwa yahagaritswe inshuro zirenga 16.000, irenga inshuro ebyiri Nzeri. Umubare munini winjira muri Texas yepfo.
Kuzamura Umutwe wa 42 byagaragaye ko bitavugwaho rumwe nkâ€™amatora yo hagati, ndetse no mu ishyaka rya demokarasi rya Biden, mu gihe hari impungenge zâ€™uko Amerika ititeguye kwiyongera kwâ€™abimukira bashaka ubuhungiro. Muri Werurwe, abategetsi bahagaritse abimukira inshuro zirenga 221.000, kikaba aricyo kintu kinini mu myaka 22.
Ishami ryâ€™umutekano nâ€™umutekano mu gihugu ryashyigikiye ku mugaragaro icyemezo cyâ€™ikigo gishinzwe kurwanya no gukumira indwara cyo guhagarika iki cyemezo kuko kitagishoboye kuba gifite ishingiro kubera kurengera ubuzima rusange.
Ariko imyitozo yo kwirukana abanya Cuba na Nikaragwa irahabanye nâ€™ubuyobozi bwatangaje ko bwagiye bukuraho imbaraga zâ€™icyorezo kugira ngo bitegure ku ya 23 Gicurasi.
Kuva muri Werurwe 2020, Amerika yirukanye abimukira inshuro zirenga miliyoni 1.8 ku butegetsi bwa Umutwe wa 42, bivuguruza uburenganzira bwo gusaba ubuhungiro hakurikijwe amategeko ya Amerika n'amasezerano mpuzamahanga. Mu kubikora, abimukira ntibagengwa n'amategeko yâ€™abinjira, akubiyemo uburenganzira bwo kurindwa ibitotezo mu ngo.
Ubuyobozi bwatangaje mu rukiko ko bwatangiye gutunganya abantu benshi bakuze bo muri Amerika yo Hagati bakurikiza amategeko yâ€™abinjira nyuma yâ€™uko CDC ibitangaza ku ya 1 Mata.
Umucamanza w'akarere ka Amerika, Robert Summerhays, yanenze cyane icyemezo cya CDC, avuga ko azagerageza gukomeza Umutwe wa 42 nyuma y'itariki ya 23 Gicurasi.
Umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe ubuvugizi nâ€™igenamigambi mu kigo cya Hope Border, Marisa Limon, yavuze ko abunganizi batangiye kwiga ibijyanye no kwirukana Abanyakanani na Nikaragwa muri El Paso ku wa mbere nyuma baza kwemeza imikorere mishya hamwe nâ€™abayobozi ba Amerika.
"Limon yavuze ko ubuyobozi ""bugerageza gukuramo buri kintu cya nyuma mu mutwe wa 42"" kitararangira. "
"Yayise ""gutekereza"" ariko ahuza n'imbaraga z'ubuyobozi kugira ngo ibindi bihugu byo mu gice cy'iburengerazuba bigire uruhare runini mu kwakira abantu bahunga ingo zabo."

Mexico yimuye inkambi y'abimukira; Abanyahayitiya bagaragara kumupaka
Ku wa kabiri, abategetsi ba Mexico bavuze ko bimuye inkambi yâ€™abimukira yavukiye muri parike iri mu mujyi wa Reynosa uhana imbibi, yimura abantu bagera ku 2000 bava muri Amerika yo Hagati na Haiti mu buhungiro mu mujyi, hakurya yâ€™umupaka na McAllen, muri Texas.
Inkambi y'abimukira ahanini baturutse muri Guatemala, El Salvador, Honduras na Haiti imaze kuvuka nyuma yuko abayobozi ba Amerika, bavuga ko iki cyorezo, basabye itegeko ryâ€™ubuzima ryanga abimukira amahirwe yo gusaba ubuhungiro.
Ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe abinjira n'abasohoka muri Mexico cyatangaje ko abimukira bajyanywe mu gicuku cyo ku wa mbere bakajya mu buhungiro, buvuga ko buzagira isuku na serivisi nziza.

Amategeko mashya yo muri Amerika atanga uruhushya rwo gukora rwikora kubaturage
Serivisi ishinzwe abenegihugu nâ€™abinjira nâ€™abasohoka muri Amerika (USCIS) yatangaje ku wa kabiri ko izahita yongerwa iminsi 360 uruhushya rwo gukora rwâ€™abimukira basabye kuvugurura uruhushya rwâ€™akazi mu gihe kiri inyuma mu gihe cyo gutunganya.
Amatangazo mashya yagutse ku iyongerwa ry'iminsi 180 USCIS yatangaje mu Gushyingo. Biteganijwe ko bizabuza abimukira bagera ku 260.000 gutakaza uruhushya rwo gukora mu mezi 18 ari imbere. Bizatanga kandi ikigo cyâ€™inyongera cyo gukuraho abasaba gutegereza umurongo, nkuko byatangajwe nâ€™ikigo.
"Mu ijambo rye, Umuyobozi wa USCIS, Ur M. Jaddou, yagize ati: ""Iri tegeko ryâ€™agateganyo rizaha abo banyagihugu ubundi bemerewe kongererwa mu buryo bwikora amahirwe yo gukomeza akazi no gutanga inkunga ikomeye ku miryango yabo mu gihe birinda ko hajyaho ihungabana ku bakoresha ba Amerika."""
""
Iyongerekana ritangira gukurikizwa ku wa gatatu, rigamije guhuza ibikorwa ku bakoresha ba Amerika no gufasha abantu bafite uburenganzira bwo gutegereza bafite akazi kandi bakorera muri Amerika.
USCIS nicyo kigo gishinzwe gukemura impapuro zâ€™abinjira mu gihugu. Mu myaka yashize, yahanganye n'ibibazo bidasubirwaho, ikibazo cyarushijeho kuba icyorezo cya COVID-19 hamwe no kubura ingengo yimari.
Muri Mata, Jaddou yabwiye abayobozi ba leta zunze ubumwe zâ€™Amerika mu gihe cyâ€™iburanisha ryâ€™inteko ishinga amategeko ko USCIS ifite miliyoni 8.5 zitegereje imanza zâ€™abinjira nâ€™abinjira, harimo nâ€™abashaka amakarita yâ€™icyatsi ndetse nâ€™ubwenegihugu bwa Amerika.
Yavuze ko kimwe cya kabiri cyâ€™izo manza zitarangizwa zafashe igihe kirenze igihe cyâ€™ikigo gisanzwe.
Abasaba ubuhungiro, abimukira bahindura status yabo gutura burundu hamwe nabandi banyagihugu banyura muri gahunda yâ€™abinjira nâ€™abanyamerika bari mu baturage badafite ingaruka ku iyongerwa ryâ€™akazi riheruka.
Ikigo cyari cyatangaje ko igihe cyo gutunganya abasaba ubuhunzi bashaka kuvugurura impushya zo gukora cyiyongereye kuva ku mezi arindwi muri 2017 kigera ku mezi 11 muri 2021.
Muri Werurwe, USCIS yatangaje gahunda yo kugabanya ibirarane, harimo no kwagura progaramu ya progaramu ya progaramu zimwe aho abasaba bashobora kwishyura amafaranga menshi kugirango byihutishe gutunganya impapuro.

Ester Makonokaya, umunyamabanga muri Blantyre, yavuze ko nubwo yamaze kwipimisha, yumva ko kwipimisha virusi itera sida ku nzu n'inzu bizahungabanya ubuzima bwite bw'abantu.

"Macpherson Maulana, umunyamakuru muri Blantyre akaba na progaramu ya radiyo ku buzima, yabwiye Ijwi rya Amerika ko guverinoma izakora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo yigishe Abanya Malawi ko bakeneye kwipimisha virusi itera SIDA kugira ngo abantu bajye kwipimisha bonyine ""badasunitswe."""
Ndatinya ko bishobora kurangira mu mirwano. Urabona ko byabereye muri Liberiya vuba aha aho abantu bari baje gufasha abantu bakekwaho kuba baranduye Ebola ndetse bakicwa. Rero, uburere mboneragihugu ni cyo kintu cy'ingenzi abantu bashishikarizwa kuza hanze yo kwipimisha ku bushake, Maulana.
Icyakora, umujyanama wa virusi itera SIDA, David Odali, umuryango utegamiye kuri Leta Umunthu Foundation ukora imishinga ijyanye na virusi itera SIDA, yashimangiye ko ubuzima bwite buzarindwa.
Amabanga azubahirizwa. Reka dusuzume uko urugo rumeze. Ntekereza ko ikintu cya mbere cyaba ari ugutanga inama mu matsinda ku bagize uwo muryango. [Birumvikana ko] abantu bashobora kwipimisha mu gihe abandi bareba, ariko mu gihe cyo gutangaza ibisubizo. , umujyanama agomba guhishura ibisubizo kuri buri muntu ku giti cye , Odali.

Mu nkingi ye yasohotse mu kinyamakuru Malawis Sunday Times, umwanditsi Grecian Tukula yavuze ko atazi neza impamvu ayo mafaranga yahawe abanyamakuru mu ifunguro rya Leta.

Ariko muri uru rubanza, sinigeze mbona impamvu nkwiye kubona ayo mafaranga kubera ko ntacyo nakoresheje ngo njya i Sanjika [Ingoro] , Kasakula.
Iki kibazo cyashimishije abantu benshi nyuma yâ€™uko abikorera ku giti cyabo Radio Radio yerekanaga inkuru ibaza icyo amafaranga yatanzwe na perezida.
"Nka Capital FM dukorera inyungu za rubanda. Mu nkingi ye mu kinyamakuru Nyasa Times, umwarimu wâ€™amategeko muri Malawi, Danwood Mzikenge Chirwa, yavuze ko ibyo Perezida Mutharika yakoze mu gutanga amafaranga ku banyamakuru mu birori byâ€™amakuru byari bihwanye na ruswa. Yahamagariye Mutharika kwegura cyangwa gukurikiranwa mu nkiko.
"Imiryango itegamiye kuri leta yavuze ko ""mu gushaka guha ruswa abanyamakuru"" Mutharika yakoresheje uburyo bwe bwo kuyobora."
Hagati aho, bamwe mu banyamakuru batanga amafaranga mu gufasha.
Umuyobozi mukuru w'ikinyamakuru Times Group, Brian Ligomeka, yatangarije Televiziyo ya Times ko abakozi bose uko ari bane batanze amafaranga mu kigo cy'imfubyi.
"Ligomeka ati: ""Twabanje gufata icyemezo cyo gusubiza amafaranga perezida ariko nyuma twatekereje ko ari byiza kugura ibintu bitandukanye nk'isukari, umunyu, amakaye maze tukabiha abana batishoboye""."
"Mu kinyamakuru Sunday Times aheruka gusohora, Raphael Tenthani, nawe wandika kuri BBC, yasabye imbabazi mu izina ry'abandi banyamakuru ""kubera ko yaretse rubanda yizera abanyamakuru bidasubirwaho."""
Kuva icyo gihe Tenthani yatanze amafaranga mu bikorwa by'urukundo avuga ko nubwo abanyamakuru bashoboraga gukora neza baramutse basubije amafaranga ako kanya, kubikora byari gufatwa nko gusuzugura umukuru w'igihugu.
Maclan Kanyangwa uyobora ishami ryâ€™itangazamakuru nâ€™ubushakashatsi mu itangazamakuru muri kaminuza ya Polytechnic ya kaminuza ya Malawi, yavuze ko amategeko agenga imyitwarire ibuza abanyamakuru kwakira ubwishyu ku nkuru.
"Ati: ""Biragaragara ko inama yabereye ibwami yari igikorwa cyo gutangaza amakuru. Byashobokaga ko hari ikintu kigiye gutangazwa. Kandi mu gihe aya mafaranga yari kugira uruhare mu cyemezo cy'abanyamakuru [ku rubanza rw'amakuru], noneho biba ikibazo."" Kanyangwa."
Kanyangwa yavuze ko yumva abanyamakuru benshi bananiwe gusubiza amafaranga ako kanya kuko bashobora kuba baravuye mu myitwarire yabo igihe babonye amafaranga.
Imbaraga zo kuvugana nâ€™umuyobozi ushinzwe itangazamakuru rya Perezida Fredrick Ndala ntizagenze neza. Ariko bamwe mu bayobozi ba leta bavuga ko kwishyura atari ruswa ahubwo ko byari bigamije gusubizwa lisansi abitabiriye ibirori bya nijoro.
""
Raporo: Inganda zishobora kuvana ibihugu bikennye mubukene
Raporo nshya yâ€™umuryango wâ€™abibumbye irasaba ibihugu bikennye cyane ku isi kuva mu bikorwa bito bikagera ku musaruro mwinshi kugira ngo ubukungu bwiyongere.
"Muri raporo yâ€™ibihugu byateye imbere cyane cyane, UNCTAD - Inama yâ€™umuryango wâ€™abibumbye ishinzwe ubucuruzi nâ€™iterambere - ivuga ko ibyo bihugu bigomba guhindura imiterere yâ€™ubukungu kugira ngo bikure mu ""mutego wâ€™ubukene,"" bidindiza iterambere ryâ€™ubukungu nâ€™iterambere."
"Mu bihugu 48 Umuryango w'abibumbye ufata ""Ibihugu byateye imbere cyane"" (LDCs), kimwe gusa, Laos, kiri mu nzira zo kugera ku ntego zirindwi z'ikinyagihumbi (MDG) muri 2015."
Ibihugu bine bya Afurika gusa - Etiyopiya, Malawi, u Rwanda na Uganda - birashoboka ko byujuje ibyinshi muri byo.
Iri suzuma rirakaze cyane bitewe nâ€™ibibazo bikomeye bitegereje ibi bihugu mu myaka iri imbere. MDGs yihaye intego ibihugu kugabanya ubukene bwâ€™ubukene bitarenze 2015. Icyiswe intego zâ€™iterambere rirambye, kiva aho MDGs ziva, zirahamagarira guca ubukene mu 2030.
Nkâ€™uko byatangajwe na Taffere Tesfachew, umuyobozi wa UNCTAD ukorana n'ibihugu by'Afurika, nta kintu na kimwe cyaba ari igitangaza kuri LDCs kubikuramo.
Kugirango ibihugu bidateye imbere bigere kuri iyi mikorere yigitangaza, avuga ko bizakenera guhindura imiterere yubukungu.
Abwira IJWI ibi bivuze guhindura imirimo mu bikorwa bifite umusaruro muke, nk'ubuhinzi buciriritse na serivisi ku bikorwa byinshi bifite umusaruro mwinshi, nko gukora na serivisi zifite agaciro kanini.
"Ibihugu byazamutse ni byo bitanga amahirwe ku bava mu buhinzi kwishora mu bintu bongerera agaciro, aho bakura amahugurwa kandi uko bigenda, inganda zikunda kugira ibintu nk'ibyo, niyo mpamvu ibi guhamagarira gukora . ""Ibihugu bikoresha politiki mu guhindura no guhindura igishoro n'umurimo kugira ngo byinjire muri uru rwego rw'ibikorwa usanga bikora neza."""
Tesfachew avuga ko izo nzego zitanga umusaruro mwinshi zikunda kwishyura umushahara munini kandi bigatuma ibicuruzwa bikenerwa. Avuga ko ibi bitera inkunga ishoramari.
Ku isura, bigaragara ko LDC idakora nabi. Amakuru yâ€™ubukungu ya UNCTAD yerekana iterambere muri ibi bihugu bikennye hagati ya 2002 na 2008 yarenze intego irindwi ku ijana yashyizweho nâ€™umuryango mpuzamahanga. Kandi, na nyuma yâ€™ibibazo byâ€™amafaranga yo mu 2008, UNCTAD ivuga ko LDC yazamutse vuba kurusha ibindi bihugu bikiri mu nzira y'amajyambere, ku kigereranyo cya 5.7 ku ijana ku mwaka.
Ariko abahanga mu bukungu bo muri Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika bavuga ko icyerekezo cyâ€™ibihugu bitaratera imbere mu gihe gito kandi giciriritse bikomeje kutamenyekana. Bavuga ko kongera umusaruro wâ€™abaturage aribwo buryo bwiza bwo guca intege iterambere ryâ€™abantu nâ€™ubukungu bikomeje kubashora mu bukene.

Loni: Ibihugu byinshi bya Afrika ntibizagera  ku ntego za MDG 2015
Ibihugu byinshi bya Afrika ntibizagera ku ntego z'ikinyagihumbi zashyizweho muri 2015 kubera itandukaniro riri hagati yâ€™ubukungu nâ€™iterambere ryâ€™abantu. Uyu ni umwe mu myanzuro muri iyi myaka ya buri mwaka raporo yâ€™umuryango wâ€™abibumbye ku bihugu byateye imbere cyane, byatanzwe ku wa kane.
Junior Davis, ushinzwe ibibazo byâ€™ubukungu muri Amerika muri Afurika, yavuze ko ibihugu bya Afurika bitashoboye guhindura ubukungu bwabyo mu guhindura imiterere.
"Davis yagize ati: ""Turatekereza ko aribyo kuko ibyo bihugu bitibanze cyane ku kubaka icyo twita ubushobozi bwabo bwo gutanga umusaruro"". ""Ubu ni bwo bushobozi bwâ€™ibanze bwâ€™iterambere ryâ€™abantu nâ€™ubukungu bukenewe kugira ngo iterambere ryâ€™ubukungu rirambye. Kandi MDG, uko yubatswe, yirengagije ko ari ngombwa guteza imbere ubushobozi butanga umusaruro."""
Buhoro buhoro
Ibihugu bya Afurika nabyo ntabwo biri mu nzira yo kugabanya ubukene bitarenze 2015, kandi iterambere ryabo muri rusange mu kugabanya inzara biratinda. Ubukene bugabanya iterambere ryabantu kandi bigabanya umusaruro. Kandi iterambere ryubukungu rirakenewe kugirango umuntu yunguke iterambere ryabantu.
Etiyopiya, u Rwanda, Uganda na Malawi nicyo gihugu cyonyine cya Afurika kiri mu nzira yo kugera ku ntego nyinshi zâ€™iterambere. Barimo gutera imbere kuko bashora imari mubice bitera iterambere rirambye nkibikorwa remezo, ubuzima nuburezi.
Davis yavuze ko gahunda yâ€™iterambere ryâ€™inyuma ya 2015 ku bihugu byoroshye aho imiyoborere ikomeje kuba ikibazo - nka Sudani y'Amajyepfo na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo - bizaterwa ahanini nâ€™inkunga nâ€™umuryango mpuzamahanga kugira ngo iterambere ryâ€™imibereho nâ€™ubukungu ryiyongere.
"Davis yagize ati: ""Gutezimbere mu cyaro, umusaruro wâ€™inganda, ubuhinzi nâ€™inzego za serivisi muri ibi bihugu bizakenera"" inzira dushobora kugira uburyo bwo kuzamuka butarambye gusa ahubwo bukungahaye ku mirimo. "" ""Kubera ko tubona iterambere ry'imirimo n'akazi ari ingenzi mu ngamba zose z'iterambere zigamije kugabanya ubukene mu buryo burambye."""
Igihugu gishyizwe ku rutonde rwâ€™ibihugu byateye imbere cyane hashingiwe ku musaruro wâ€™umuturage, ubukungu bwifashe nabi, hamwe nâ€™ibipimo byâ€™iterambere ryâ€™abantu nkâ€™ubuzima nâ€™imirire.
Mu bihugu 48 bidateye imbere ku isi, 34 biri muri Afurika. Ibihugu bigaragara ko byateye imbere cyane: Botswana, Cape Verde na Samoa.

kuririmba hirya no hino mu rukiko byahindutse igikorwa cyo kwidagadura ku bakozi bigaragambyaga kuva icyumweru cyatangira. Linley Hebert, umuvugizi wâ€™abakozi bigaragambyaga, yabwiye Ijwi rya Amerika ko iyi myigaragambyo ari ukubera ko guverinoma itubahirije amasezerano ya 2012.
