UMUTWE WA IX: IMARI YA LETA Nâ€™IMISORO 
Ingingo ya 162: Itegeko ryâ€™ingengo yâ€™imari ya Leta
Buri mwaka w'ingengo y'imari ya Leta, Umutwe w'Abadepite usuzuma ishingiro ry'umushinga w'ingengo y'imari ya Leta, ukanatora itegeko riyigenga.
Itegeko ry'ingengo y'imari ya Leta rigena umutungo Leta izinjiza n'uzakoreshwa mu buryo buteganywa n'Itegeko Ngenga. Iryo tegeko ngenga rinagena umunsi ingengo y'imari y'umwaka w`ingengo y`imari izasomwaho imbere y'Imitwe yombi y'Inteko Ishinga Amategeko.
Mbere y'uko ingengo y'imari ya Leta yemezwa burundu, Sena igomba gushyikiriza Umutwe w'Abadepite icyo ivuga ku mushinga w'ingengo y'imari ya Leta.
Ingingo ya 163: Ikoreshwa ryâ€™ingengo yâ€™imari mbere yâ€™uko itegeko ryâ€™ingengo yâ€™imari ritangazwa
Iyo umwaka w'ingengo y'imari utangiye, itegeko ry'ingengo y'imari y'uwo mwaka ritaratangazwa, Minisitiri  w'Intebe, akoresheje iteka, yemera ko hakoreshwa by'agateganyo buri kwezi kimwe cya cumi na kabiri (1/12) cy'ingengo y'imari, ashingiye ku y'umwaka urangiye.
Ingingo ya 164: Ishyirwaho, ihindurwa cyangwa ikurwaho ryâ€™umusoro 
Umusoro ushyirwaho, uhindurwa cyangwa ukurwaho n'itegeko.
Nta sonerwa cyangwa igabanywa ry'umusoro rishobora gukorwa mu gihe bidateganywa n'itegeko.
Ingingo ya 165: Urwego rwâ€™Ubugenzuzi Bukuru bwâ€™Imari ya Leta
Urwego rw'Ubugenzuzi Bukuru bw'Imari ya Leta ni urwego rw'Igihugu rwigenga rushinzwe ubugenzuzi bw'imicungire y'imari n'umutungo bya Leta.
Itegeko rigena inshingano, imitunganyirize n'imikorere by'urwo rwego.
Ingingo ya 166: Raporo yâ€™Umugenzuzi Mukuru wâ€™Imari ya Leta
Urwego rw'Umugenzuzi Mukuru w'Imari ya Leta rushyikiriza Inteko Ishinga Amategeko, Imitwe yombi, raporo yuzuye ku ifoto y'umutungo wa Leta irimo imikoreshereze y'imari ya Leta y'umwaka ushize mbere y'itangira ry'igihembwe cyagenewe gusuzuma ingengo y'imari ya Leta y'umwaka ukurikiye. Iyo raporo igomba kugaragaza uburyo imari yakoreshejwe, amafaranga yakoreshejwe bitari ngombwa cyangwa hadakurikijwe amategeko, kandi niba harabaye inyerezwa cyangwa isesagura ry'umutungo rusange. 
Kopi y'iyo raporo ishyikirizwa Perezida wa Repubulika, Guverinoma, Perezida w'Urukiko rw'Ikirenga n'Umushinjacyaha Mukuru. 
Mu gihe kitarenze amezi atandatu (6), Inteko Ishinga Amategeko imaze gushyikirizwa raporo y'Umugenzuzi Mukuru ivugwa muri iyi ngingo, iyijyaho impaka ikanayifataho ibyemezo bikwiye.
Inzego n'abayobozi bagenerwa kopi ya raporo y'Umugenzuzi Mukuru w'Imari ya Leta bagomba gushyira mu bikorwa ibiyikubiyemo bafata ibyemezo bikwiye, ku makosa n'ibindi bitakurikijwe iyo raporo yerekanye.
Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ishobora gusaba urwo rwego gukora ubugenzuzi bw'imari mu nzego za Leta cyangwa ku mikoreshereze y'amafaranga yatanzwe na Leta.
UMUTWE WA X: AMASEZERANO MPUZAMAHANGA 
Ingingo ya 167: Imishyikirano no kwemeza amasezerano mpuzamahanga 
Perezida wa Repubulika cyangwa undi yabihereye uburenganzira ni we ufite ububasha bwo gukora amasezerano mpuzamahanga no kuyashyiraho umukono. Perezida wa Repubulika niwe ufite ububasha bwo kwemeza burundu amasezerano mpuzamahanga. Iyo amaze kwemezwa, ayo masezerano amenyeshwa Inteko Ishinga Amategeko.
Icyakora, amasezerano mpuzamahanga ajyanye no guhagarika intambara, ay'amahoro, ay'ubucuruzi, ayerekeye imiryango mpuzamahanga, afite ingaruka ku mari ya Leta, ahindura amategeko y'Igihugu cyangwa yerekeye abantu ku giti cyabo ntashobora kwemezwa burundu bitabanje kwemerwa n'Inteko Ishinga Amategeko. 
Amasezerano yo gutanga cyangwa kugurana igice cy'u Rwanda cyangwa se komeka ku Rwanda igice cy'ikindi gihugu ntashobora kwemezwa burundu bitabanje kwemezwa n'Abanyarwanda muri referandumu. 
Perezida wa Repubulika n'Inteko Ishinga Amategeko bamenyeshwa amasezerano mpuzamahanga yose agitegurwa ariko atagomba kwemezwa na Perezida wa Repubulika.
Ingingo ya 168: Agaciro kâ€™amasezerano mpuzamahanga
Iyo amaze gutangazwa mu Igazeti ya Leta, amasezerano mpuzamahanga yemejwe burundu mu buryo buteganywa n'amategeko, agira agaciro nk'ak'andi mategeko akurikizwa mu gihugu hakurikijwe ibiteganywa mu gika cya mbere cy'ingingo ya 95 y'iri Tegeko Nshinga. 
Ingingo ya 169: Amasezerano mpuzamahanga abujijwe
Birabujijwe gukora amasezerano mpuzamahanga yemera gutuza ingabo z'amahanga mu Gihugu. 
Birabujijwe gukora amasezerano mpuzamahanga yemera kunyuza cyangwa kurunda mu Gihugu imyanda ihumanya n'ibindi byose byagira ingaruka zikomeye ku buzima bw'abantu no ku bidukikije. 
Ingingo ya 170: Ivuguruzanya hagati yâ€™amasezerano mpuzamahanga nâ€™Itegeko Nshinga cyangwa Itegeko Ngenga  
Iyo amasezerano mpuzamahanga afite ingingo inyuranyije n'Itegeko Nshinga cyangwa Itegeko Ngenga, ububasha bwo kuyemeza burundu ntibushobora gutangwa Itegeko Nshinga cyangwa iryo tegeko ngenga bitabanje kuvugururwa.
UMUTWE WA XI: INGINGO Zâ€™INZIBACYUHO
Ingingo ya 171: Amategeko asanzwe akurikizwa
Ingingo zose z'Itegeko Nshinga rya Repubulika y'u Rwanda ryo kuwa 4 kamena 2003 n'amavugururwa yaryo yabanjirije iri vugururwa bivanyweho kandi bisimbujwe iri Tegeko Nshinga rivuguruye. Icyakora, abantu batowe cyangwa bashyizweho hakurikijwe manda zishingiye ku ngingo z'Itegeko Nshinga ritaravugururwa kandi batavuzwe mu zindi ngingo z'inzibacyuho z'iri Tegeko Nshinga rivuguruye bakomeza manda batorewe cyangwa bashyiriweho.
Andi mategeko yose asanzwe akurikizwa mbere y'uko iri Tegeko Nshinga rivuguruye ritangira gukurikizwa akomeza kubahirizwa mu ngingo zayo zose zitanyuranyije n'iri Tegeko Nshinga mu ireme ryazo kugeza igihe ayo mategeko ahujwe n'ibiteganywa n'iri Tegeko Nshinga rivuguruye. 
Ingingo ya 172: Perezida wa Repubulika 
Perezida wa Repubulika uri ku buyobozi mu gihe iri Tegeko Nshinga rivuguruye ritangira gukurikizwa akomeza manda yatorewe.
Hatabangamiwe ibiteganywa mu ngingo ya 101 y'iri Tegeko Nshinga, hitawe ku busabe bw'Abanyarwanda bwabaye mbere y'uko iri Tegeko Nshinga rivuguruye ritangira gukurikizwa, bushingiye ku bibazo byihariye u Rwanda rwasigiwe n'amateka mabi rwanyuzemo n'inzira igihugu cyafashe yo kuyivanamo, ibimaze kugerwaho no kubaka umusingi w'iterambere rirambye; hashyizweho manda imwe y'imyaka irindwi (7) ikurikira isozwa rya manda ivugwa mu gika cya mbere cy'iyi ngingo.
Ibiteganywa mu ngingo ya 101 y'iri Tegeko Nshinga bitangira gukurikizwa nyuma ya manda y'imyaka irindwi (7) ivugwa mu gika cya kabiri (2) cy'iyi ngingo.
Ingingo ya 173: Abasenateri 
Abasenateri bari mu myanya igihe iri Tegeko Nshinga rivuguruye ritangira gukurikizwa bakomeza manda batorewe cyangwa bashyiriweho.
Ingingo ya 174: Perezida na Visi Perezida bâ€™Urukiko rwâ€™Ikirenga
Perezida na Visi Perezida b'Urukiko rw'Ikirenga bari ku buyobozi mu gihe iri Tegeko Nshinga rivuguruye ritangira gukurikizwa bakomeza manda bashyiriweho.
UMUTWE WA XII: IVUGURURWA RYâ€™ITEGEKO NSHINGA Nâ€™INGINGO ZISOZA 
Ingingo ya 175: Uburyo bwo kuvugurura Itegeko Nshinga
Ububasha bwo gutangiza ivugurura ry'Itegeko Nshinga bufitwe na Perezida wa Repubulika bimaze kwemezwa n'Inama y'Abaminisitiri; bufitwe kandi na buri Mutwe w'Inteko Ishinga Amategeko binyuze mu itora ku bwiganze bwa bibiri bya gatatu (2/3) by'amajwi y'abawugize.
Ivugururwa ryemezwa ritowe ku bwiganze bwa bitatu bya kane (3/4) by'amajwi y'abagize buri Mutwe w'Inteko Ishinga Amategeko.
Ariko iyo iryo vugururwa ryerekeye manda ya Perezida wa Repubulika, ubutegetsi bwa demokarasi ishingiye ku bitekerezo binyuranye cyangwa ku bwoko bw'ubutegetsi buteganyijwe n'iri Tegeko Nshinga cyane cyane ku butegetsi bwa Leta bushingiye kuri Repubulika n'ubusugire bw'Igihugu, rigomba kwemezwa na referandumu, rimaze gutorwa na buri Mutwe w'Inteko Ishinga Amategeko. 
Nta mushinga w'ivugururwa ry'iyi ngingo ushobora kwakirwa. 
Ingingo ya 176: Gutangira gukurikizwa kwâ€™amategeko
Amategeko n'amateka ntibishobora gutangira gukurikizwa bitabanje gutangazwa mu buryo buteganywa n'amategeko.
Ntawe ushobora kwitwaza ko atazi itegeko iyo ryatangajwe mu buryo buteganywa n'amategeko.
Amategeko gakondo atanditse akomeza gukurikizwa gusa iyo atasimbuwe n'amategeko yanditse kandi akaba atanyuranyije n'Itegeko Nshinga, amategeko, n'amateka cyangwa ngo abe abangamiye uburenganzira bwa Muntu, ituze rusange rya rubanda cyangwa imyitwarire iboneye.
Ingingo ya 177: Igihe iri Tegeko Nshinga ritangira gukurikizwa 
Iri Tegeko Nshinga rivuguruye ryemejwe na referandumu yo ku wa 18/12/2015 ritangira gukurikizwa rimaze gushyirwaho umukono na Perezida wa Repubulika kandi rigatangazwa mu Igazeti ya Leta ya Repubulika y'u Rwanda. 
Kigali, ku wa 24/12/2015

Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda abaturage bafite umuriro wâ€™amashanyarazi bangana na 65%, muri bo 17,8% bakaba bakoresha umuriro ukomoka ku mirasire yâ€™izuba.
U Rwanda rwihaye intego ko mu 2024, buri muturarwanda azaba ashobora gukoresha amashanyarazi yaba afatiye ku muyoboro mugari cyangwa izindi ngufu (amashanyarazi akomoka ku mirasire yâ€™izuba, nyiramugengeri, gaz methane iri mu Kiyaga cya Kivu nâ€™ibindi)
Mu kubigeraho, hashyizwe ingufu nyinshi mu gushyira mu bikorwa ingamba zigamije kongera umuriro nubwo zagiye zikomwa mu nkokora nâ€™icyorezo cya Covid-19. Harimo ishyirwa mu bikorwa ryâ€™imishinga yagutse izatuma igihugu kirushaho kwihaza mu mashyanyarazi.
Muri yo harimo uruganda rwa Hakan Peat to Power rugiye gutangira gutanga amashanyarazi akomoka kuri Nyiramugengeri ruherereye mu Murenge wa Mamba mu Karere ka Gisagara aho mu cyiciro cyarwo cya mbere ruzajya rutanga Megawati 40 ndetse biteganyijwe ko nirumara kuzura neza ruzajya rutanga Megawatt 70.
Hari kandi nâ€™umushinga wâ€™inganda zo ku rwego rwâ€™Akarere zirimo urwa Rusumo ruhuriweho nâ€™u Rwanda, Burundi na Tanzania, uzatanga Megawatt 80, u Rwanda rukabonaho Megawatt 27.
Umushinga wa Rusizi III nawo uri mu izatanga umuriro wâ€™amashanyarazi, akaba ari umushinga u Rwanda ruhuriweho na Repubulika iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo nâ€™u Burundi, ukazatanga Megawatt 200, u Rwanda rukazabonaho Megawatt 67.
Raporo ya Energy Progress Report yerekanye ko kandi u Rwanda rufite umushinga rwatangiye mu 2019, wo guha abaturage umuriro wâ€™amashanyarazi akomoka ku mirasire yâ€™izuba uzatwara miliyoni 45$.
Mu 2000 abari bafite umuriro wâ€™amashanyarazi bari 2%, mu mwaka wa 2010 bageze ku 9%,muri uyu mwaka abagerwaho nâ€™ amashanyarazi ni 65%. Uyu mwaka wa 2021 uzarangira bangana na 71%. Biteganyijwe ko bazaba ari 100% mu 2024.
Ibyo kumenya ku kibazo cyâ€™iterabwoba muri Mozambique cyahagurukije u Rwanda.
Ni ikibazo cyashituye amahanga guhera muri Werurwe uyu mwaka, ubwo izo nyeshyamba ziyitiriye umutwe wa Al Shabab nubwo ntaho bihuriye, zagabaga ibitero mu Mujyi wa Palma zigahitana ubuzima bwâ€™abasaga 12 bishwe bunyamaswa, mu gihe ibihumbi byâ€™abaturage bavuye mu byabo.
Ingabo nâ€™Abapolisi bâ€™u Rwanda bagiye muri Mozambique mbere ho icyumweru ngo hagere izâ€™umuryango wâ€™ibihugu byo mu Majyepfo ya Afurika (SADC) zo zitezweho kuhagera kuwa 15 Nyakanga 2021.
Inshingano ni ugufasha iza Mozambique guhashya ibikorwa byâ€™iterabwoba nâ€™ubugizi bwa nabi mu ntara ya Cabo Delgado.
Uyu mwanzuro ugezweho nyuma yâ€™uruzinduko Perezida Filipe Nyusi yagiriye mu Rwanda muri Mata uyu mwaka, akaganira na Perezida Paul Kagame. Hari amakuru yâ€™uko Nyusi akiva mu Rwanda, hari itsinda ryâ€™abashinzwe umutekano bâ€™u Rwanda bakoreye ingendo muri Cabo Delgado bashaka kumenya neza uko ikibazo giteye.
Igihugu gikungahaye ariko kimaze igihe mu bibazo
Mozambique ni igihugu giherereye mu Majyepfo ashyira Uburasirazuba bwa Afurika gifite ubuso bungana na kilometero kare 801.590 , gikubye u Rwanda inshuro 30.
Gituwe nâ€™abasaga miliyoni 31 aho icyizere cyo kubaho kiri ku myaka 56. Umuturage wacyo umwe abarirwa amadolari 1200 ku mwaka, ni ukuvuga hafi miliyon 1,2 Frw.
Iki gihugu gihana imbibi nâ€™ibindi bitandatu birimo na Tanzania mu Majyaruguru. Gikungahaye ku mutungo kamere urimo amabuye yâ€™agaciro na gaz. Kuba ari igihugu gikora ku nyanja, bigiha amahirwe yâ€™ubucuruzi bukorerwa mu Nyanja yâ€™Abahinde.
Nubwo ari igihugu gifite umutungo, cyakunze guhura nâ€™ibibazo byâ€™umutekano na politiki guhera mu 1975 ubwo cyabonaga ubwigenge. Umutwe wa Renamo utavuga rumwe nâ€™ishyaka Frelimo riri ku butegetsi wakunze gushoza intambara kenshi, gusa Leta ikihagararaho. Kuri ubu impande zombi ziri mu gahenge nyuma yo gusinya amasezerano yâ€™amahoro mu 2019.
Nubwo umwanzi wâ€™igihe kirekire Mozambique yamuciye intege, mu 2017 havutse undi ufite ingufu zidasanzwe. Mu ntara ya Cabo Delgado hadutse umutwe wâ€™iterabwoba wiyise al shabab, nubwo nta mikoranire ufitanye na Al Shabab ya nyayo.
Uwo mutwe watangiye ari inyeshyamba zisanzwe ariko uko iminsi yicuma wagiye ugirana umubano nâ€™imitwe yâ€™iterabwoba mpuzamahanga nka IS yo muri Syria na Iraq.
Ibitero uwo mutwe wagiye ugaba mu Majyaruguru ya Mozambique, wagiye wica abaturage bunyamaswa, ubaciye imitwe nkâ€™uko IS ibigenza. Kugeza muri Mata uyu mwaka, abaturage basaga 3000 bari bamaze kwicwa bunyamaswa mu gihe abasaga ibihumbi 800 bavuye mu byabo.
Umutwe wavutse mu burakari bwâ€™abaturage
Uyu mutwe wakomotse ku burakari bwâ€™abaturage bari bamaze igihe binubira guhezwa no kutitabwaho na Guverinoma, nubwo batuye mu gace kinjiriza Leta akayabo.
Intara ya Cabo Delgado iherereye mu bilometero 1600 uvuye mu Murwa Mukuru Maputo, ikagira ubuso bwa kilometero kare 82.625, bivuze ko ikubye gatatu ubuso bwâ€™u Rwanda. Ni agace gatuwe nâ€™abasaga miliyoni ebyiri.
Iyo ntara ikora kuri Tanzania, ikagira imijyi itatu ikomeye irimo Pemba, Montepuez na Mocimboa da Praia. Uyu wa nyuma ni nawo inyeshyamba zimaze umwaka zigaruriye ku buryo ingabo za Leta zananiwe kubatsimbura.
Kubera gaz nyinshi iboneka muri Cabo Delgado, sosiyete yâ€™Abafaransa Total niyo yahawe ikiraka cyo kuyicukura mu mushinga uzwi nka Liquid Natural Gas (LNG). Ni wo mushinga nkâ€™uwo ufite agaciro kanini muri Afurika kuko ubarirwa miliyari 60 zâ€™amadolari.
Abaturage batangiye binubira ko amafaranga ava muri iyo mishinga ikomeye, atagarurwa mu bikorwa remezo nâ€™iterambere muri Cabo Delgado, bagafata Leta nkâ€™umukoloni ugamije kubanyunyuza gusa. Abarambiwe bafata intwaro.
Izo nyeshyamba ziyise al Shabab, ijambo ryâ€™Icyarabu risobanura â€˜abasoreâ€™. Nubwo biyita izina ryâ€™umutwe wâ€™iterabwoba usanzwe warayogoje amajyaruguru ya Afurika cyane cyane muri Somalia, ntaho bahuriye na mba.
Al Shabab yo muri Mozambique ifitanye umubano nâ€™umutwe wâ€™iterabwoba wa IS ukorera muri Iraq na Syria. Batangiye gukorana na IS mu 2019, kuva ubwo ufatwa nkâ€™ishami ryayo ryo muri Afurika yo hagati, ryiswe Islamic State Central Africa Province (ISCAP).
Ubukana bwawo bwatangiye gushitura amahanga muri Werurwe uyu mwaka ubwo abasaga 12 bicwaga mu gitero cyagabwe mu Mujyi wa Palma. Mu bishwe harimo nâ€™abanyamahanga bituma byinshi mu bikorwa byâ€™amahanga muri ako gace bifunga imiryango harimo nâ€™umushinga wa Total.
Kuki ingabo za Leta zitabaje amahanga ?
Inyeshyamba zayogoje Amajyaruguru ya Mozambique zikomeye cyane mu bijyanye nâ€™ibikoresho ariko inzobere mu bya gisirikare zivuga ko zifite imyitozo ihagije cyane cyane mu mirwano ibera mu duce twâ€™imijyi dutuwe.
Ni urubyiruko kandi ruterwa akanyabugabo nâ€™inyigisho zâ€™amahame akaze yâ€™idini ya Islam nâ€™ubuhezanguni bigishwa nâ€™indi mitwe yâ€™iterabwoba ikomeye ku Isi.
Icyakora, igisirikare cya Mozambique nacyo kivugwaho intege nke haba mu bikoresho no mu bumenyi bwatuma babasha gusubiza inyuma inyeshyamba nkâ€™izo, nubwo hari andi makuru avuga ko muri Cabo Delgado Leta itakunze koherezayo abasirikare bafite imyitozo ihagije.
Brigadier Ben Barry wo mu kigo International Institute for Strategic Studies (IISS), yigeze kubwira BBC ko ikindi kigora ingabo za Leta ari amayeri yâ€™inyeshyamba za IS mu kurwanira ahantu hatuye abantu benshi nko mu mijyi, ari nabyo Al Shabab ya Mozambique yatangije mu duce nka Palma na Mocimboa da Praia.
Yagize ati â€œKugira ngo utsinde mu ntambara yo mu mujyi bisaba ko ingabo za Guverinoma zigira imyitozo nâ€™imiyoborere yo ku rwego rwo hejuru. Ibyo nibyo bigaragaza intege nke zâ€™ingabo za Mozambique. Bafite ikibazo cyo kutabona abajyanama bâ€™inzobere mu bya gisirikare ndetse nâ€™ubushobozi bwo kurwanira mu kirere, intwaro zikomeye nâ€™imodoka zâ€™intambara.â€
Guverinoma ya Mozambique imaze kubona ko yugarijwe, mu mpera zâ€™umwaka ushize yahaye ikiraka abajyanama 200 mu bya gisirikare bo mu kigo kigenga cyo mu Burusiya, Wagner Group.
Iyo mikoranire yatangiye muri Nzeri 2020 nyuma yo guhabwa umugisha na Leta yâ€™u Burusiya. Benshi mu bahawe icyo kiraka, bahoze mu mutwe udasanzwe wâ€™ingabo zâ€™u Burusiya.
Ubudahangarwa bari bazanye bwashize ubwo bagabwaho ibitero bitandukanye nâ€™inyeshyamba zigahitana bamwe muri bo, biba ngombwa ko babivamo.
Muri Werurwe, igisirikare cya Amerika cyohereje itsinda ryâ€™abasirikare bo mu ngabo zidasanzwe bajya gutoza abo muri Mozambique. Portugal nayo yohereje abasirikare bake bo gutoza ingabo za Leta.
Mu ntangiriro, ntabwo Leta ya Mozambique yifuzaga ingabo zâ€™amahanga ku butaka bwayo ariko uko ikibazo cyarushagaho gukomera, byabaye ngombwa ko iva ku izima. Mu byo yatinyaga mbere, harimo kuba ubusugire bwayo bwavogerwa nâ€™ishusho mbi bizayisigira mu mahanga.
Icyakora mu kwezi gushize ubwo igihugu cyizihizaga umunsi wâ€™ubwigenge, Perezida Nyusi yavuze ko ingabo za SADC nâ€™izâ€™ibihugu byâ€™inshuti zizabafasha guhashya inyeshyamba, gusa yizeza ko nta kindi bazakora kirenze kubafasha kugarura umutekano muri Cabo Delgado.
Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa SADC, Stergomena Lawrence Tax, aherutse kuvuga ko ingabo zizajya muri Mozambique zizaba zifite inshingano zo kubungabunga amahiro nâ€™umutekano, kurinda abaturage.
Kuwa Gatatu tariki 7 Nyakanga, Tax yandikiye Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Loni, Antonio Guterres amumenyesha ibyâ€™ingabo za SADC zigiye gufasha iza Mozambique guhangana nâ€™imitwe yâ€™iterabwoba.
Tax yavuze ko izo ngabo zizatangira imirimo yazo tariki 15 Nyakanga zikahamara amezi atatu ashobora kongerwa bitewe nâ€™uko ibintu bizaba byifashe.
Ntabwo umubare wâ€™ingabo zizoherezwa nâ€™ibihugu bya SADC bizabohereza biramenyekana, gusa muri Mata hari raporo yâ€™impuguke zâ€™uwo muryango yagiye hanze, igaragaza ko hakenewe ingabo 3000 zo kohereza muri Cabo Delgado.
Izo ngabo zizaba zifite inshingano zo gufasha Mozambique kurwanya iterabwoba nâ€™ibikorwa byâ€™ubuhezanguni muri iyo ntara.
Tariki 28 Kamena, Inama yâ€™Abaminisitiri ya SADC yemeje ingengo yâ€™imari ya miliyari 12 zâ€™amadolari azakoreshwa nâ€™Umutwe wâ€™ingabo zidasanzwe zâ€™uwo muryango muri Mozambique. Ayo mafaranga bavuze ko agomba kuboneka bitarenze tariki 9 Nyakanga 2021.
Raporo yâ€™impuguke za SADC zabanje kujya gukora isesengura muri Cabo Delgado, yagaragaje ko kugira ngo Mozambique ibashe gutsinda intambara zisubirane umujyi wa Macimboa da Praia, bakeneye ibikoresho, ubutasi bukomeye nâ€™ingabo zihagije.
Iyo raporo yavuze ko hakenewe ingabo zo mu mutwe udasanzwe zihangana nâ€™ibitero byâ€™inyeshyamba zinjirira mu nyanja yâ€™Abahinde, ubwato bugendera munsi yâ€™amazi, ingabo zirwanira mu kirere, kajugujugu esheshatu zâ€™intambara, indege enye zitwara ibikoresho, ubwato bubiri bushinzwe gucunga na drones ebyiri zâ€™ubutasi.
Ntabwo Mozambique iratangaza uburyo izo ngabo za SADC zizakorana nâ€™izivuye mu bindi bihugu birimo u Rwanda rwamaze kohereza izarwo. Inshingano zihariye za buri ngabo nazo ntabwo zirashyirwa hanze .
Intambara irenze iyâ€™amasasu
Kubera agace intara ya Cabo Delgado iherereyemo no kuba ikora ku nyanja, yakunze kuba icyambu cyâ€™ubucuruzi bwa magendu burimo ibiyobyabwenge, icuruzwa ryâ€™abantu nâ€™ibindi birimo nâ€™ingingo zâ€™abantu.
Urugero, abantu bishwe muri Palma muri Werurwe uyu mwaka, bagiye bagaragara ingingo zabo zimwe zirimo nâ€™imitwe nta yiriho, bigakekwa ko yagiye ijyanwa kugurishwa.
Kubera ko iyo ntara iri kure yâ€™umurwa mukuru no kuba Leta itarakunze kuhitaho cyane, byagiye bituma ruswa iba nyinshi hagati yâ€™abayobozi bâ€™inzego zâ€™ibanze nâ€™abanyabyaha bakorera muri ako gace ari nabyo byorohereza inyeshyamba.
Icyakora hari abasesenguzi babona ikibazo cya Cabo Delgado nkâ€™ikitazakemurwa nâ€™intambara kurusha amayeri yo kwigarurira abaturage.
Tekiniki inyeshyamba zo muri Mozambique zikoresha zigaba ibitero, niyo ikoreshwa na IS yo kwica bunyamaswa abasivile. Ibyo bitandukanye nâ€™amayeri nka Al Qaeda ikoresha yo kurobanura ikamenya abo yica nâ€™abo itica kuko gukomera kwayo gushingira ku mubano mwiza nâ€™abaturage bâ€™agace yagezemo.
Ikigaragaza ko nta mpuhwe inyeshyamba za Mozambique zifitiye abaturage, ni ubugome bakoresha mu kubica kugeza nkâ€™aho mu gitero cyo muri Werurwe, bishe umwana wâ€™imyaka 11 bakamwicira mu maso ya nyina.
BBC yatangaje ko byakorohera Leta kumvisha abaturage ububi bwâ€™uwo mutwe ariko ikabijyanisha no kubaha ibyo basabaga ubwo batangiraga kwivumbura. Ibyo abatuye Cabo Delgado basabaga ni uguhabwa ibikorwa ibikorwa byâ€™iterambere nkâ€™amashuri, imihanda, imirimo nâ€™ibindi bituma babona ko bitaweho.
Ibyo ngo bizatuma bagarukira Leta. Urugero rutangwa ni urwo mu 2007 ubwo umutwe wa Al Qaeda wakoraga amakosa utera ubwoba abaturage bâ€™aba-Sunni mu ntara ya Anbar muri Iraq.
Icyo gihe abagabo bo muri ako gace batangiye gutotezwa nâ€™inyeshyamba, baba bakoze amakosa yoroheje nko kunywa itabi, bagacibwa intoki. Byarakaje abaturage, byorohera ingabo za Leta zibifashijwemo nâ€™igisirikare cya Amerika kwigarurira imitima yâ€™abaturage.
Byatumye abaturage bahindukirana al Qaeda barayamagana, aho umusirikare wayo anyuze bagatunga agatoki ku buryo uwo mutwe watsinsuwe mu buryo bworoshye.
Huye: Miliyoni 98 Frw zimaze gucibwa abarenze ku mabwiriza yo kwirinda Covid-19.
Umuyobozi wâ€™Akarere ka Huye, Sebutege Ange, yavuze ko muri rusange abanye-Huye bubahiriza amabwiriza yashyizweho yo kwirinda Covid-19 ariko hari abagiye bafatwa bayarenzeho, bahabwa ibihano. Bose hamwe bamaze gucibwa amande agera kuri miliyoni 98 Frw.
Ati â€œKuva Covid-19 yagera mu Rwanda abarenze ku mabwiriza bamaze gucibwa amande angana nâ€™amafaranga miliyoni 98 Frw. Ayo ni amafaranga baba bakwiye gukoresha mu bibateza imbere ariko kubera kutubahiriza amabwiriza, ibihano bigomba kubaho.â€
Sebutege yavuze ko ikigamijwe atari uguhana ahubwo ari ugukangurira abantu kwirinda icyorezo no kubibutsa ko icya mbere ari ukugira ubuzima bwiza.
Yavuze ko kugeza kuri uyu wa Gatatu imibare igaragaza ko abafite ubwandu bwa Covid-19 mu Karere ka Huye ari abantu 127 naho abo imaze guhitana ari 19.
Abahanwe ni abafatiwe mu makosa arimo gufungura utubari, gucururiza inzoga muri restaurant bakazihindura utubari, gutinda gutaha ku masaha yagenwe, kwambara nabi agapfukamunwa, gukora ibirori bitemewe, guhindura ingo utubari nâ€™andi.
Sebutege yongeye gusaba abaturage gushyira mu bikorwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda icyo cyorezo kuko ari yo ntwaro yonyine ihari muri iki gihe yo kugitsinda.
Kuri ubu mu Karere ka Huye Abajyanama bâ€™Ubuzima bari gusura ingo zose bareba niba hari ufite ibimenyetso bya Covid-19 kugira ngo yisuzumishe amemye uko ahagaze.
Hafashwe umwanzuro ko urugo rubonetsemo uwanduye, abarubamo bose basabwa kwishyira mu kato kugeza igihe bisuzumishirije.
Abarwariye mu ngo basabwe gukomeza gukurikiza amabwiriza bahawe na muganga, ubuyobozi bubizeza ko abafite ubushobozi budahagije bwo kubaho buzajya bubunganira.

Dore bimwe mu byaranze uyu munsi

Abagabo bashya bakorewe ihohoterwa bagasigirwa ibimenyetso byaryo ku mubiri [aha ni nko gukomeretswa] bangana na 6.113 mu gihe abakorewe ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina ari 1097.
Mu buryo bwâ€™impurirane abagizweho ingaruka nâ€™ibikorwa byâ€™ihohoterwa mu muryango Nyarwanda [ni ukuvuga ubariyemo abagabo nâ€™abagore] ni 56.019 hagati ya 2016 na 2019.
Abagabo barikandagira mu gutanga ubuhamya ku ihohoterwa
Benshi mu bagabo nâ€™abahungu bakorerwa ihohoterwa batinya kuvuga kubera gutinya uko bakirwa na sosiyete ndetse nâ€™abatoboye rimwe na rimwe baba bafite impungenge ko nta wuzabatega amatwi.

Nduwamungu Bosco wo mu Murenge wa Karangazi yavuze ku ihohoterwa yakorewe nâ€™umugore we wamuhozaga ku nkeke.
Ati â€œNagerageje kubana nâ€™umugore neza arananira, yarankubise inshuro nkâ€™eshatu, nagerageza kujya mu buyobozi bwâ€™umudugudu bati â€˜wowe nta jambo ufiteâ€™, nabwo mvuyeyo umugore arankubita.â€

Ati â€œNagiye mu buyobozi ndatsindwa, amafuti bakayangerekaho mera nkâ€™isaha ivuye ku gihe, ndahukana mva mu rugo. Umugore nâ€™iyo yagubita nyine ntaho wajya kurega, uremera ukaryumaho kuko uwo urega ni we uregera.â€
Ihohoterwa ni igikorwa cyose gikorewe umuntu atabishaka kikaba gishobora kumugiraho ingaruka ku mubiri, mu bitekerezo cyangwa ku buryo bushingiye ku gitsina.
Umuyobozi wâ€™Umuryango uharanira guteza imbere Uburinganire no kurwanya Ihohoterwa rishingiye ku Gitsina (RWAMREC), Rutayisire FidÃ¨le, yabwiye IGIHE ko bemeranya nâ€™imibare yatangajwe ku bagabo nâ€™abahungu bahohoterwa ariko ari mike bitewe no kuba hari abatavuga.
Ati â€œTurakangurira abagabo kudahishira ibyabayeho kuko abenshi banga kuvuga ibyababayeho kubera ko batabona ubufasha, barasekwa bagashyirwa mu kato kuko bazi ko umugabo ahohotera, adahohoterwa. Nkâ€™uko dushyira imbaraga mu kurwanya ihohoterwa rikorerwa abagore nâ€™abakobwa, dukeneye imbaraga mu kurwanya irikorerwa abagabo nâ€™abahungu.â€™â€™
Yavuze ko sosiyete imenyereye ko ihohoterwa rikorerwa abagore ndetse umuco utuma abagabo batavuga akaga bahuye na ko.

COVID-19 yongereye ibinyoro mu bibembe?
Umuryango uri mu byiciro byahungabanyijwe bikomeye nâ€™icyorezo cya Covid-19 ahanini kubera ingamba zashyizweho mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ryacyo, aho igihugu cyafashe ibyemezo birimo Guma mu Rugo, kugabanya amasaha yo gutaha nâ€™izindi.
Izi ngamba zose zatumye ababana barushaho kumarana umwanya munini, yewe no kumenyana byimbitse ku buryo hari ababonye ibyo batamenye ku bo basangiye indaro, abâ€™imitima yoroshye bigasembura amarangamutima yabyaye amacakubiri, ari na yo ntandaro yâ€™ihohoterwa.
Kuva COVID-19 yagera mu Rwanda, RWAMREC yakoze ubushakashatsi muri gahunda yayo yise â€œBandeberehoâ€ aho yasanze hari aho ihohoterwa ryiyongereye nâ€™aho ryagabanutse.
Ati â€œAbitabiriye gahunda ya â€˜Bandeberehoâ€™ bashoboye kubana neza nâ€™imiryango yabo kandi ihohoterwa ryaragabanutse muri iyo miryango ariko aho itarashoboye kwitabira ayo matsinda kubera COVID-19, ihohoterwa ryariyongereye kandi amakimbirane na yo ariyongera. Bishingiye ku kuba abagabo bari batunze ingo zabo babuze imirimo yabatungaga hanyuma bibongerera guhangayika, ihohoterwa rirazamuka, cyane irishingiye ku mutima kubera kudashobora kubahiriza inshingano zimwe na zimwe.â€™â€™
Inyigo yakorewe mu Turere ka Kicukiro na Huye mu 2020 yagaragaje ko imyumvire ku ihohoterwa rikorerwa abagabo nâ€™abahungu ikiri hasi cyane.
Kayisire yagize ati â€œUmugabo iyo afashwe ku ngufu cyangwa umuhungu agasambanywa nâ€™umugore usanga abantu babifashe nkâ€™ishyano; ntibabyihanganire kurusha uko umukobwa afatwa ku ngufu.â€™â€™
RWAMREC yakira abagabo bayigana ikabaha ubufasha bwâ€™ubujyanama nâ€™aho bakurikiranira ibibazo byabo. Nibura mu kwezi kumwe, uyu muryango wakira abari hagati ya 7-10 mu Mujyi wa Kigali bavuga ku ihohoterwa bakorewe.
Ingamba zafashwe mu guhangana nâ€™ihohoterwa ryo mu muryango
Nubwo nta mibare yerekana ubukana bwâ€™ikibazo cyâ€™ihohoterwa hagati yâ€™abashakanye nibura kuva mu mezi arenga 15 ashize COVID-19 igeze mu Rwanda, ubuhamya bwa benshi bugusha ku kuba hari aho umuriro watse.
Minisitiri wâ€™Uburinganire nâ€™Iterambere ryâ€™Umuryango (MIGEPROF), Prof Bayisenge Jeannette, yabwiye IGIHE ko hari ibibazo byari mu muryango Nyarwanda iki cyorezo cyatije umurindi.
Yagize ati â€œAmakimbirane yakomeje kuvugwa haba mu Rwanda no ku Isi muri rusange, yagiye yiyongera hariho nâ€™ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina. No mu Rwanda ibyo byabayeho. Nubwo twebwe tutavuga ngo byanze bikunze imibare yarazamutse ariko twakomeje kubona iryo hungabana ryâ€™uburenganzira bwa muntu cyane cyane irishingiye ku gitsina.â€™â€™

Imibare ya NISR igaragaza ko mu 2015, hakiriwe dosiye 669 zijyanye no gukubita no gukomeretsa, 89 zâ€™ubwicanyi na 23 zijyanye no kwiyahura. Mu 2016, dosiye zakiriwe ni 641 zo gukubita no gukomeretsa, izâ€™ubwicanyi ni 97 mu gihe izo kwiyahura ari 17.
Mu 2017 kqndi hakiriwe dosiye 784 zo gukubita no gukomeretsa, 86 zâ€™ubwicanyi na zirindwi zo kwiyahura. Mu 2018 yakiriye dosiye 979 zo gukubita no gukomeretsa, 95 zâ€™ubwicanyi mu gihe izo kwiyahura ari 24.
Ni icyemezo ahanini gifitanye isano nâ€™umuco wâ€™igihugu aho umuntu yumva ko kuba umugabo yavuga ko yakubiswe nâ€™umugore we cyangwa agakorerwa ibindi bikorwa bibabaza umubiri we byabaga ari nkâ€™ikinegu muri rubanda; ko yafatwa nkâ€™udashoboye cyangwa inganzwa.

Inzu yagurishijwe iherereye mu Karere ka Muhanga mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyepfo yagombaga kugurwa miliyoni 22 zâ€™amafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda nyamara ibya ngombwa berekanaga byari ibihimbano. Umwe muri bo yiyitaga ko ari nyirayo naho abandi bakigira abakomisiyoneri.
Bafashwe basigaje guhabwa miliyoni zirindwi nâ€™igice. Uko ari batanu bemeye ibyaha baregwa banabisabira imbabazi kuri uyu Gatanu tariki ya 9 Nyakanga 2021.
Umwe yagize ati â€œNdi hano kubera ko nafatiwe mu cyaha cyo kugurisha inzu itari iyanjye, umushinga wateguwe na mugenzi wanjye ariko ndabisabira imbabazi.â€

Uwineza Ange uvuka mu muryango wari watanze amafaranga ugura inzu, we yashimiye RIB anashimangira ko iyo itahaba batari kuzongera kubona abo batekamutwe.
Ati â€œUmwe muri bo yari inshuti yâ€™umuryango, ni na we waje aturangira iyo nzu mu rugo. Bayisuye kabiri noneho njye nagiyeyo bwa nyuma ni bwo nasanze banyirayo bahari batwereka ko ari iyabo nâ€™ibyangombwa dusanga bitandukanye nâ€™ibyo aba bari batweretse.â€

Ati â€œTwahise tubibwira RIB noneho ikajya ibahamagara telefone ntiboneke nyuma nibwo yabahamagaye baza baziko tugiye kubishyura andi ihita ibafata.â€

Ati â€œBafashwe mu gikorwa cyo kugurisha inzu itari iyabo bakaba bakurikiranywe ibyaha bine birimo gushyiraho umutwe wâ€™abagizi ba nabi no kuwujyamo, kwihesha ikintu cyâ€™undi hakoreshejwe uburiganya, icyo guhimba, guhindura inyandiko cyangwa gukoresha inyandiko mpimbano ndetse hakanazamo nâ€™icyaha cyo kwigana, guhindura amafaranga cyangwa ibyitiranwa na yo.â€
Yasabye abaturage kujya bagura ibintu babanje gushishoza no kwishyurira abantu kuri banki kuko bituma imyirondoro yabo imenyekana anashimangirako ko amafaranga bari bahawe yagarujwe ndetse nâ€™ibintu bari bayaguzemo byafatiriwe.
Ahahoze Kaminuza ya Kibungo hashobora gutangira irindi shuri rikuru vuba.
Ibi bije nyuma yaho iyi kaminuza ifungiwe igateza ibihombo ku baturage bakodeshaga inzu abanyeshuri bayigagamo nâ€™ubucuruzi busubira inyuma mu gace yari iherereyemo.
Umuhoza Oliver utuye mu Mudugudu wa Gatare mu Kagari ka Karenge munsi yâ€™ahakoreraga iyi kaminuza yabwiye IGIHE ko kuva bayifunga bagize igihombo gikomeye cyane.
Yavuze ko ubundi hahoraga urujya nâ€™uruza rwâ€™abanyeshuri baguraga ibintu byinshi, abanyonzi, abamotari, abacuruzi nâ€™abafite inzu zikodeshwa ubu ngo abenshi barahimutse kubera kubura abakiriya bituma muri uyu Mudugudu hakonja cyane.
Ati â€œNko kuri njye ndi umwe mu bacuruzi, igihombo cya mbere nagize ni uguhomba abaturanyi kuko baradususurutsaga, igihombo cya kabiri nahombye abakiriya bituma ubucuruzi bwanjye busubira inyuma, ikindi hari bagenzi banjye bari bafite inzu bakodesha ariko kugeza kuri iyi saha ntizigikodeshwa kuko abazibagamo ni abanyeshuri ubu babuze abandi bakiriya.â€
Umuyobozi wâ€™Akarere ka Ngoma wungirije ushinzwe Iterambere ryâ€™Ubukungu, Nyiridandi Mapambano Cyriaque yavuze ko hari ibiganiro bari kugirana nâ€™andi mashuri kugira ngo aze kuhakorera kandi ngo ibyo biganiro biri kugenda neza.
Ati â€œHari ibiganiro byatangiye tubifashijwemo nâ€™ubuyobozi bwâ€™Intara hamwe na Minisiteri yâ€™Uburezi kugira ngo hariya yakoreraga harebwe ikintu cyahakorerwa ariko kijyanye nâ€™uburezi, twakwizeza abaturage ko igisubizo kiri gushakwa kandi kizaboneka mu minsi ya vuba.â€
Mapambano yavuze ko hashobora kugaruka kaminuza nubwo yaba ititwa UNIK ariko ko rizaba ari ishuri kandi rizatanga ubumenyi kuri benshi ryongere no gushyushya aka Karere.
Kaminuza ya UNIK yatangijwe mu mwaka wa 2003 ni imwe mu zagiriye umumaro abigaga uburezi kuko yabafashije mu kubigisha mu biruhuko, mu mpera zâ€™icyumweru ndetse no mu mibyizi, nyuma yâ€™igihe gito yaje gufungura ishami mu Karere ka Rulindo ryafashaga abaturuka mu Burengerazuba nâ€™Amajyaruguru.

Itangazo rya Minisante rikomeza riti â€œTwihanganishije imiryango yâ€™abagore barindwi bâ€™imyaka 91 (Ngororero), 73, 58 (Rubavu), 61, 36, 19 (Kigali), 58 (Musanze) nâ€™abagabo icyenda bâ€™imyaka 73, 62, 44 (Rubavu), 71 (Ngororero), 69, 35 (Musanze), 59 (Nyagatare) 52, 47 (Kigali).â€™â€™
Abahitanywe na COVID-19 batumye umubare wâ€™abamaze kwicwa nâ€™iki cyorezo kuva cyagera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020 bagera kuri 507.
Ni ku nshuro ya mbere mu Rwanda habonetse umubare munini wâ€™abahitanwe na COVID-19 [16] mu munsi umwe kuko abenshi baherukaga kuboneka ari 12, batangajwe ku wa 6 Nyakanga 2021.
Kuri uyu munsi, abarwayi 760 ni bo banduye COVID-19 mu bipimo 7.846 byafashwe. Abarwayi bashya babonetse muri Kigali: 330, Musanze: 65, Kamonyi: 52, Gicumbi: 38, Rubavu: 37 mu gihe Uturere twa Gisagara, Ruhango, Kirehe na Ngoma nta bwandu bushya bwahabonetse.
Kuri ubu mu gihugu hose abamaze kwandura COVID-19 ni 45.039 mu bipimo 1.691.850 bimaze gufatwa.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu hakize abarwayi 816 byatumye abakize bagera ku 29.207 mu gihe 15.325 bakirwaye, muri bo 67 bakaba barembye.
Kuva ibikorwa byo gukingira COVID-19 bitangiye mu Rwanda, abaturage 392.003 bahawe urukingo. Abantu 252.008 ni bo bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri yâ€™urukingo rwa AstraZeneca barimo 45 bayihawe uyu munsi.
Abagore bitabira serivisi zo kuboneza urubyaro mu Rwanda bageze kuri 64%.
Muri ubu bushakashatsi bwakozwe mu 2019/2020, NISR, igaragaza ko abagore 34% bifuza kuzongera kubyara nyuma yâ€™igihe runaka, naho 3% ari ingumba, mu gihe 10% bifuzaga kubyara mu gihe cya vuba, 2% bo nta mwanzuro bafashe.
Abaturage byâ€™umwihariko abagore baganiriye na RBA, bavuze ko zimwe mu mpamvu zatumye bafata icyemezo cyo kurekeraho kubyara ari uko ubuzima bugoye mu bijyanye no kubona ubushobozi cyangwa imibereho.
Uwitwa Uhoranimpuhwe Ruth utuye mu Karere ka Rwamagana, avuga ko we nâ€™umugabo we bafite abana babiri aho umwe afite imyaka icyenda, undi umwaka nâ€™igice, bombi bavuga ko bafashe icyemezo cyo kuboneza urubyaro.
Ati â€œUbu ngubu nafashe agashinge kâ€™amezi atatu, nta kibazo rero njyewe biramfasha.â€
Bamwe mu batuye mu Mujyi wa Kigali ubuzima bugoye ari nayo mpamvu bahisemo kuboneza urubyaro abandi bifungisha burundu kubera ko ikiguzi cyâ€™umwana kiri hejuru cyane.
Umwe yagize ati â€œIcyatumye mboneza urubyaro, abana batandatu mu Mujyi wa Kigali, inzu ndayikodesha no kubahahira ibyo kurya [â€¦] ni abo nta bandi. Mugenzi we yagize ati â€œNjyewe naraboneje! Mfite agapira kâ€™imyaka itanu mu kuboko kwanjye, ngomba kuboneza kuko ba bana batatu, Imana imbabariye rwose nanarekera abo ngabo.â€
Hirya no hino mu gihugu mu bigo nderabuzima hari serivisi zo kuboneza urubyaro zihatangirwa ndetse hakaba nâ€™izindi zitangwa nâ€™abajyanama bâ€™ubuzima ku buryo ababyeyi baje kwisuzumisha inda ndetse nâ€™abaje gukingiza abana bose bakangurirwa kuboneza urubyaro ku bushake.
Umuyobozi wâ€™Ikigo Nderabuzima cya Nyagasambu, Bihibindi Jean Christophe, avuga ko byibuze nka 60% byâ€™abakanguriwe bahita bafata umwanzuro.
Ati â€œAbatashye bataboneje, iyo amaze kwemera uburyo yazakoresha amaze kubyara, iyo yabyaye bwa buryo arabutahana.â€
Yakomeje agira ati â€œAriko hari nâ€™abavuga bati njyewe nazaza nje gukingiza noneho muri gahunda yo gukingiza, tugira uburyo bwo kwigisha ababyeyi noneho ababishaka bagataha uburyo bwo kuboneza urubyaro.â€
Ni ibyo kwishimira?
Abahanga mu birebana nâ€™ubwiyongere bwâ€™abantu nâ€™iterambere ryabo, bemeza ko ibi biterwa nâ€™izamuka ryâ€™imyumvire igihugu gikeneye kubakiraho iterambere ryâ€™abagituye, bitewe nâ€™uko ubwiyongere bukabije bwâ€™abaturage butakijyanye nâ€™ubushobozi bwâ€™igihugu.
Ibi kandi ngo bigira ingaruka mbi ku mibereho yâ€™abaturage muri rusange.
Impuguke mu birebana nâ€™Ubwiyongere bwâ€™Abaturage nâ€™Iterambere ryabo akaba nâ€™Umwarimu muri Kaminuza yâ€™u Rwanda, Dr. Ignace Kabano, avuga ko iki kigero cyâ€™abagore baboneza urubyaro ari ikigero igihugu cyakwishimira bitewe nâ€™inyungu zirimo.
Yagize ati â€œIgihugu kibaho kigizwe nâ€™abaturage, iterambere ryabo cyangwa ibyo igihugu kinjiza [umusaruro mbumbe wâ€™igihugu] bituruka ku bikorwa cyangwa imirimo yâ€™abaturage. Igihe abaturage batangiye kuringaniza imbyaro bagana mu cyerekezo cyâ€™ibikenewe mu muryango, ni inyungu ku gihugu. Ni ibyo kwishimira muri rusange.â€
â€œIkindi cya kabiri, bigaragaza ko abaturage, izo serivisi zibafasha kuringaniza urubyaro bazigeraho ni ukuvuga ngo ushatse kwifungisha abona iyo serivisi. Ushatse gushyira intera hagati yâ€™urubyaro nâ€™urundi cyangwa inda nâ€™indi arayibona.â€
Imibare ya NISR igaragaza ko hakurikijwe uburumbuke mu Rwanda, abagore bo mu mijyi, nibura umwe abarirwa abana 3.4, naho uwo mu cyaro bakaba 4.3.
Ni mu gihe mu 2005 umugore ugejeje igihe cyo kubyara yabarirwaga abana batandatu, mu 2014/2015 uwo mubare wari ugeze ku bana 4.2 ku mugore naho mu 2019/2020 bagera ku bana bane ku mugore.
Iyi mibare yerekana kandi ko abatagerwaho na serivisi zo kuboneza urubyaro bavuye kuri 39% mu 2005, bagera kuri 14% mu 2019/2020. Abagore bakoresha uburyo bwo kuboneza urubyaro mu 2019-2020 bari 64%.
Huye: Mu bagera ku 127 banduye Covid-19, abarenga 60 bari mu Murenge umwe.

Hafashwe ingamba ko iyo hari urugo rubonetsemo uwanduye, abarurimo bose basabwa kwishyira mu kato kugira ngo babanze basuzumwe.
Bamwe mu bakorera ubucuruzi mu duce twiganjemo Covid-19 babwiye IGIHE ko na bo bari gukora ibishoboka byose ngo birinde barinda nâ€™abakiriya babo kuko iyo imibare izamutse bibagiraho ingaruka mbi.

U Rwanda rwiteguye rute?

U Bushinwa bwashyizwe ku rutonde rwâ€™ibihugu bitakirangwamo malaria.
Kuva mu myaka ya 1940, abantu miliyoni 30 barwaraga malaria buri mwaka muri iki gihugu. Ibintu byatumye gishyira imbaraga mu kuyirwanya cyivuye inyuma, gitera kenshi imiti yica udukoko ahantu hose, gitanga inzitiramibu zirimo umuti ndetse no gutanga imiti ivura malaria.

Ibihugu biheruka gushyirwa kuri uru rutonde ni Argentine, AlgÃ©rie ndetse na Uzbekistan.
Malaria ni indwara izahaza uyirwaye, igira ibimenyetso birimo umuriro, kubabara umutwe, kumva ukonje mu mubiri ndetse no gucika intege. Kugeza ubu iravurwa igakira nubwo hari abo igihitana.

Abantu icyenda bahitanywe na Coronavirus mu Rwanda.
Muri raporo ngarukamunsi ya Minisante hagaragajwe ko mu masaha 24 ashize abamaze kwandura bageze ku 36.627 kubera 741 bashya babonetse, naho abakize biyongeraho 113 bagera ku 27.090.

Menya ibihugu 11 bimaze kubonekamo Delta Plus, Virus ya rurangiza ya Covid-19.
Ubu bwoko bushya bwakangaranyije Isi ubundi bwahawe izina rya B.1.617.2.1 cyangwa AY.1 ariko bumenyekana ku rya Delta Plus.
Inzobere mu buzima zikomeje gucukumbura ngo zimenye niba ubu bwoko bwa Delta Plus bwaba bufite umwihariko mu kwandura vuba kurusha ubwabonetse mbere bwa Alpha nâ€™ubwa Delta nubwo ngo hakiri kare kumenya nyirâ€™izina ingaruka zose zishobora guterwa nâ€™iyi virus nshya.
Delta Plus imaze kugaragarara mu bihugu 11 aho abayanduye benshi bamaze kuboneka muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
U Bwongereza ni cyo gihugu cya kabiri gifite abanduye benshi. Aba mbere bagaragaweho nâ€™iyi virus mu Bwongereza bivugwa ko bari baherutse gutemberera mu bihugu bya Nepal na Turikiya.
U Buhinde buza ku mwanya wa gatatu mu kugira umubare munini wâ€™abamaze kwandura Delta Plus aho bagera kuri 40 nkâ€™uko leta yâ€™icyo gihugu yabitangaje ku wa Gatatu wâ€™iki cyumweru.
Ibindi bihugu umunani bimaze kugaragaramo ubwo bwoko bushya bwâ€™agakoko ka Coronavirus buzwi nka Delta Plus ni Canada, u Buyapani, Nepal, Pologne, Portugal, u Burusiya, u Busuwisi na Turikiya.

Nubwo Ubuyobozi bw Police FC butaratangaza aya makuru, ariko inshuti za hafi za Usengimana zahamije ko yamaze gusinyira amasezerano yâ€™imyaka ibiri iyi kipe yâ€™abashinzwe umutekano.

Mu myaka itatu yamaze muri iyi kipe yâ€™abashinzwe umutekano yatsinze ibitego 38 ahava yerekeza muri Singida United yo muri Tanzania ariko ahamara umwaka umwe gusa ahita aza muri APR FC kuva mu 2018.
Mbere yo kugaruka mu Rwanda mu kipe yâ€™Ingabo, yabanje kwerekeza mu Misiri muri Tersana SC ariko Singida United yari yamaze kumugurisha muri APR FC ariko umukinnyi we yifuzaga gukina mu Misiri birangira agarutse mu Rwanda gutyo.
Tariki ya 13 Nyakanaga 2018 nibwo hamenyekanye amakuru yavugaga ko Usengimana Danny yashoboraga kwerekeza mu ikipe ya APR FC atanzweho miliyoni 20 Frw agatandukana na Singida United yari asigajemo umwaka nyuma yo kutubahiriza amasezerano uyu rutahizamu yari yagiranye nâ€™iyi kipe yo muri Tanzania.
Mbere yo kugaruka mu Rwanda, APR FC yari yumvikanye na Singida United ku masezerano yâ€™umwaka uyu musore yari asigajemo ndetse yishyurwa miliyoni 20 Frw, uyu rutahizamu nawe ahabwa miliyoni 10 Frw.

Nyuma yo kubona ko APR FC irimo kugenda biguru ntege mu kumusinyisha no kumuha ibyo yamwemereye, nibwo tariki ya 3 Kanama 2018 uyu rutahizamu yerekeje muri Tersana SC mu cyiciro cya kabiri mu Misiri, aho yibwiraga ko ibyo APR yatanze azayibisubiza.
Uyu musore yasabye iyi kipe yâ€˜Ingabo ko yayisubiza ibyo yatanze ariko ikamureka agakina mu Misiri, gusa Ubuyobozi bwâ€™iyi kipe bumubera ibamba kuko bwari bumukeneye.

Imikino Olempike: Shaâ€™Carri Richardson wasanzwemo urumogi yazamuye amarangamutima ya benshi.

Ibirwa biri mu kiyaga cya Kivu
Ikirwa cya Nkombo
Nkombo ni cyo kirwa kinini mu kiyaga cya Kivu kuko gifite ubuso bungana na kilometero kare 29,7 harimo 22,7 km2 zâ€™ubutaka na 7 km2 zâ€™amazi, uyu akaba ari umurenge wose uri mu Karere ka Rusizi.

Abaturage baho benshi batunzwe no kuroba nâ€™ubundi bucuruzi butandukanye bakorera muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo. Ba mukerarugendo barahakunda kuko ubuzima bwaho butandukanye nâ€™ubwâ€™ahandi mu gihugu.

Ikirwa cya Gihaya
Gihaya na ho ni mu Karere ka Rusizi ndetse ni hafi na Nkombo ariko ho ni hato. Ni ikirwa ba mukerarugendo bakunda kujya gusura bashaka kurira imisozi ndetse no gutembera mu bwato. Ubuzima bwaho ni nkâ€™ubwo ku Nkombo.

Ikirwa cya Nyamunini
Nyamunini izwi cyane nka Napoleon Island, ni ikirwa kiri mu kiyaga cya Kivu ku ruhande rwa Karongi. Iki ni kimwe mu birwa bikurura ba mukarerugendo bitewe nâ€™ubwoko bwâ€™inyoni butandukanye buhari ndetse nâ€™imbuto zihari.

Ikirwa cya Nyakarwa
Nyakarwa ni ikirwa giherereye mu Karere ka Karongi cyizwiho kugira inyoni zitandukanye. Uwahegeze nta yandi majwi aba yumva usibye urusobe rwâ€™amajwi atandukanye yâ€™inyoni.

Mpembe na yo iherereye muri Karongi akaba ari icyirwa kigengwa nâ€™umuntu ku giti cye, aho yashyizeho ahantu hangana nâ€™ibilometero bine abantu bagenda nâ€™amaguru. Gikurura benshi kuko kibafasha kuruhuka mu buryo bwihariye.
Si ibi birwa gusa biri muri iki kiyaga kuko muri 2012, Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyo Kubungabunga Ibidukikije (REMA),cyatangaje ko mu kiyaga cya Kivu habarizwamo ibirwa 250. Muri byo, 56 biri ku rahande rwâ€™u Rwanda. Ibi twavuzeho ni ibyo ba mukerarugendo bakunze muri gusura muri iki gihe.

Ibiciro byakubwe akarenga kabiri
Mu mpinduka zikomeye zakozwe, harimo kongera igiciro cyo kwinjira muri pariki, ariko bikagenda bigabanywa igihe umuntu ahamaze ijoro rya kabiri nâ€™irya gatatu. Bibarwa ko nta kiguzi cyâ€™inyongera umuntu azajya asabwa kuva ku ijoro rya 4-7, bizaba nkâ€™inyongezo ya pariki.
Mu byiciro bishya kandi hashyizwemo igiciro cyo kuba indege yagwa hagati muri Pariki, aho umuntu yishyuzwa $50.
Mu biciro bizatangira kubahirizwa guhera ku wa 15 Mutarama 2021, bigaragara ko Umunyarwanda cyangwa umuturage wo muri kimwe mu bihugu bigize Umuryango wa Afurika yâ€™Iburasirazuba (EAC) wishyuraga $7.50 cyangwa 6,500 Frw nkâ€™ikiguzi cyo kwinjira muri Pariki, azaba yishyura 16$ cyangwa 15,000 Frw ku munsi cyangwa ijoro rimwe.
Mu gihe mbere habarwaga gusa igiciro cyâ€™umunsi ukwawo, ubu umuntu namara amajoro abiri muri iyi pariki azishyura 24$ cyangwa 22,500 Frw, amajoro naba atatu yishyure 30,000 Frw yo kwinjira gusa.
Naho umunyamahanga ubusanzwe winjiraga yishyuye 50$, guhera muri Mutarama 2021 azaba yishyura 100 $, ku majoro abiri yishyure $150, mu gihe kuri atatu azishyura $200.
Mu biciro byashyiriweho abana, abafite munsi yâ€™imyaka itanu ntabwo bazajya bishyuzwa.
Ku bayirengeje ariko nabo ibiciro bizazamuka. Abana bafite imyaka 6 â€“ 12 bo mu Rwanda na EAC bishyuraga $4 (3,500 Frw), bazajya bishyura $11 (10,000 Frw). Ku majoro abiri igiciro kizaba $16 (15,000 Frw) naho ku majoro atatu kibe $21 (20,000 Frw).
Uretse igiciro gitangwa ku muntu, no ku gitangwa ku winjije imodoka nacyo hazabamo impinduka.
Imodoka nto yâ€™inyarwanda cyangwa yanditswe muri EAC yishyuzwaga $12 (10,000 Frw) azaba $10, naho zimwe nini zitwara ba mukerarugendo zishyuzwaga $24 (20.000 Frw), yagabanyijwe aba $20. Ku modoka nto nâ€™inini zo hanze ya EAC zo ntibyahindutse, ni $40 na $100 nkâ€™uko bikurikirana.
Impinduka ku matsinda nâ€™abishyura umwaka wose
Mu buryo busanzwe, byateganywaga ko iyo abantu bishyize hamwe ari Abanyarwanda barenga 20, bahitaga bagaranyirizwa 1500 Frw kuri buri muntu, maze bakishyura 5000 Frw kuri buri umwe winjiye muri Pariki yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™Akagera.
Mu buryo bushya guhera muri Mutarama 2021, â€œamatsinda yâ€™Abanyarwanda bishyize hamwe basaga 20 bagabanyirizwaho 20% ku giciro gisanzwe cyo kwinjira muri pariki; 12.000 Frw ku muntu mukuru na 8000 Frw ku bana.â€
Mu mpinduka kandi harimo izamuka mu biciro byâ€™umuntu wishyura gusura pariki mu mwaka wose.
Ku munyarwanda cyangwa umuturage wa EAC, umuntu ku giti cye yishyura 95,000 Frw (nta cyahindutse), ariko ku bantu babiri yavuye 115,000 Frw agera ku 150,000 Frw; naho ku muryango ava ku 150,000 Frw agera ku 205,000 Frw.
Ni mu gihe ku banyamahanga batuye mu Rwanda cyangwa muri EAC bo bishyuraga $250 ku muntu umwe, yabaye $300. Ku bantu babiri yari $400 yabaye $500, mu gihe ku muryango wose yari $600 yabaye $700.
Ku bantu bari baramaze kwishyura gusura Pariki mu mwaka utaha ntabwo bazishyuzwa andi mafaranga. Ntabwo izi mpinduka ariko zageze ku biciro byo kurara ahantu nka Ruzizi Tented Lodge cyangwa Karenge Bush Camp.

Abaturage baturiye iri shyamba batangiye kubona inyungu

RwandAir yari isanzwe ikorera ingendo mu Mujyi wa Tel Aviv muri Israel gusa zahagaritswe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ndetse ntiharatangazwa itariki zizasubukurirwa.

Urareba ugasanga ubukangurambaga buri hose nâ€™abantu barabyumva vuba [â€¦] Nifuza ko twazana ngo #NdigaiKinyarwanda, ikaba gahunda twakoreraho.â€
Ikinyarwanda gikoreshwa nâ€™abantu bari hagati ya miliyoni 35-40 babarizwa mu Rwanda, Tanzania, Uganda, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo nâ€™ahandi hirya no hino ku Isi.

Rwagasani yanditse igitabo ku mbwirwaruhame za Perezida Kagame.

Abavuga Ikinyarwanda bakwiriye Isi
Ubusanzwe ururimi rwose rugira indimi shami, nkâ€™ikinyarwanda usanga gifite indimi shami zitandukanye zizwi nâ€™izikirimo gukorwaho ubushakashatsi. Abavuga Ikinyarwanda barimo abari imbere mu gihugu, abasigaye inyuma yacyo ubwo abakoroni bakataga imipaka mu myaka ya 1900.

â€œNâ€™Abanyarwanda benshi baba mu mahanga, Ikinyarwanda cyaragutse ku buryo bagenda bakigisha nâ€™abandi. Hari abazungu usanga bavuga Ikinyarwanda ukagira ngo bavutse bakivuga, kubera ubushake bwo kukimenya ndetse nâ€™abo Banyarwanda bakigisha.â€
Uwiringiyimana avuga ko hari gahunda ikomeye yo gushakira Ikinyarwanda amuga kugira ngo hirindwe ko cyaba uruvangitirane rwâ€™izindi ndimi bityo kizagumane wa mwimerere wacyo.
Yakomeje agira ati â€œIkindi hari uko kugikoraho ubushakashatsi kuko uririmi rudakorwaho ubushakashatsi rurapfa. Ikindi mu kugiteza imbere hari nâ€™uburyo dushyize imbere bwo kugishyira mu ikoranabuhanga.â€
Kuva muri Gashyantare 2020, Ururimi rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda rwashyizwe mu ndimi zizajya zihindurwa mu zindi hifashishijwe uburyo bwâ€™Ikoranabuhanga rya Internet buzwi nka â€˜Google Translateâ€™.

Inama Rusange yâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abibumbye mu mwanzuro wayo A/RES/61/266 wo mu kwezi kwa Gicurasi 2000, yashyizeho itariki 21 Gashyantare kuba Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wâ€™Ururimi Kavukire.

Ibikorwa biteganyijwe
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™Inteko yâ€™Umuco kandi bwatangaje ko umunsi nyirizina uzabimburirwa nâ€™icyumweru cyo kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wâ€™Ururimi Kavukire 2021.

Inkovu yâ€™umutwe mwasatuye si uburanga navukanye, ntimukadutoneke- Kayitesi Judence.

â€˜â€˜Ni bwo ngize amahirwe mbishyira mu gitabo kugira ngo abana be batazajya babaza amateka yâ€™iwabo. Bizaba nâ€™uburyo bwo kwerekana ubukana bwâ€™abateguye bakanashyira mu bikorwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.â€™â€™

Iki gitabo cyanditse mu buryo bworoheje kuko buri wese wagize ibihe bikomeye azibonamo.

Uko Kigeli IV Rwabugili yanze kugurisha Abanyarwanda mu bucakara avuga ko ari abâ€™Imana.
Abanyamateka bagaragaza ko nibura ku nkengero zâ€™Inyajya yâ€™u Buhinde hagurishirijwe miliyoni 17 zâ€™Abirabura. Icyo gihe ibice bimwe bya Afurika abaturage baragabanyutse, bicwa nâ€™inzara, umuruho kubera ingendo ndende no gufatwa nabi.
Umwanditsi wâ€™Umunyamerika, Sir Henri Morton Stanley nawe uri mu bageze muri Afurika mu bukoloni, yanditse ko nyuma yaje gusubira mu gace ka Maniema ko muri Repubulika Iharanira Demukarasi ya Congo asanga abaturage baragabanyutse cyane.
Iri curuzwa ryâ€™abantu nâ€™ubucakara byaherekejwe no gutesha agaciro, iyicarubozo, nâ€™ihohoterwa ryâ€™abirabura bo muri Afurika. Byagize ingaruka zikomeye ku birabura bose aho bava bakagera kugeza nâ€™uyu munsi baracyahangana nâ€™ibisigisigi byâ€™izi ngaruka.
Ku ngoma yâ€™Umwami Kigeli IV Rwabugili nibwo abaturage bo mu bihugu byo muri Afurika yo munsi yâ€™ubutayu bwa Sahara no mu Karere kâ€™Ibihugu byo mu Biyaga Bigari muri rusange, bari imari ishyushye ku isoko ryâ€™ibihugu bya Amerika nâ€™ibyâ€™Abarabu.
Rwabugili ni we mwami wenyine wanze gufata abaturage be ngo abagurishe. Ahandi mu bindi bice bya Afurika bararaga bafata abagabo nâ€™abagore bafite imbaraga bakabagurisha abazungu nâ€™Abarabu. Abami bagurishaga abacakara, bahabwa impano zitandukanye zirimo indorerwamo, amasaro, imyenda nâ€™ibindi.
Umwanditsi akaba nâ€™Impuguke mu mateka, Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu agaragaza ko Umwami Rwabugili yari yaramenye amahano Abarabu bari gukora mu Banyamwezi, mu Bagande, mu Banyoro nâ€™i Karagwe nâ€™ahandi hirya no hino mu karere. Abarabu bafatanyije nâ€™Abami baho bari bamaze igihe bafata abaturage babo bakabagurisha.
Umwami Rwabugili amaze kumenyeshwa ko Abarabu bageze ku nkengero zâ€™Ikiyaga cya Tanganyika, yahaye itegeko ingabo ze ko umuntu wese wâ€™uruhu rwera bazabona akandagira ku butaka bwâ€™u Rwanda bagomba kumwica.
Hari amateka agaragaza ko mu 1871, Abarabu ba mbere binjiye mu Rwanda baje gufata abantu, nta nâ€™umwe warusohotsemo. Ayo makuru barayabwiranye, baratinya cyane.
Nyuma bagerageje kureshya umwami Rwabugili, bamuzanira impano nyinshi zirimo amatungo, imyenda nâ€™ibindi kugira ngo yemere kugurisha Abanyarwanda ariko arabyanga ni yo mpamvu abarabu benshi bakambitse bakagarukira hakurya yâ€™Akagera, ntibatinyuke kwinjira mu Rwanda.
Rwabugili yababwiye ko Abaturage ari abâ€™Imana

Menya byinshi ku bakurambere biziritse ku Rwanda bakanga kururekura.
Birashoboka ko u Rwanda rwari kuba rungana nka Seychelles, agahugu gato kaba muri Afurika, ariko kubera abami barurwaniriye bakagenda barwagura, bakarwizirakaho bamwe bagahara nâ€™ubuzima bwabo, rwabaye u Rwanda rugari, nubwo abakoloni batarurebeye izuba bakarugabagabanya mu nama yabereye i Berilini.

Ruganzu Bwimba niwe mwami wenyine wâ€™u Rwanda wameneye igihugu amaraso
Mu bami barurwaniriye bakarwizirakaho, harimo Ruganzu Bwimba wategetse u Rwanda mu wa 1312-1345, akarumenera amaraso, akemera kuba umutabazi wâ€™umucengeri ari umwami, kugira ngo u Rwanda rwigarurire i Gisaka.
Umutabazi wâ€™umucengeri ni umuntu wiyemezaga kuba igitambo akemera kumena amaraso mu gihugu cyâ€™amahanga agamije kurinda u Rwanda no kurwagura.
Kalisa Rugano yavuze ko ibi byabaye ubwo i Gisaka cyashakaga kwigarurira u Rwanda bikabananira, niko kwiga umutwe wo gushaka mushiki wa Bwimba, Robwa Nyiramateke, kugira ngo azahabyarire umwana wâ€™umuhungu maze agire u Rwanda ingaruzwamuheto, kuko yari kuba ari umunyarwanda akaba nâ€™umunyagisaka.
Kugira ngo baramire u Rwanda byasabye ko Robwa apfa umwana ntavuke, ariko mu muco wa kera byari ngombwa ko hagira nâ€™undi bapfana maze bikitwa ko batabaye u Rwanda.
Bararaguje ngo barebe uwo indagu zifata, maze zemeza ko ari Nkurukumbe nyirarume wa Ruganzu Bwimba ugomba kuba umutabazi wâ€™umucengeri. Abyumvise ahimba amayeri atuma atajya gupfira u Rwanda, nuko birakaza umwami Ruganzu maze ubwe yiyemeza kwitabarira bucengeli.
Aba abaye umwami wa mbere nâ€™uwa nyuma mu mateka yâ€™u Rwanda umeneye igihugu amaraso.

Ni ko byagenze koko, arategurwa agaruka mu Rwanda. Yagiye mu Rwanda se na nyina na nyirakuru barishwe, aza afite agahinda ariko ntiyihorera, aza aje gutabara abanyarwanda.

Uruhererekane nyemvugo rugaragaza ko Cyilima II Rujugira yatanze nyuma yo
gutegeka u Rwanda kuva mu 1675 kugeza mu 1708. Mu migenzo ya cyami, abami bitwa ba Cyilima bagombaga gutabarizwa (gushyingurwa) nâ€™abami bitwa ba Mutara.
Cyilima amaze gutanga, umugogo we wasizwe imiti ituma udashanguka, ubikwa mu rugo rwe rwari ruherereye i Kayumbu muri Kamonyi. Umwami witwa Mutara wagombaga gutabariza Cyilima ni Rwogera wategetse u Rwanda hagati ya 1830 na 1853. Ntabwo byakozwe kuko Rwogera yatanze atunguranye. Byabaye ngombwa ko bategereza undi mwami uzima ingoma yitwa Mutara, umugogo wa Cyilima ukomeza kubikwa.
Umwami wagombaga gutabariza Cyilima Rujugira ni Mutara III Rudahigwa mu 1931, icyakora yimye mu bihe bibi u Rwanda rwari rwarinjiriwe nâ€™abakoloni ndetse ni nabo bamwimitse bitandukanye nâ€™imigenzo yâ€™ubwiru.
Igitabo â€™Ibitaramo ku mateka yâ€™u Rwandaâ€™ cya Zephrin Kagiraneza kivuga ko abiru aribo bafashe umwanzuro wo gutabariza Cyilima Rujugira, bikorwa rwihishwa mu 1931 i Gaseke (Rutobwe: Ubu ni mu murenge wa Kayumbu mu karere ka Kamonyi).
Umwami Kigeli IV Rwabugiri we yiciwe mu Bunyabungo (muri Congo) mu gitero yari yahagabye, umugogo we uzanwa mu Rwanda atabarizwa i Rutare mu karere ka Gicumbi, ahari imisezero yâ€™abami.
Imigogo yabo iri gukorwaho ubushakashatsi
Igitabo cya Kagiraneza kivuga ko umugogo wa Cyilima Rujugira wataburuwe mu mwaka wa 1969 kugira ngo ukorerweho ubushakashatsi. Muri icyo gihe ni nabwo hataburuwe uwa Nyirayuhi Kanjogera, nyina wâ€™umwami Yuhi V Musinga. Kanjogera yapfuye mu 1933.
Mu musezero (imva) wa Cyilima, hakuwemo ibindi bikoresho byo mu gihe cye birimo nkâ€™amacumu, amasaro, imitako, utubindi nâ€™ibindi.
Ubushakashatsi bwakorewe kuri ibyo bikoresho byasanzwe mu mva ye, bwagaragaje ko mu gihe yari akiri umwami amasaro nâ€™indi mitako byakorerwaga i Burayi cyangwa mu Buhinde, byageraga mu Rwanda binyuze mu nyanja yâ€™Abahinde.
Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu yavuze ko nta gitangaza kirimo kuba mu mva ya Cyilima Rujugira barasanzemo amasaro, kuko imyenda nâ€™imitako nkâ€™amasaro byaje mu Rwanda ku ngoma ya Yuhi III Mazimpaka (1642-1675), ari we se wa Rujugira.
Umushakashatsi mu Kigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda, Maurice Mugabowagahunde, yavuze ko nâ€™umugogo wa Kigeli IV Rwabugiri uri mu ngoro yâ€™umurage i Huye, aho uri gukorerwaho ubushakashatsi.
Kugeza ubu abemererwa kugera aho iyo migogo ibitse, ni abashakashatsi babiherewe uburenganzira gusa, abasura ingoro ndangamurage ntabwo babyemerewe.
Ati â€œKeretse uri umushakashatsi naho umushyitsi ntiwawubona. Icyo wabona ni ibindi bikoresho byari biri kumwe na we, ariko turacyari mu bushakashatsi ariko duteganya ko ubushakashatsi niburangira uzongera ugatabarizwa.â€
Mugabowagahunde yavuze ko umugogo wa Cyilima ukimara gutabururwa, wajyanywe mu Bubiligi muri laboratwari zifite ubushobozi bwo gupima ibya kera, zigaragaza ko yabayeho imyaka igera ku ijana mbere yâ€™iyo uruhererekane nyemvugo nyarwanda ruvuga ko yatangiyeho.
Yagize ati â€œAmagufa ye yagiye mu Bubiligi muri laboratwari bigaragaza ko nâ€™igihe Mgr Alexis Kagame yagerageje gukora agaragaza igihe yapfiriye, laboratwari yo igaragaza ko ari vuba cyane. Yabayeho mu myaka ijana mbere yâ€™iyo Kagame yandikaga. Ibyo bituma umenya neza igihe kurusha kugenekereza.â€
Biramutse byemejwe neza, byaba bivuze ko umwami Cyilima Rujugira yabayeho mu myaka yo hagati ya 1500 na 1600.
Ibikoresho byasanzwe mu musezero (imva) wa Cyilima Rujugiro nabyo byakoreweho ubushakashatsi. Mugabowagahunde yavuze ko utubindi twasanzwemo, twapimwe bakagaragaza ko twari turimo inzoga zikoze mu buro.
Ibyo ashimangira ko bifite igisobanuro mu myemerere yâ€™Abanyarwanda bo hambere.
Ati â€œIbyo bigaragaraza imyemerere yâ€™Abanyarwanda ko umwami adapfa, ko akomeza ubuzima akanywa.â€
Mu mateka kandi bivugwa ko guhera ku bwa Yuhi III Mazimpaka, abami batari bemerewe kunywa urwagwa. Banywaga inzoga zikoze mu binyampeke.
Kuba barasanze mu tubindi twa Cyilima inzoga zikoze mu buro, Mugabowagahunde avuga ko bihuza nâ€™ibyo amateka avuga.
Ubushakashatsi buracyakomeje, gusa Mugabowagahunde yavuze ko hakiri imbogamizi yo kubona abahanga bahagije bo gufasha muri ubwo bushakashatsi nâ€™ibikoresho.
Ati â€œIkibazo gihari turabura inzobere mu bushakashatsi ku bisigaramatongo (archeologists). Mu Rwanda dufite bake kandi nta laboratwari ikomeye ariko turi gusinyana nâ€™Inzu ndangamurage yo mu Bubiligi Tervuren kugira ngo ubushakashatsi bwihute.â€

Mu 2001 wahunze igihugu, hari bahaye iki?
Njyewe icyo nari nkeneye ni ukugira ngo mbone ibyangombwa banyakire, kandi ibyo narabikoze. Maze kubigeraho ahasigaye njya mu mirimo yo gutunga umuryango wanjye nditonda, mba Umunyarwanda. Nkâ€™Umunyarwanda ukunda igihugu cye.

U Bushinwa bushya bwisanze mu gihe kibi, Isi iri mu bibazo byasizwe nâ€™Intambara ya Kabiri yâ€™Isi yose. Cyari igihugu kikishakisha, hafi kimwe cya kabiri cyâ€™abagituye bari mu bukene bukabije, ibikorwa remezo ari iyanga nâ€™ibindi.
Isi yakurikiwe nâ€™ibihe bibi byâ€™Intambara yâ€™Ubutita, u Bushinwa bufatwa mu murongo wâ€™Aba-Communistes bari bahanganye nâ€™Aba-Capitalistes bo mu Burengerazuba bwâ€™Isi. Kubera ingufu Abanya-Burayi nâ€™Abanyamerika bari bafite, u Bushinwa ntibwagize ababureba neza benshi, ibihugu byinshi byakoranaga na bwo byikandagira.
Nta mukene rwimbi usigaye mu Bushinwa
Mu gihe byinshi mu bihugu ku Isi bigowe no kugera kuri imwe mu nkingi zâ€™umuryango wâ€™abibumbye zigamije iterambere rirambye (SDGs), yo kuba ubukene bukabije bwaranduwe mu 2030, u Bushinwa bwo bwabigezeho mbere yâ€™imyaka icumi.
Mu mpera za 2020, u Bushinwa bwakoze ibyo benshi basanga bidasanzwe ubwo bwaranduraga burundu ubukene bukabije mu baturage babwo. Miliyoni zisaga 98 zâ€™abaturage bavuye mu bukene bukabije mu myaka icumi gusa, ubaze neza ni nkâ€™abatuye Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo bose, cyangwa se inshuro icyenda abatuye u Rwanda.
Mu mwaka wa 1990, 61% byâ€™abaturage bâ€™u Bushinwa babaga munsi yâ€™umurongo wâ€™ubukene. Byageze mu 2002 ubukene mu Bushinwa bugeze kuri 33 %. Mu mwaka wa 2015, abaturage 4 % mu Bushinwa ni bo bari basigaye mu bukene.
Mu myaka itarenze 30 gusa, miliyoni 700 zâ€™abatuye u Bushinwa zakuwe mu bukene. Ni ibintu bitigeze biba ahandi ku Isi kandi byose byakozwe ku ngamba zagiye zifatirwa mu buyobozi bwâ€™Ishyaka CPC nka moteri ya Guverinoma yâ€™u Bushinwa.
Uku gutera imbere gukomeye kâ€™u Bushinwa kwatewe nâ€™ingamba Leta yashyizeho zigamije kuzamura abatuye mu bice byâ€™icyaro byari byiganjemo ubukene bukabije. Abaturage benshi bimuwe mu bice bari batuyemo bashyirwa mu midugudu igezweho ibonekamo amahirwe yâ€™imirimo nâ€™ubuzima bwiza.
Ubukungu bwazamukanye nâ€™imibereho myiza
Umushinwa wo mu 1949, iyo yuzuzaga imyaka 35 byabaga bidasanzwe, muri make yabaga ari umurame. Byaterwaga nâ€™impamvu zitandukanye zirimo ubukene, intambara za hato na hato zahoraga muri icyo gihugu nâ€™ibindi. Kuri ubu icyizere cyo kubaho ku Mushinwa kiri ku myaka 77.
Ubwo bwiyongere bwâ€™icyizere cyo kubaho bwaturutse ku ngamba zirimo kongera ishoramari, ibikorwa remezo nâ€™ibindi.
Kuri ubu, abantu batuye mu mijyi yo mu Bushinwa bafite akazi bavuye kuri miliyoni 15 bari bariho mu 1949, ubu bageze kuri miliyoni zisaga 435. Iki gihugu mu 1949 cyari gifite imijyi myiza 132 ariko ubu igeze kuri 670. Uburezi ni imwe mu nkingi yatejwe imbere cyane muri icyo gihugu gituwe na miliyari 1.4. Imibare igaragaza ko 99.95 byâ€™abana bageze igihe cyo kwiga amashuri abanza bayiga nta nkomyi, mu gihe 48 % byâ€™abagomba kuba biga Kaminuza bayiga.
Umusaruro mbumbe wâ€™u Bushinwa ubu ugeze kuri miliyari ibihumbi 14.3 zâ€™amadolari, uvuye kuri miliyari $360 mu 1990. Ni ubwa kabiri kuri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zifite umusaruro mbumbe wa miliyari ibihumbi 21 zâ€™amadolari.
Ubukungu bwâ€™iki gihugu bwarushijeho gutumbagira mu 2001 ubwo u Bushinwa bwinjiraga mu Muryango Mpuzamhanga wâ€™Ubucuruzi (World Trade Oraganisation). Kwinjiramo byabuhaye amahirwe yo gukomorerwa kwâ€™ibicuruzwa byabwo mu ruhando mpuzamahanga, gukwirakwira kwâ€™ishoramari ryabwo mu mahanga nâ€™ibindi.
Agaciro kâ€™ibyo u Bushinwa bwoherezaga nâ€™ibyo bwavanaga mu mahanga mu 1950 kabarirwaga miliyari 1.13 zâ€™amadolari, nyamara mu 2018 byari bigeze kuri miliyari 4600 zâ€™amadolari.
Igihugu cya mbere gifite imihanda myinshi ya gari ya moshi igezweho
Mu gihe urujya nâ€™uruza rwâ€™abantu rudashoboka ngo ubucuruzi busagambe, nta gihugu cyarota iterambere. Imihanda myiza ni imwe muri moteri yâ€™iterambere ryihuse, ni yo mpamvu ahanyujijwe kaburimbo mu bihugu byacu bya Afurika, agaciro kâ€™ikibanza kiwegereye kazamuka bitajenjetse, ubucuruzi bunini nâ€™ubuciriritse bikahaza.
Guhera mu kinyejana cya 21, u Bushinwa bwashyize imbaraga mu kuvana mu bwigunge ibice byabwo bitandukanye, bwubaka imihanda igezweho ya gari ya moshi zihuta (high-speed railway).
Mu mwaka wa 2000, nta muhanda wa gari ya moshi yihuta (high-speed railway) nâ€™umwe u Bushinwa bwagiraga. Gari ya moshi zahakoraga inyinshi zari iza kera zishaje zimwe zicumba umwotsi, zangiza ibidukikje ku buryo washoboraga kuva mu ntara imwe ujya mu yindi, bikagutwara iminsi nâ€™iminsi.
Inkuru yarahindutse, ubu u Bushinwa ni cyo gihugu cya mbere ku Isi gifite imihanda myinshi ya gari ya moshi zihuta. Iyo mihanda ibarirwa ibilometero nibura 37.900. Kimwe cya kabiri cyâ€™iyi mihanda cyubatswe mu myaka itanu ishize.
Icyerekezo cyâ€™u Bushinwa ni ukuba bwubatse nibura ibilometero 70.000 bitarenze umwaka wa 2035. Myinshi muri iyo mihanda gari ya moshi zikoresha umuvudulo wa kilometero 350 ku isaha. Mu mwaka wa 2020, ibice 75 % byâ€™imijyi yo mu Bushinwa byari byaragejejwemo imihanda ya gari ya moshi yihuta.
U Bushinwa ni cyo gihugu cyonyine ku Isi cyabashije kugera ku iterambere rihambaye mu bijyanye na gari yamoshi zihuta kuko nkâ€™u Bwongereza bufite kilometero 107 gusa mu gihe nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zifatwa nkâ€™igihugu cya mbere gikize ku Isi, gifite umuhanda umwe wa gari ya moshi yihuta kandi nawo izinyuramo zigendera ku muvuduko wa kilometero 240 ku isaha, bivuze ko gariyamoshi zo mu Bushinwa ziri imbere ho ibilometero 100 kandi ari na nyinshi birenze.
Muri uku kwezi, u Bushinwa bwashyize hanze ubwoko bushya bwa gari ya moshi yihuta (bullet train) ikoresha amashanyarazi gusa. Ni ukuvuga ko ntaho ihuriye na zimwe za kera zakoreshaga amakara, izikoresha ibikomoka kuri peteroli nâ€™ibindi byangiza ibidukukije. Ni cyo gihugu cya mbere ku isi cyabashije kubigeraho.
Iyo gari ya moshi nshya yâ€™amashanyarazi ishobora kugendera ku muvuduko wa kilometero 160 ku isaha. Ni ukuvuga ko ihagurutse i Kigali saa Mbili za mu gitondo, saa Mbili nâ€™iminota 50 yaba yageze i Rubavu mu ntera yâ€™ibilometero 148.
Igisirikare kiyingayinga icya Amerika
Iterambere ryose rituruka ku mutekano, ni yo mpamvu u Bushinwa bwashyize imbaraga nyinshi mu kubaka inzego zabwo zâ€™umutekano byâ€™umwihariko igisirikare cyizwi nkâ€™icya rubanda, Peopleâ€™s Liberation Army (PLA). U Bushinwa buri gukora misile zihuta cyane ku kigero gisumba cyane umuvuduko wâ€™ijwi ku buryo byagora umwanzi kubona umwanya wo kwitegura guhangana nabyo mu gihe byaba birashwe. U Burusiya ni bwo bwonyine bwari butunze ubwo bwoko bwâ€™ibisasu buzwi nka Hypersonic Missiles.
Mu myaka yatambutse, igisirikare cyâ€™u Bushinwa cyakoreshaga nyinshi mu ntwaro zakorewe mu Burusiya ariko ubu byarahindutse, inyinshi zikorerwa mu nganda zâ€™imbere mu gihugu. Ibihugu bikize byarakangaranye
Amagambo make, ibikorwa byinshi ni wo murongo u Bushinwa bufite. Kubera guceceka cyane, akenshi ibihugu bikomeye byisanga icyo gihugu cyageze ku bintu bidasanzwe ku buryo hari impungenge ko bishobora kwisanga byanyuzweho mu nzego zose.

Muri uyu mushinga, u Bushinwa bwiyemeje gutanga inkunga mu kubaka ibikorwa

Ibihugu bihuriye mu muryango Commonwealth, ibya Aziya na Afurika byari bishyigikiye ko u Rwanda nâ€™u Burundi biba igihugu kimwe.

Ibyo wamenya kuri T.B. Joshua

Imiterere ya Jabiru dâ€™Afrique (African Saddle-billed Stork)

Ku wa Mbere wâ€™iki cyumweru, amazi yâ€™amashyuza yarakamye yimukira hafi yâ€™uruganda rwa Cimerwa rukora sima, akajya atemba ajya mu Mugezi wa Rubyiro.

Impuguke mu bijyanye nâ€™Ubumenyi bwâ€™Isi, Dr Emmanuel Havugimana, yabwiye IGIHE ko ubushakashatsi bukiri gukorwa ariko we asanga gutemba kwâ€™amashyuza byaba byaraturutse ku mitingito yabaye muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo nâ€™u Burundi.

Aya amazi ari kumanuka aca aho Cimerwa iri gucukura amabuye. Ni imbogamizi cyane ku mikorere yayo ku buryo babagiriye inama yo gushaka uburyo ayo mazi yasubira aho yahoze.
Ngaruye Jean Claude yagize ati â€œKuko amazi agihari twabagiriye inama ko bashaka inzobere bakabanza bagatiyura isayo ririmo kuko ryanatezaga impanuka, bahagirira isuku bagacukura bakagera ku rutare rukomeye ubundi bakazamura inkuta, ariya mazi bayahamisha hariya bakajya bayaruhukiraro nkuko byari bisanzwe ndetse ntanagire ingaruka ku bantu.â€
Aya mazi yari asanzwe amanuka ashyushye yagera ahantu akaguma hamwe abantu bakabasha kuyoga no kuyikandisha kuko ngo yabavuraga amavunane. Abatuye Isi bamaze gukoresha umutungo kamere wose wari ugenewe umwaka wa 2020.
Umunsi aho abatuye Isi bose baba bamaze gukoresha umutungo kamere Isi iba ifite ubushobozi bwo gutanga muri uwo mwaka, uzwi nka â€˜Earth Overshoot Dayâ€™, muri uyu mwaka wari ku wa 22 Kanama.

Uko yagiye gutanga umusanzu muri Centrafrique
Mu Ukuboza 2018, Ambasade ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Rwanda ku bufatanye nâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Indashyikirwa mu micungire yâ€™ibinyabuzima nâ€™umutungo kamere kibarizwa muri Kaminuza yâ€™u Rwanda (Center of Excellence in Biodiversity conservation and Natural Resources management), yazanye urubyiruko 10 rwa Centrafrique kwigira ku Rwanda ibijyanye no kubungabunga urusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima no kwita ku bidukikije.
Abo baje guhuzwa nâ€™abandi banyarwanda 12 barimo Tumwesigye. Nyuma yo gusoza urugendo rwabo mu Rwanda, baje kumutumira kugira ngo ajye kubunganira mu guhugura abantu bo muri icyo gihugu.
Mu mpera za 2019 yerekeje muri Centrafrique ku nkunga ya Kaminuza yâ€™u Rwanda na Ambasade ya Amerika muri Centrafrique.
Ati â€œKubera ko ari igihugu cyazahajwe nâ€™intambara, kwita ku bidukikije nta mwanya bihabwa cyane. Nabahuguye kureka guhiga inyamanswa. Twabubakiye ubuhumbikiro bwâ€™imboga nâ€™izâ€™ibiti byâ€™imbuto nâ€™ibiti bisanzwe bazajya bifashisha mu gutunganya amakara babikora nkâ€™ubucuruzi.â€
Urubyiruko rwahuguwe muri Centrafrique rwateye ibihumbi 21 byâ€™ibiti byâ€™imbuto ziganjemo avoka, ibinyomoro, amatunda, orange, amapapayi nâ€™ibindi biti bisanzwe byo kubungabunga amashyamba.

Uko yagiye gutanga umusanzu muri Centrafrique
Mu Ukuboza 2018, Ambasade ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Rwanda ku bufatanye nâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Indashyikirwa mu micungire yâ€™ibinyabuzima nâ€™umutungo kamere kibarizwa muri Kaminuza yâ€™u Rwanda (Center of Excellence in Biodiversity conservation and Natural Resources management), yazanye urubyiruko 10 rwa Centrafrique kwigira ku Rwanda ibijyanye no kubungabunga urusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima no kwita ku bidukikije.
Abo baje guhuzwa nâ€™abandi banyarwanda 12 barimo Tumwesigye. Nyuma yo gusoza urugendo rwabo mu Rwanda, baje kumutumira kugira ngo ajye kubunganira mu guhugura abantu bo muri icyo gihugu.
Mu mpera za 2019 yerekeje muri Centrafrique ku nkunga ya Kaminuza yâ€™u Rwanda na Ambasade ya Amerika muri Centrafrique.
