Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ingaruka zo gutwara imodoka ibirahuri bimanuye.
Ubu bushakashatsi bwakorewe mu mijyi icumi itandukanye, ari yo Dhaka (Bangladesh), Chennai (u Buhinde), Guangzhou (u Bushinwa), Medellin (Colombia), SaÌƒo Paulo (Brazil), Cairo (Misiri), Sulaymaniyah (Iraq), Addis Ababa (Ethiopia), Blantyre (Malawi), na Dar-es-Salaam (Tanzania).
Ubu bushakashatsi bwakozwe na kaminuza ya Surrey, bugaragaza ko gutwara imodoka umanuye ibirahuri byongera umwuka mubi uhumekwa ku kigero cya 80%, bikaba byanaba bibi kurushaho mu masaha arimo ingendo nyinshi.
Abashakashatsi bavuga ko abatwara imodoka mu bihugu biri mu nzira yâ€™amajyambere bahura nâ€™iki kibazo kurusha abandi, kuko imihanda yo mu bihugu bikennye iba irimo imodoka nyinshi zishaje, zohereza imyuka mibi myinshi kandi uburyo bwo kwirinda, nko gukoresha imashini zitanga umwuka mu modoka, bukaba buri hacye cyane muri ibyo bihugu.
Inama zitangwa nâ€™ubu bushakashatsi zirimo kwirinda gukora ingendo mu masaha arimo imodoka nyinshi, cyane aya mu gitondo na nimugoroba. Harimo kandi gukoresha ubundi buryo bwo kubona umwuka mwiza, nko kugura imodoka zifite imashini zitanga umwuka ndetse zitanasohora imyuka mibi.
Ishami ryâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abibumbye, rivuga ko ikibazo cyâ€™ubwiyongere bwâ€™imyuka mibi giteye inkeke. Miliyoni zirindwi zâ€™abatuye Isi zipfa buri mwaka kubera indwara zifitanye isano nâ€™imyuka mibi mu gihe abantu icyenda mu 10 bahumeka umwuka udasukuye ku bipimo byiza.
Ibidasanzwe biri mu gishushanyo mbonera gishya cyâ€™imikoreshereze yâ€™ubutaka.
Ubutaka ni imwe mu ngingo zidakunze kuvugwaho rumwe kuri ubu cyane cyane iyo bigeze ku mikoreshereze yabwo. Buri muturage yumva umutungo ukomeye akwiriye kugira mu gihugu ari ubutaka, bigatuma benshi babushaka cyangwa babukoresha mu buryo bunyuranyije nâ€™amategeko.
Ikibazo cyari kimaze iminsi kivugwa ni uburyo ubutaka buhingwa bwari bukomeje kubakwaho inzu ku buryo budacunzwe neza, mu minsi iri imbere igihugu cyazasigara ari inzu gusa bigateza ikibazo gikomeye cyo kutihaza mu biribwa.
Igishushanyo mbonera gishya cyâ€™imikoreshereze yâ€™ubutaka cyemejwe nâ€™inama yâ€™abaminisitiri iherutse, cyatanze umucyo ku buryo ubutaka bugomba gukoreshwa mu gihugu, ubirenzeho agahanwa.
Mu bishya birimo ni uko ubuhinzi bwagenewe 47,2% byâ€™ubuso bwâ€™igihugu, amashyamba yahariwe 29,3%,imiturire nâ€™ibikorwaremezo bigenerwa 15%,mu gihe amazi nâ€™ibishanga bibungabunzwe byagenewe 8,5% byâ€™ubuso bwâ€™igihugu.
Iyemezwa ryâ€™iki gishushanyo mbonera kiruta ibindi bizafungurira amarembo nâ€™ibindi bishushanyo mbonera byâ€™imiturire mu Mujyi wa Kigali nâ€™indi mijyi kugira ngo buri muturage amenye icyagenewe aho ubutaka bwe buherereye.
Ntawe uzongera kubaka inzu ukwe mu murima we
Abanyarwanda kuri ubu bagera kuri miliyoni 12.5, bakaba biyongera ku kigero cya 2.4 %. Bakomeje kwiyongera kuri uwo muvuduko, mu mwaka wa 2050 bazaba bageze kuri miliyoni 25.8 % cyangwa miliyoni 22 baramutse biyongereye ku muvuduko wa 2 %.
Mu miturire, igishushanyo kigaragaza ko kuri ubu 18.4 % batuye mu mijyi naho 81.6 % batuye bacucitse mu byaro.
Muri gahunda ya Guverinoma yâ€™imyaka irindwi, abatuye mu mijyi byitezwe ko bazagera kuri 35 % bitarenze mu 2024 naho mu 2050 bakazaba ari 70 %.
Igishushanyo mbonera kigaragaza imijyi yose ikenewe mu gihugu ndetse na site zo guturaho mu cyaro.
Mu guteza imbere iyo gahunda, hateganyijwe ko umurwa mukuru uzakomeza kuba Kigali, habeho indi mijyi itatu iwukikije (Satellite cities) , indi mijyi yâ€™uturere 16 nâ€™udusantere 73 dukomeye two mu byaro.
Imijyi igwa mu ntege Kigali yateganyijwe ni Bugesera, Rwamagana na Muhanga kugira ngo ifashe Kigali kwakira abantu nâ€™ibikorwa bimwe na bimwe byatumaga benshi baza gushakira ubuzima muri Kigali ariko imbaraga zigashyirwa mu kuyirinda ko ikomeza gukura mu kajagari.
Imijyi izakomeza kuba iyunganira Kigali iherereye hafi yâ€™imipaka ni Musanze, Rubavu, Rusizi, Nyagatare, na Huye aho umwe ubarirwa kuzajya uba utuwe nâ€™abaturage bari hagati ya 300,000 na 650,000 . Iyo mijyi izakomeza kunganirwa na Karongi, Kayonza na Kirehe yo izaba ituwe nâ€™abaturage bari hagati ya 150,000 na 300,000.
Mu dusantere dukomeye twateganyijwe 73, buri kamwe kazajya kaba gafite abaturage 24,500.
Byagaragaye ku mu Rwanda ubu hari inzu zo guturamo miliyoni 2.8 , mu gihe hakenewe inzu miliyoni 5.5 zizahaza miliyoni zisaga 22 zizaba zituye igihugu mu 2050. Ibyo bituma hakenewe kubakwa inzu 150 000 buri mwaka kugira ngo habe icyizere cyâ€™uko abanyarwanda bose bizagera mu 2050 nta kibazo cyâ€™aho kuba bafite.
Nubwo hari icyo kibazo cyâ€™ubuke bwâ€™inzu, igishushanyo mbonera gisaba ko uburyo bwo kubaka bwitonderwa , inzu zikubakwa bazamuka bajya hejuru, munsi yâ€™ubutaka hagakoreshwa hubakwa parikingi nâ€™ibindi.
Nubwo hagikenewe inzu nyinshi, igishushanyo mbonera gisaba ko uburyo bwo kubaka bwitonderwa cyane kugira ngo abantu batototera nâ€™ubutaka buhingwaho.
Imyubakire mu cyaro, abasaga miliyoni 6.6 ni ukuvuga 30 % byâ€™abazaba batuye u Rwanda mu 2050 bazaba batuye mu midugudu 3000. Nibura buri kagali kazajya kaba gafite site imwe cyangwa ebyiri zo gutuzamo abaturage bako abe ari naho hashyirwa ibikorwa remezo nkâ€™amazi, amashanyarazi, amashuri, amavuriro nâ€™ibindi.
Kubera ko akagali kazaba gafite ahantu hamwe cyangwa habiri hatuwe, ibyo biraca amarenga ko imidugudu isanzwe nkâ€™inzego zâ€™ubutegetsi izavaho ahubwo hagashyirwaho inzego nshya zishingiye ku miturire mishya.
Mu kubaka inzu mu cyaro ahagenewe imidugudu, hazakoreshwa uburyo bwo kubaka inzu enye muri imwe nâ€™umunani muri imwe, cyangwa ubundi buryo butuza abaturage benshi ahantu hato.
Umusaruro wâ€™ubuhinzi uzongerwa
Mu gushaka uko ubutaka buhingwa bwongerwa kugira ngo abazaba batuye igihugu mu 2050 bazabone ibibatunga bihagije, ubutaka buhingwa bwavanywe kuri 41.5 % byâ€™ubuso bwâ€™igihugu, bugirwa 47,2%.
Nubwo bimeze gutyo, ukurikije umusaruro uboneka ku buso buhingwa kuri ubu bikomeje bityo ntabwo uwo musaruro wazabasha guhaza miliyoni 22 bazaba batuye igihugu mu 2050.
Ubuhinzi bukomeje gutanga umusaruro butanga kuri ubu, kugira ngo haboneke ibizahaza abazaba batuye u Rwanda icyo gihe hasaba ubutaka bungana na kilometero kare 103,000, ni ukuvuga ubuso bwikubye inshuro enye ubwâ€™igihugu gifite.
Mu gihe haba hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga mu buhinzi no kongera umusaruro, haba hakenewe ubuso bungana na kilometero kare 14,500 kmÂ² bwo guhingaho ibizahaza abaturage.
Mu nama igishushanyo cyatanze, ni ugukomeza kurinda ubutaka buhingwa kuri ubu bungana na kilometero kare 12,433 kugira ngo budakoreshwa nabi cyangwa mu bindi.
Inzira za Gari ya Moshi zihuta
Mu bijyanye no gutwara abantu nâ€™ibintu, kuri ubu mu Rwanda hari imihanda ingana na kilometero 37 896. Imihanda ya kaburimbo izongerwa cyane , hazubakwa inzira za gari ya moshi zihuza u Rwanda nâ€™ibihugu bituranye ndetse nâ€™imihanda yihuta ihuza imijyi minini.
Ku bijyanye nâ€™ibidukikije igishushanyo mbonera gisaba ko ubuso bwa kilometero kare 1389 buteweho amashyamba ya kimeza bukomeza kubungabungwa, no kurinda amashyamba yandi ari mu gihugu angana na kilometero kare 3,873 kmÂ². Gutera amashyamba mashya bizibanda ku misozi ihanamye, mu gihe gutera amashyamba ahagenewe ubuhinzi bitemewe keretse bikozwe haterwa ibiti bivangwa nâ€™imyaka.
Igishushanyo mbonera gisaba ko gucukura amabuye yâ€™agaciro bikorwa habanje kurebwa niba byunguka kurusha ibigiye kuvanwaho.
Minisiteri yâ€™ibidukikije igaragaza ko hagiye gushyirwaho uburyo bwâ€™ikoranabuhanga buzafasha mu ikurikiranwa ryâ€™imikoreshereze yâ€™ubutaka ku buryo unyuranyije nabyo babibona kare bitabaye ngombwa ko bifata igihe. Hari gutegurwa amategeko azahana abazanyuranya nabyo.
Ibisubizo byâ€™ibibazo byibazwa ku iruka rya Nyiragongo
Ku wa 22 Gicurasi 2021 cyongeye kuruka nyuma yâ€™aho cyaherukaga kuruka mu 2002. Ubu habarurwa abantu barenga 30 bapfuye kubera iruka ryacyo, ibikorwa remezo bigasenyuka ndetse abaturage bagakwira imishwaro bahunga.
Iruka ryacyo rimaze iminsi ritera imitingito mu bice hafi ya byose byâ€™u Rwanda ku buryo nkâ€™Akarere ka Rubavu kari mu icuraburindi.
Hari bimwe mu bibazo abantu bakomeje kwibaza ku iruka ryacyo nâ€™ingaruka zabyo. Ni byo tugiye kugarukaho nyuma yâ€™uko bisubijwe nâ€™ishami ribishinzwe mu Kigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe Peteroli, Gazi na Mine, RMB.
1. Ko twumva imitingito yaba ari ikimenyetso ko ikirunga kizongera kuruka?
Oya! Imitingito nkâ€™iyi iterwa no gutogota kwâ€™amazuku (magma) mu nda yâ€™ikirunga. Umwuka ushyushye mu nda yâ€™isi uba mwinshi, urutare ruhazengurutse rugasa nâ€™uruturika bigatuma humvikana imitingito mito mito yâ€™uruhererekane.
Ibipimo byâ€™umwuka wo hejuru ya Nyiragongo byafashwe bigaragaza ko nta myuka ituruka mu mazuku ihari. Ibi bivuze ko nta mazuku ari hafi ku buryo ikirunga cyakongera kuruka.
2. Iyi mitingito izahagarara ryari?
Ntawapfa kuvuga itariki cyangwa isaha imitingito izahagarariraho kuko nta gipimo kiyipima kugeza uyu munsi. Ariko umuntu arebeye uko byagiye bigenda (amateka yâ€™iruka rya buri kirunga) mu myaka yashize ntabwo imitingito ikurikira iruka ryâ€™ikirunga irenza ibyumweru bibiri. Ubwo Nyiragongo iheruka kuruka mu 2002 imitingito yamaze iminsi 10.
3. Iruka ryâ€™ikirunga ryatewe nâ€™iki?
Iruka ryâ€™ibirunga rigaragarira mu ivuburwa ryâ€™urusukume rwâ€™ibikoma bishyushye cyane binyura ahagaragaza imbaraga nke mu gishishwa cyâ€™Isi.
Ikirunga kiruka kuko hari urutare mu nda yâ€™Isi ruba rwashonze kubera ubushyuhe buri hagati ya dogere 700 na dogere 1200. Ibi bikajyana nâ€™umwuka mwinshi ushyushye noneho ugatera ibikoma byashonze kuzamuka bikanyura mu myenge bikazamuka hejuru mu buryo bwo guturika bishaka aho binyura bitewe na wa mwuka mwinshi ushyushye urimo.
4. Imitingito yatewe nâ€™iki?
Imitingito nkâ€™iyi iterwa no gutogota kwâ€™amazuku (magma) ari mu nda yâ€™Isi no gukubana hagati yâ€™ibisate mu bice byiyashije. Umwuka nâ€™igikoma bishyushye mu nda yâ€™isi biba byinshi urutare ruhazengurutse rugasa nâ€™uruturika bigatuma humvikana imitingito mito mito yâ€™uruhererekane.
5. Kuki imitingito ituruka i Rubavu gusa?
Imitingito yose mwumvise nyuma yâ€™iruka rya Nyiragongo yabaga iturutse mu izingiro ryayo (epicenter) i Rubavu. Iyi mitingito yashoboraga no kumvikana ahandi bitewe nâ€™uburemere bwayo kandi yanagendaga icika intege uko yagendaga ijya kure yâ€™iryo zingiro ryayo.
Urugero ni uko iyo uteye ibuye cyangwa ikindi kintu mu mazi hari imirongo yâ€™uruziga igenda inyuranamo yerekana ko hari ikintu kidasanzwe cyajugunywe muri ayo mazi (waves). Ku bayumviraga ahandi si ukuvuga ko aho bari naho habaga hari indi mitingito.
6. Ni ukuri ko ikirunga kirutse bikagera mu Kivu byateza ibibazo?
Ntabwo byapfa gushoboka! Urugero ni uko mu 2002 ubwo Nyiragongo yarukagaga, amahindure ari ku muvuduko wa 100km ku isaha, ibyageze mu kiyaga cya Kivu byamanutse kugera muri metero 140 zâ€™ubujyakuzimu kandi gas methane iba muri metero hafi 200. Nyuma yâ€™iruka rya Nyiragongo uyu mwaka leta yafashe ingamba zo gukorana nâ€™abaturanyi bya hafi mu kugenzura biriya birunga byegereye u Rwanda ku buryo nâ€™igihe byaruka byaba bizwi hagashyirwaho ingamba zâ€™ubwirinzi.
7. Muri Congo ko ubuyobozi bwaburiye abaturage guhunga, natwe duhunge?
Oya, ibipimo bigaragazwa nâ€™impuguke za RMB bigaragaza ko nta kibazo gihari ku ruhande rwâ€™u Rwanda. Ikibazo cyabaye ni imitingito gusa kandi nayo ibipimo bigaragaza ko yagiye igabanuka mu ngano no mu bukana ku buryo nta mpungenge biteye. Gusa birasaba gukora gahunda yâ€™igihe kirekire ifasha abaturage gukomeza kubana nâ€™iruka ryâ€™ibirunga ndetse nâ€™imitingito kuko kugeza uyu munsi bikiriho muri aka gace duherereyemo.
Minisiteri yâ€™Ibidukikije yatanze impuruza ku bishora mu bikorwa byangiza urusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima.
Ibi yabivuze mu muhango wo kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wo kwita ku rusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima usanzwe wizihizwa tariki 22 Gicurasi, ariko ukaba wizihijwe kuri uyu wa 31 Gicurasi 2021, mu cyumweru cyahariwe kubungabunga ibidukikije.
Patrick Karera yavuze ko u Rwanda rumaze gutera intambwe ishimishije mu kubungabunga urusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima harimo kwita ku nyamaswa, imigezi, ibishanga nâ€™amashyamba.
Ati â€œTurabona hari byinshi tumaze kugeraho mu rwego rwâ€™amashyamba mwabonye ko pariki ya Gishwati-Mukura yashyizwe mu byanya bikomye bigomba kwitabwaho nkâ€™umurage wâ€™Isi. Ibi ni ibintu twishimiye cyane mu Rwanda nâ€™abafatanyabikorwa twakoranye.â€
Iyi Pariki ya Gishwati-Mukura yabayeho kubera ingufu za Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda, mu gihe mbere yari yaratangiye guturwamo nâ€™abaturage, ikorerwamo ibikorwa byâ€™ubuhinzi nâ€™ibindi bitandukanye ariko byose byarahagaritswe, abaturage barimurwa haterwa amashyamba, harongera hasubira uko hahoze.
Patrick Karera yakomeje avuga ko nubwo bimeze gutyo ariko hakiri byinshi byo gukora.
Yagize Ati â€œNubwo twungukira mu kubungabunga urusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima, ibikorwa dukora mu buzima bwa buri munsi birarwangiza.Turi kimwe mu bigize urusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima ariko turi kuruma ukuboko kutugaburira. Kwangiza ibidukikije bitugiraho ingaruka, rero ni byiza ko tuba kimwe mu bisubizo mu kwita ku bidukikije.â€
Ambasaderi wâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Ubumwe bwâ€™u Burayi mu Rwanda, Nicola Bellomo, yavuze ko u Rwanda ari kimwe mu bihugu byâ€™intangarugero mu kubungabunga urusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima ndetse ko uyu muryango uri kurufasha gukomeza muri iyo nzira binyuze mu gutera inkunga imishinga itandukanye.
Yongeyeho ati â€œHari ubushakashatsi bwinshi bwakozwe, hari byinshi byagezweho, ariko haracyari inzira ndende. Imiterere yâ€™Ikigungumuka urebeye inyuma

Uko ibigungumuka byororoka
Ibigungumuka ni ibisiga bikunda gusabana kuko ushobora kubisanga hamwe ari nka bibiri kugera ku munani. No mu gihe cyo gutera amagi no kurera imishwi uko gukorera mu itsinda birakomeza.
Ikigungumuka kiba kimaze gukura ku buryo cyakororoka ku myaka itatu ariko gikora igisa no kuboneza urubyaro kuko nubwo kuri iyo myaka gishobora kubyara ariko kibikora ku myaka itandatu cyangwa irindwi ndetse gishobora no kugera mu myaka 10 kitarabyara.
Ibigungumuka bikora umuryango wâ€™ingabo nâ€™ingore bizabana igihe kirekire.Akenshi ikigabo kinini nâ€™ikigore kinini mu muryango ni byo byororoka. Buri muryango ugiye kororoka witabwaho nibura nâ€™ibindi bisiga bibiri. Ikigungumuka cyâ€™ikigore gitera amagi mu mwobo wâ€™igiti cyashaje cyangwa mu bitare.

Igihe cyo kurarira amagi kiri hagati yâ€™iminsi 40-45. Muri iki gihe cyo kurarira ingore iba igaburirwa nâ€™ibindi bisiga bigize umuryango. Iyi ikigungumuka cyibyaye gishobora kongera kubyara nyuma yâ€™imyaka itatu. Imishwi ikomeza kubana nâ€™ababyeyi bayo nibura kugera ku myaka icyenda ikabona kuba yajya aho ishaka.

Kuki Ababiligi batifuzaga ko Abanyarwanda benshi batura mu mijyi?
Nubwo imyinshi muri iyi mijyi itanga icyizere kuri ubu kubera ibikorwa byâ€™iterambere bikomeje kuyikwirakwizwamo, mu myaka ijana ishize ubwo yashingagwa siko yari imeze, ndetse imwe yari inkambi, insisiro cyangwa udusantere tudashinga twabonwaga na bamwe nkâ€™utwâ€™igihe gito.
Byinshi mu bihugu bya Afurika byagiye bikolonizwa nâ€™Abanyaburayi, ikintu bagiye bashyira imbere ni uguteza imbere imijyi no kuyishishikariza abaturage gakondo bari bamenyereye kwibera ku misozi. Icyakora, inyandiko zitandukanye zâ€™amateka zigaragaza ko mu Rwanda atari ko byagenze byâ€™umwihariko nyuma yâ€™uko Abadage birukanywe mu gihugu guhera mu 1916 bagasimburwa nâ€™Ababiligi.
Igitabo â€™Ibitaramo ku mateka yâ€™u Rwandaâ€™ cya Zephrin Kagiraneza kivuga ko Ababiligi bamaze kugera mu Rwanda batigeze bashaka guteza imbere imijyi cyane.
Bageze mu Rwanda umujyi ugaragara uhari ari Kigali ariko nayo nta bidasanzwe yari ifite uretse inzu ya Richard Kandt, Umudage wahoze ari na Rezida wâ€™u Rwanda.
Mu gihe Abadage bamaze mu Rwanda kandi, bashinze inkambi za gisirikare zitandukanye mu gihugu. Aho bagiye bazishingaga, Kagiraneza agaragaza ko ariho nyuma hagiye haba imwe mu mijyi u Rwanda rufite ubu.
Mu Ruhengeri inkambi bayihashinze mu 1903, Gisenyi bayihashyira mu 1907, Kigali ihajya mu 1908, Gatsibo ihashyirwa mu 1913 naho muri Cyangungu bayishinga mu 1914.
Izo nkambi za gisirikare zagendaga zikurura ibikorwa bimwe na bimwe nkâ€™ubucuruzi bwâ€™ibyo abasirikare babaga bakeneye, bigatuma bamwe batangira kuhatura.
Abadage bamaze kugenda, Ababiligi ntabwo bashyize imbaraga mu gukundisha Abanyarwanda kujya mu mijyi, bitandukanye nâ€™uko babikoze mu bindi bihugu nka Congo Mbiligi.
Kagiraneza mu gitabo cye yagize ati â€œAbabiligi ntibigeze bashaka guteza imijyi imbere. Abanyarwanda bavaga mu giturage bakajya mu mijyi babasoreshaga inshuro eshatu zâ€™umusoro usanzwe. Nkâ€™umujyi wa Kigali, mu 1916 wari utuwe nâ€™abantu batarenze 700 barimo abakora mu bucuruzi, abazungu bane, abarabu nka 60, nâ€™abaswahili nka 350.â€
Uko kudakunda ko Abanyarwanda bava mu byaro bajya mu mijyi, Ababiligi ngo baba barabisabwe nâ€™abamisiyoneri. Kubera ko imijyi yabagamo abayisilamu benshi, Abamisiyoneri ngo bumvaga ko nibemerera abantu benshi kujya mu mijyi bashobora kuzahinduka Abayisilamu, Idini ya Islam igakwira mu Rwanda, Kiliziya igatakaza abayoboke.
Baba Abanyagatolika nâ€™Abaporotestanti kandi barwanyaga ko Abanyarwanda abenshi bahinduka abayisilamu. Bimwe mu byatumaga babirwanya harimo umuco wâ€™abayisilamu wo kuba kuzana abagore benshi ntacyo bitwaye, ikintu batifuzaga kuko byari bihabanye nâ€™inyigisho zabo, bigahura nâ€™ibyari bisanzwe mu muco Nyarwanda byo guhagarika kandi abamisiyoneri aribyo bashakaga guca.
Leta nayo yagiye ikora ibishoboka byose ngo Abayisilamu bature ukwabo bativanga nâ€™abaturage basanzwe. Nko muri Kigali bashyiriweho inkambi yabo mu Biryogo, izindi zishyirwa Rwamagana, ku Gisenyi, Cyangugu nâ€™ahandi.
Mu mwaka wa 1956 nibwo Inama Nkuru yâ€™igihugu iyobowe nâ€™Umwami Mutara II Rudahigwa yakuyeho izo nkambi, itegeka ko Abayisilamu bavangwa nâ€™abandi baturage.
Ababiligi bashatse uburyo bwo gukomakoma abashakaga kujya gucururiza mu abahaga hafatwa nkâ€™imijyi, babaremera amasoko bazajya bacururizamo bakahubaka amaduka. Mu mwaka wa 1940 nibwo ayo masoko yatangiye kubakwa ageze ku icumi, atuma abashaka guhahirana babona aho guhahira bitabagoye kandi batiriwe bajya mu mijyi.
Mu nyandiko ya Dalmasso Etienne na Pierre Sirven bise â€˜La Sous-Urbanisation et les villes du Rwanda et du Burundiâ€™, bavuga ko ahanini ahagiye hazamuka imijyi mu Rwanda habaga hari ibindi bikorwa byâ€™iterambere nkâ€™ubutegetsi bwa gikoloni, ibikorwa byâ€™ubucukuzi bwâ€™amabuye yâ€™agaciro, ubucuruzi nâ€™ibindi.
Kubera kudashishikariza Abanyarwanda kugana imijyi cyane, u Rwanda rwabonye ubwigenge mu 1962 Umujyi wa Kigali utuwe nâ€™abatarenze 5000.
U Rwanda rwabonye ubwigenge Umujyi wa Butare ariwo urimo ibikorwa byinshi byâ€™iterambere ariko Kigali ihabwa amahirwe menshi kuko wari umujyi uri hagati.
Nubwo nyuma yâ€™ubwigenge hashyizwe imbaraga mu guteza imbere twa dusantere nâ€™ahahoze inkambi zikavamo imijyi, Sirven na Dalmasso bagaragaza ko kugeza mu 1984 nibura 3.5 % byâ€™Abanyarwanda aribo bari batuye mu mijyi. Bitandukanye no muri Congo kuko muri icyo gihe 50 % byâ€™abaturage bari batuye mu mijyi.
Abo banditse bavuga ko ubwiyongere bwâ€™abaturage mu mijyi yo mu Rwanda ahanini butagiye buterwa nâ€™imbaraga Leta yashyiragamo mu kubibashishikariza ahubwo byaturukaga ahanini ku igabanuka ryâ€™ubutaka bwari butunze Abanyarwanda benshi, urubyiruko rukajya mu mujyi nkâ€™uburyo bwo kujya gushaka imibereho.
Mu 1990, Umujyi wa Kigali wari wihariye 61 % byâ€™abari batuye mu mijyi icyo gihe. 30 % byâ€™abakozi ba Leta bose babaga muri Kigali, 75 % byâ€™ibigo byâ€™imari niho byabarizwaga, 60 % byâ€™imodoka zari mu gihugu na 60 % byinganda.
Umubano wâ€™ibihugu byombi watangiye kuzamba guhera mu 2014 ubwo Karegeya Patrick wabaye mu Ngabo zâ€™u Rwanda, yicirwaga muri Afurika yâ€™Epfo, mu cyumba cya hotel ya Mischelangelo mu ijoro ryo rishyira ku wa 1 Mutarama 2014.
Karegeya afatwa nkâ€™umwe mu bashinze Umutwe wa RNC uyoborwa na Kayumba Nyamwasa, umutwe washinjwe uruhare mu bitero bya grenade zatewe mu bice bitandukanye cyane cyane mu Mujyi wa Kigali, guhera mu 2009.

Ku rundi ruhande, mu gihe ubuzima twari tumenyereye kubamo busa nkâ€™ubwahindutse bitewe nâ€™iki cyorezo, abenshi ubu bahindukije amaso, bayerekeza ku ikoranabuhanga na murandasi (internet). Ubu aho kugira ngo umuntu yicarane nâ€™inshuti nâ€™umuryango imbonankubone, aho baganira kandi bagahuza urugwiro, bahurira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ndetse bakaganira bifashishije ikoranabuhanga rya video. Bitandukanye na mbere ya Covid-19, ubu abantu bari gukorera mu rugo, bagakurukirana amasomo, bakaruhuka ndetse bakanakora ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye, byose kubera murandasi nâ€™ibikoresho byâ€™ikoranabuhanga nka telefoni na mudasobwa bisigaye biboneka mu buryo bworoshye.
Gusa nta byera ngo de! Kuko uko turushaho gukenera no gukoresha Ikoranabuhanga cyane, ni ko nâ€™ibyago birikomokaho birushaho kwiyongera.
Uko imibare yâ€™abakoresha murandasi irushaho kwiyongera, ni ko abayikoresha mu gukora ibyaha nâ€™ihohotera barushaho kubona uburyo bushya bwo kuturiganya, kutwiba ndetse no kutugirira nabi.
Ariko se dusubije amaso inyuma, twaba tumaze kumenyera ibyo byago byose ku buryo twumva nta ngaruka zikomeye byatugiraho? Mu gihe nta bukangurambaga bubayeho, twese dushobora kugerwaho nâ€™izo ngaruka.
Ibi bishobora kutugiraho ingaruka zinyuranye zirimo kubangamirwa, uburakari, agahinda gakabije, kumva wanze abantu ndetse rimwe na rimwe ukaba wanagambirira kwigirira nabi, bishobora no gutuma wiyahura.
Gusa ku bwâ€™amahirwe, hari imiryango igenda ivuka hirya no hino ku Isi, igamije kudufasha kumenya ibyo byago ndetse nâ€™uburyo bwo kubyirinda. Umwe muri iyo miryango witwa â€˜Get Safe Online Rwandaâ€™.
Ku bufatanye na Minisiteri yâ€™Ikoranabuhanga no Guhanga Ibishya (MINICT) ndetse nâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu Gishinzwe Ikoranabuhanga mu Itumanaho nâ€™Isakazabumenyi (RISA), uyu muryango watangije ubukangurambaga mu gihugu hose muri Nyakanga 2020 [bugamije gufasha Abanyarwanda kugira ubumenyi buhagije mu byâ€™ikoranabuhanga].
Abantu benshi bakoresha murandasi, ntibumva ubushobozi bwâ€™ingaruka ishobora kubagiraho. Abenshi ntibumva ko iyo ukanze â€˜buttonâ€™ cyangwa ka kamenyetso ko kohereza ubutumwa, ifoto cyangwa ubutumwa wohereje buba bugiye ku Isi hose, kandi umuntu akaba yabufata akabuhindura, cyangwa akabukwirakwiza ahandi kure, ku buryo uramutse ushatse ko buvaho, nkâ€™igihe ukuze ariko ugasanga ibyo wakoze ukiri umwana ntibifututse, bishobora kukugora gukuraho bwa butumwa.
Uretse no kuba abakoresha bacu, abo dushobora kuzashaka, ndetse nâ€™imiryango yacu bashobora kubona ibyo dukorera kuri murandasi, abakoreraho ibyaha nabo bashobora gukusanya amakuru yacu bakayifashisha badukorera uburiganya, batwiba cyangwa se badutera ubwoba bagamije inyungu runaka. Kuri iyi ngingo, abantu benshi bakunze kwibeshya no gutekereza ko uburiganya bwo kuri murandasi bukorerwa abandi bantu gusa, bakishyiramo ko bo bitabareba, gusa ibi ni ukwibeshya.
Ku muntu wese udafashe ingamba zifatika zo kwirinda, aba ashobora kugira ibyago birimo kuriganywa, kandi imibare yerekana ko ibi byaha biri kwiyongera mu Rwanda. Nko kuva muri Mutarama kugera muri Nzeri 2020, abantu 141 bakorewe ibikorwa byâ€™uburiganya bikorerwa kuri murandasi, kandi ibyo bikorwa byari bigamije kwiba miliyoni 371 Frw. Miliyoni 89 zaragarujwe naho arenga miriyoni 280 Frw aribwa, ba nyirayo barahomba burundu.
Ni gute ubujura bwo kuri murandasi bukorwa?
Muri bimwe mu byaha bikorwa kuri murandasi byagaragaye cyane mu mwaka wa 2020, harimo gushuka abantu hagamijwe kubiba amakuru. Ibi bikorwa binyuze mu kohereza ubutumwa bwa â€˜emailâ€™ bushukana, kwifashisha amagambo yâ€™ibanga (passwords) adafite imbaraga ndetse nâ€™ubujura bwifashisha simukadi.
Imibare itangwa nâ€™Urwego rwâ€™Igihugu rwâ€™Ubugenzacyaha, RIB, igaragaza ko mu mezi atatu u Rwanda rwamaze muri gahunda ya â€˜Guma mu Rugoâ€™, ibyaha bikorerwa kuri murandasi byiyongereye, ku buryo amafaranga yabigendeyemo yiyongereye ku kigero cya 72%.
Bamwe mu bantu bakorerwa ibi byaba bakunda kubihisha, bitewe nâ€™uko bacyeka ko biteye ipfunwe, kandi ibi bituma ikibazo kirushaho gukomera. Kugira ngo ubeho utekanye, ukwiriye kugabanya ingano yâ€™amakuru yawe bwite ushyira kuri murandasi, arimo amatariki yâ€™amavuko yawe, aderesi, amafoto adasanzwe ndetse nâ€™ibitekerezo byawe (cyane cyane ibishobora gukurura impaka).
Mu gihe ugize inkomanga ku mutima mbere yo gushyira ikintu kuri murandasi, ukwiye kubanza kugitekerezaho kabiri, byaba ngombwa ukaba uretse kubishyira hanze, ukabanza kureba ingaruka byakugiraho, ku buryo utazabyicuza. Niba kandi ugize ibyago byo gukorerwa uburiganya, si byiza kubihisha, ahubwo ni ngombwa kubimenyesha inzego zibishinzwe no kuburira abandi.
Mu gihe abantu bahugijwe nâ€™akababaro nâ€™ubwoba baterwa nâ€™iki cyorezo, abakora ibikorwa byâ€™ubujura kuri murandasi babonye urwaho rwo kwibasira abayikoresha, kandi abakorerwa iri hohoterwa bahura nâ€™ingaruka zâ€™uburyo butari bumwe.
Ibikorwa byâ€™ihohoterwa bishobora kubamo kohererezwa ubutumwa buteye isoni cyangwa bwâ€™iterabwoba, gushyira kuri murandasi amafoto cyangwa video biteye isoni, guteshwa umutwe binyuze mu kohererezwa ubutumwa bwisukiranya, gukwiza ibihuha no guhabwa amakuru atari yo ndetse nâ€™ibindi byinshi.
Ni gute wakwirinda ibyago bishobora guterwa na murandasi?
Mu gihe uri gukoresha murandasi, hari ingamba zikwiye gufatwa mu rwego rwo kwirinda ko ingaruka zayo zishobora kukugeraho.
Icya mbere ni uko utagomba gushyira ibintu kuri murandasi utabwira umuntu mu buzima busanzwe. Bivuze ko mu gihe ufite amabanga akomeye, murandasi siho hantu heza ho kubika amakuru yâ€™ibanga, kuko ibyago byâ€™uko yakwibwa cyangwa agahindurwa biba biri hejuru.
Ikindi ni uko mu gihe ubonye ibikorwa bitagushimishije, ndetse ukabona bimeze nkâ€™ihohotera, ni ngombwa ko umuntu abimenyesha inzego zirimo izâ€™umutekano ndetse nâ€™inshuti ze, kugira ngo agirwe inama muri rusange.
Ikindi ni uko ari ngombwa guhagarika (block) ibikorwa nâ€™ubutumwa ubona utishimiye. Ni ngombwa kandi kumenyesha urubuga uri gukoresha ko hari ibintu utari kwishimira, kugira ngo bikorweho iperereza. Ibi kandi bigomba kumenyeshwa abandi bantu barimo Polisi nâ€™abakuri hafi.
MU gihe abantu basigaye bakoresha telefoni mu kohererezanya amafaranga, ni ngombwa kwitondera kohereza amafaranga ku bantu utizeye, ukabanza kugenzura no gukora amasuzuma ashobora kukwereka niba uwo muntu ugiye koherereza amafaranga ari we ukwiye koko.
Kimwe mu bintu dukwiriye guha agaciro, ni uguteza imbere umuco wo kuganira ku mutekano wo kuri murandasi. Reka tujye tuganira ku mbuga dusura, ku bantu tuvugana na bo kuri murandasi ndetse no ku buriganya dukorerwa. Umutekano wo kuri murandasi uhera kuri wowe. Sura  kugira ngo umenye byinshi kuri iyi ngingo.

Iyo umunyarwanda yashakaga gufatwa nkâ€™umuzungu, hakorwaga akanama kazajya kugenzura ko yitwara kizungu. Abagize ako kanama bazaga iwe mu rugo kureba uko yitwara, bakareba niba atunze intebe nziza mu nzu, niba afite ameza, utubati, imashini yo kudoda imyenda yacitse nâ€™ibindi.

Imbuga nkoranyambaga: Ubucuruzi bwitwikiriye umutaka wo guteza imbere ubwisanzure bwo gutanga ibitekerezo.
Niba ukoresha internet usoma amakuru, ukora ubushakashatsi, uhaha cyangwa ukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga mu buryo butandukanye, ujya ubona ubutumwa bwamamaza bwikubise mu byo warimo usoma cyangwa ubona amakuru akwizaniye atari mu byo washakaga ako kanya.
Ingero, ushobora kuba uri gusoma amakuru ku rubuga rwa internet, uri kureba amashusho kuri YouTube ukabona hari ubutumwa bwikubisemo; ku rukuta rwawe rwa Facebook cyangwa Twitter, ujya uzasangaho ubutumwa bwâ€™abantu cyangwa ibigo bitari mu bo ukurikira cyangwa abagukurikira (Followers).
Ubwo ni uburyo bwo kwamamaza hakoreshejwe internet, kandi mbere yâ€™uko utangira gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga, wabanje gusinya amasezerano wemera ko ubwo butumwa uzajya ububona, nubwo abenshi basinya ayo masezerano batabanje kuyasoma.
Ushobora kuba wibaza uti â€˜izi mbunga nkoranyambaga ko tuzikoresha ku buntu, ba nyirazo bunguka iki?â€™Hari nâ€™abatekereza ko amafaranga bishyura ku mirongo yâ€™itumanaho icuruza internet, agera kuri banyirâ€™imbuga nkoranyambaga zitandukanye.
Kugira ngo usobanukirwe neza uburyo abashinze imbuga nkoranyambaga ndetse nâ€™imbuga za internet (websites and social media) bunguka, nabigusobanurira mu buryo bworoshye.
Abakoresha internet nâ€™imbuga nkoranyambaga, bameze nkâ€™abantu bazana amazi bakayasuka mu ruhombo runini ariko ku yindi mpera yâ€™urwo ruhombo, aho badashobora kureba, hakaba hari abantu bateze ibivomesho ayo mazi yisukamo, bagahita bayajyana ku isoko kuyagurisha.
Muri make, igihe cyose ukoresha internet, waba usoma amakuru cyangwa uganira nâ€™inshuti ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, ni amafaranga uba utanga. Ibi rero bishimangira ko abakoze imbuga za internet nâ€™imbuga nkoranyambaga nâ€™ingufu bahora bashyiramo mu kuzivugurura kugira ngo zirusheho kunezeza abazikoresha, ntabwo bashishikajwe cyane no guteza imbere ubwisanzure mu gutanga ibitekerezo ndetse no guhuza abantu. Intego nyamukuru ni ubucuruzi kandi bwunguka cyane.
Ni byo koko imbuga nkoranyambaga nâ€™itangazamakuru ryo kuri internet byagize uruhare rufatika mu guteza imbere ubwisanzure mu gutanga ibitekerezo. Uyu munsi, umuntu wese ashobora gufungura umuyoboro we agatangaza ibyo atekereza ku buryo bumworoheye kurusha uko byari bimeze mu bihe byashize.
Ariko ibitekerezo byose bitangwa muri ubwo bwisanzure, aho bibikwa hahinduka ikirombe gicukurwamo zahabu ibyara amafaranga menshi ku bashinze izo mbuga nkoranyambaga.
Ibi bigaragazwa nâ€™uko ibigo bifite imbuga nkoranyambaga biri mu bikize kuri iyi si. Amakuru yâ€™urubuga  agaragaza agaciro kâ€™imigabane yâ€™Ikigo Aplhabet Inc (gifite urubuga rwa Google rurimo YouTube nâ€™izindi) ku isoko ryâ€™Imari nâ€™Imigabane ( Market Cap) kageze kuri Tiliyari ($1 Trillion) yâ€™Amadolari yâ€™Amerika muri 2020, aho urubuga rwa Google rwonyine rwari wihariye hafi 80%. Iki kikaba cyarabaye ikigo cya kane mu bigo bicuruza ikoranabuhanga byesheje uwo muhigo muri Amerika.
Imibare igagagazwa nâ€™urubuga  kandi igaragaza ko agaciro kâ€™imigabane ya Facebook yari ku isoko ryâ€™imari nâ€™imigabane mu mpera za Kamena 2020 kari Miliyari 984 zâ€™Amadolari ya Amerika ($984.00 Billion)
Ako gaciro kâ€™imigabane yâ€™ibyo bigo karuta cyane umusaruro mbumbe (GDP) wâ€™ibihugu bimwe na bimwe bibarizwa muri 20 bikize ku isi (G20) birimo nka Arabia Soudite ( Miliyari 793 $), Afurika yâ€™Epfo (Miliyari 351.) cyangwa Singapore( Miliyari 372$).
Ikindi kigaraza ko imbuga nkoranyambaga ari ubucuruzi bukomeye ni uko banyirazo bari mu baherwe ba mbere ku isi. Urubuga rwa Forbes rugaragaza ko kugeza muri Kamena 2021, Mark Zuckerberg washinze Facebook yari uwa gatanu ku rutonde rwâ€™abaherwe ku isi aho umutungo we ubarirwa kuri Miliyari 97 zâ€™Amadolari ya Amerika (97$Billion), mu gihe Larry Page uri mu bashinze Google ari ku mwanya wa munani nâ€™umutungo wa Miliyari 91.5 zâ€™amadolari (91.5$Billion) akurikiwe na mugenzi bafatanije gushinga urwo rubuga, Sergey Brin nâ€™umutungo wa Miliyari 89 Zâ€™amadolari ya Amerika (89$Billion).
Ibi bigo amafaranga biyakura cyane cyane mu kwamamaza binyuze kuri izo mbuga nkoranyambaga ndetse no mu gucuruza amakuru. Amakuru yose abantu binjiza ku mbuga zitandukanye hariho ikoranabuhanga riyakusanya rikayasesengura, akagurishwa ku babafite ibigo byâ€™ubucuruzi kugira ngo bashobore gukora ibicuruzwa na serivisi bihwanye nâ€™ibyifuzo byâ€™abaguzi.
Urugero, ikigo cyâ€™ubucuruzi gishobora gushingira ku makuru abanyarwanda binjiza bakora ubushakashatsi, bashaka ibikoresho, serivisi cyangwa baganira ku mu mbuga nkoranyambaga, kikamenya ubwoko, amabara, impuzandengo yâ€™igiciro cyâ€™ibikoresho (imodoka, imyenda, mudasobwa nâ€™ibindi) abanyarwanda bakunda kugura. Ibyo bikagifasha gukora ibijyanye nâ€™ibyifuzo byâ€™abanyarwanda mu gihe gishaka gucuruza mu Rwanda.
Ibyo mu gihe byasabaga gukora ubushakashatsi buhenze bunatwara igihe ku bashinzwe guteza imbere ubucuruzi, ubu ntibigoye, ayo makuru yose aba ahari kuri buri wese ayageraho bitewe nâ€™ayo yifuza kandi kuyagura birahendutse kurusha gukora ubushakashatsi. Ikindi ni uko ayo makuru yizewe cyane kuko agaragaza ibyo abantu bakeneye, aho baherereye, ikigero cyâ€™imyaka yabo, igitsina, ubushobozi bwabo, uko imibare yabo igenda ihindagurika nâ€™ibindi.
Ubu bucuruzi bwâ€™imbuga nkoranyambaga ntabwo bugaburira ba nyirazo gusa. Ubu noneho batangiye no kuvunguriraho nâ€™abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga mu rwego rwo kubatera akanyabugabo ngo bazikoreshe cyane haboneke ibitekerezo byinshi, byumvikana ko hakenewe amakuru menshi agurishwa.
Muri iki gihe abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga bafite ababakurikira benshi na bo bahabwa amafaranga, hashingiwe ku mubare wâ€™ababakurikira, igihe abareba ibyo bashyiraho bamara nâ€™ibindi. Iyi miyoboro yâ€™imbuga nkoranyambaga ikurikirwa na benshi igakoreshwa mu kwamamaza.
Ibigo byâ€™ubucuruzi utaretse nâ€™ibya Leta nâ€™imiryango itari iya Leta ubu bitanga amafaranga ku bantu bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga cyane kugira ngo babafashe kwamamaza ibicuruzwa cyangwa gutanga ubutumwa ku babakurikira (ibyitwa influencer marketing). Ibi rero ni byo bihindura za mbuga nkoranyambaga uburucuruzi kuruta ubwisanzure bwo gutanga ibitekerezo.
Ubu bucuruzi ni bwo bituma abantu bahururira mu gushyira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zabo ibiganiro nâ€™amakuru bishitura abantu, bibakurura kugira ngo bagire ababakurikira benshi (subscribers and views) bityo bibonere umugati.
Uzasanga ku mbuga nkoranyambaga bashyiraho imitwe yâ€™inkuru zishitura abantu, ariko nufungura usange ibivugwa bitandukanye nâ€™ibyanditse. Uzabona inkuru zâ€™impimbano nyamara zitangazwa nkâ€™aho ari ukuri, ubuhamya butangwa nâ€™abantu ariko budafitiwe ibimenyetso ndetse nâ€™ababutangaza ntibite ku kubugenzura, ahubwo bakita ku kuba bukurura abantu.
Ubu noneho bamwe mu bafite imiyoboro yâ€™imbuga nkoranyambaga na bo bungutse ubundi bwenge aho bishyura abantu kugira ngo babakurikire ndetse barebe ibyo bakora. Ubu hari abantu bishyurwa kugira ngo bafate umwanya wabo barebe amashusho kuri YouTube, basangize abandi amakuru kugira ngo banyirabyo bagwize ababakurikira bityo bongere amafaranga binjiza.
Ubushakashatsi buto nakoze ku miyoboro 15 ya YouTube (channels) natoranije nkurije iyo nkuze gukurikira hano mu Rwanda nifashishije urubuga rwa  bwangaragarije umuyoboro winjiza menshi muri iyo ari ibihumbi 30 yâ€™Amadolari (30,000$) ku kwezi mu gihe uwinjiza make ari 1,200 yâ€™amadolari ya Amerika (1200$) ku kwezi.
Aya mafaranga avomwa mu gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga niyo ari inyuma yâ€™ubushake nâ€™ububyutse mubona muri iyi minsi bwâ€™abantu bahururiye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga mu Rwanda, cyane cyane YouTube, ntabwo ari uko abantu basobanukiwe nâ€™uruhare rwabo mu gutanga ibitekerezo kurushaho. Ikindi ni uko bidasaba igishoro kinini kuko telefone igendanwa irahagije kugira ngo umuntu akore Televiziyo ikorera kuri YouTube.
Gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga bikaba byaguha amafaranga si bibi, yewe byaba nâ€™igisubizo ku bibazo byâ€™ubushomeri byugarije urubyiruko. Imbuga nkoranyambaga ntizitangaza ibibi gusa nâ€™ibyangiza byonyine. Hari nâ€™andi makuru menshi zitangaza ajijura abantu.
Gusa, birakwiye ko abantu basobanukirwa ko imbuga nkoranyambaga zidakwiye gukomeza kureberwa mu mutaka wo guteza imbere ubwisanzure bwo gutanga ibitekerezo gusa, kuko abazishinga si cyo kibashishikaje cyane. Ni abacuruzi bakomeye kuruta uko ari impirimbanyi zâ€™uburenganzira bwo gutanga ibitekerezo.
Uko zigenda zigwiza amafaranga niko zigira imbagara zikomeye ndetse zishobora kugera nâ€™aho zihanga na za guverinoma mu gihe zashyizeho amabwriza cyangwa amategeko abangamira inyungu zabo. Abakoresha izi mbuga nkoranyambaga na bo kuba baratangiye kwinjiza agatubutse, bakora bagamije kwinjiza menshi, bityo ibituma bakurikirwa na benshi ni byo bibashishikaje cyane, batitaye ku kuba byangiza cyangwa bikayobya sosiyete muri rusange.
Birakwiye ko abantu babyaza umusaruro amahirwe atangwa no gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga ariko bigakorwa hirindwa kuyoborwa nâ€™inda bigatuma abantu batangaza ibinyoma, ibihuha nâ€™ibindi ibyangiza rubanda. Birashoboka cyane gutangaza ibyubaka ndetse nâ€™ayo mafaranga ukayakorera.

Inkotanyi ni amasomo kuri twese
Icyizwi ku bayobozi bayoboye kuri Repubulika ya mbere nâ€™iya kabiri, ni uko bose baranzwe nâ€™imitegekere mibi ibiba amacakubiri nâ€™ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside mu Banyarwanda.
Iyo mitegekere mibi yabyaye kwirukana mu gihugu Abatutsi,kubatwikira, kubamenesha ndetse no kubagira impunzi. Abahunze bahungiye mu bihugu nka Tanzania,Uganda,Congo, Burundi nâ€™ahandi.
Amacakubiri nâ€™imitegekere mibi yari mu Rwanda yabyaye Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu mwaka wa 1994 aho Abatutsi barenga Miliyoni bishwe bazira ubusa,bazira uko basal,bazira uko bavutse.
Ku itariki 25 Ukuboza mu mwaka 1987 havutse Umuryango RPF-Inkotanyi ugamije kuzura u Rwanda no kubohora Abanyarwanda.
Inkotanyi zaranzwe nâ€™ubutwari, umutima ukomeye, Urukundo rwâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™urwâ€™Abanyarwanda ndetse no kurwanya imitegekere mibi yose yari mu Rwanda.
Zashyize imbere guharanira ko iyo miyoborere mibi yari mu Rwanda icika kandi zabigezeho zibohora u Rwanda nâ€™Abanyarwanda, zibavana kuri iyo ngoyi. Uretse iyo miyoborere mibi, Inkotanyi zanahagaritse Jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi, zirokora abicwaga.
Hari amsomo menshi abanditsi ndetse nâ€™Abanyarwanda twigira ku Nkotanyi zabohoye u Rwanda.
Muri ayo masomo twavuga nko Gukunda u Rwanda nâ€™Abanyarwanda. Iri ni isomo rikomeye ko twese dukwiriye gukomeza kurangwa nâ€™urukundo rwâ€™u Rwanda nkuko byaranze Inkotanyi bakemera gusiga byose, bakaza ku rugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda.
Inkotanyi kandi tuzigiraho indangagaciro yâ€™ubutwari. Nubwo bari bato, ntibatinye amasasu ubwo urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu rwatangiraga, ntibatinye inzara cyangwa imvura. Bahisemo gukotanira kuzura u Rwanda. Iri ni isomo ku banyarwanda ko dukwiriye kuba Intwari muri byose tukubaka u Rwanda, nta gucika intege kabone nâ€™iyo byaba bisaba ubwitange.
Inkotanyi zaranzwe nâ€™indangagaciro yo kureba kure, guca bugufi,kujya inama, kwihuta,kutazarira no gutekereza ku buryo bwagutse.
Izi ndangagaciro zose zaranze Inkotanyi Abanyarwanda muri rusange dukwiriye kuzimakaza kugira ngo bidufashe kugera ku ntsinzi yo kubaka u Rwanda ababohoye u Rwanda bifuzaga.
Abanyarwanda dukwiriye kwishimira ko twabonye abo twigiraho imikorere myiza nâ€™imyifatire bibereye Intore zâ€™u Rwanda.
Dukwiriye rero gukomeza kuzirikana ko dufitanye igihango nâ€™Inkotanyi cyo kuba abarinzi bâ€™ibyagezweho kandi tukabyubakiraho ibindi bikorwa byinshi.
Abanyarwanda twese tuzirikane indangagaciro dukesha Inkotanyi zaduhaye Ubuzima. Tujye duhora tuzirikana ko hari za kirazira zabafashije kubohora u Rwanda zirimo kudatatira Igihango, cyaraziraga kumena amaraso ya mwene Kanyarwanda, cyaraziraga kubiba amacakubiri muri bene Kanyarwanda, cyaraziraga kuba Ikigwari,cyaraziraga kugambanira mwene Kanyarwanda nâ€™ibindi byabaye imbarutso yo gutsinda urugamba.
Inkotanyi ni indorerwamo yacu twese mu mitekereze,imyifatire ndetse nâ€™ibikorwa byose bigamije kubaka u Rwanda. Dukomere ku ndangagaciro na Kirazira twigira ku Nkotanyi bizadufasha kubaka u Rwanda ndetse nâ€™Afurika dushaka.
Urubyiruko rwâ€™u Rwanda rurahirwa kuko Inkotanyi zaranzwe nâ€™izo ndangagaciro. Dukomere kuri icyo Gihango bizadufasha kubaka u Rwanda ndetse nâ€™Afurika twifuza!
Raporo ya â€˜Rwanda Vital Statisticsâ€™ yâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu Gishinzwe Ibarurishamibare (NISR), yo mu 2019, hagaragajwe ko mu mwaka wa 2019, gatanya zatanzwe mu Rwanda mu buryo bwemewe nâ€™amategeko zari 8.941.
Ni imibare yazamutse cyane kuko mu 2018 hari hatanzwe gatanya 1311, ni ukuvuga ko zikubye inshuro 6.8. mu Mujyi wa Kigali hatanzwe gatanya 2400, mu Majyepfo hatangwa gatanya 1989, mu Burengerazuba hatanzwe gatanya 1820, mu Burasirazuba hatanzwe 1482 naho mu Majyaruguru hatangwa gatanya 1250.
Imbuga nkoranyambaga: Birakwiye ko ziba gasenyamiryango?
Imibare ya NISR igaragaza ko ufashe gatanya zatanzwe mu 2019 ukagereranya nâ€™imiryango yashyingiwe mu buryo bwemewe nâ€™amategeko uwo mwaka, wavuga ko nibura mu miryango 100, imiryango 18.4 yatandukanye.
imibare yatanzwe nâ€™Urukiko rwâ€™Ikirenga umwaka ushize igaragaza ko imanza za gatanya zakiriwe hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga mu 2016 zari 21, mu 2018 ziba 69 naho 2018 zigera 1311.
Imbuga nkoranyambaga ziratungwa agatoki?
Muri iyi minsi turi mu bihe byâ€™ikoranabuhanga, hari benshi bemeza ko izi gatanya zifitanye isano nâ€™ikwirakwira ryâ€™ikoranabuhanga cyane cyane imbuga nkoranyambaga, kuko bamwe ribashuka bakarikoresha mu bikorwa byâ€™ishimishamubiri, bakamenyaniraho nâ€™abantu bazatuma imiryango yabo isenyuka, mbega ugasanga ryababereye ikibazo aho kubabera igisubizo.
Mu byâ€™ukuri ikoranabuhanga si igikoresho cya Satani nkâ€™uko bamwe babikeka, ahubwo ni igikoresho cyakomotse ku bwenge Imana yahaye abantu, cyagakwiye no kuba igituma ubuzima bwabo burushaho kuba bwiza, aho kubusenya.
Uretse kuba imbuga nkoranyambaga zisigaye zisenya imiryango myinshi, zanahungabanyije uburere bwâ€™abana kuko zisigaye zituma imiryango itakibona umwanya wo kuganira, abana bakabura umwanya wo kwisanzura ku babyeyi babo nyamara uruhare rwâ€™umubyeyi ku burere bwâ€™umwana rukaba ari ntasimburwa.
Imbuga nkoranyambaga zabaye nkâ€™irangamuntu nshya, kuko hari ubwo usanga umuntu utajya abwira umukunzi we ko amukunda, ashobora kugira atya akabimubwirira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, cyangwa se umuntu udafite ubumenyi buhagije mu kintu runaka ugasanga yabaye inararibonye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ari gusobanura uko ibintu bikorwa nâ€™uko bigenda nyamara nta bumenyi abifiteho.
Izi mbuga kandi zabaye inzira yo gukwirakwiza imico mibi iganisha ku busambanyi, aho usanga umugabo cyangwa umugore azirirwaho yibwira ko aganira nâ€™abantu bamukunda, nyamara wajya kureba neza ugasanga abo bantu atanabazi, ari uko gusa bahuriye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, yarakuruwe gusa nâ€™ikimero nâ€™ibindi birungo byisigwa nâ€™abo bantu.
Abantu bakunze kwirengagiza ko izi mbuga zitwara ni umwanya munini abazikoresha, kandi buryo ugutwaye umwanya aba agutwaye ubuzima. Dukwiriye rero kwisuzuma tukareba uburyo dukoresha izi mbuga, tukareba niba zituzanira inyungu cyangwa igihombo.
Niba ziguteranya nâ€™uwo mwashakanye cyangwa zigatuma ubura umwanya uha abana nâ€™abandi bantu, ni ikimenyetso cyâ€™uko ukwiye kugerageza ukagabanya igihe uzimaraho.
Mu gitabo cyâ€™Umubwiriza mu gice cya Gatatu, yaravuze ngo â€œBuri kintu kigira umwanya wacyo, kandi icyo uha agaciro nicyo uha umwanya muniniâ€, niyo mpamvu dukwiye kwisuzuma tukareba niba abantu bâ€™ingenzi mu buzima bwacu tukibaha umwanya, cyangwa tuwumara ku bantu batatwitayeho muri rusange.
Mu byâ€™ukuri imbuga nkoranyambaga ni nziza kuko zidufasha byinshi, ndetse wavuga ko ubuzima bwacu busigaye buzishingiyeho. Birakwiye ko dukomeza kuzibyaza umusaruro, tukamenyana nâ€™abantu kandi tukamenya amakuru arimo Ijambo ryâ€™Imana, ariko ntidukwiye kuzemerera kutubera imbogamizi mu buzima bwacu, kugira ngo ejo nâ€™ejo bundi tutazasanga twarabaye ingaruzwamuheto ya Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp, Instagram nâ€™izindi.
Uwanga u Rwanda arakabura u Rwanda, arushakire aho atazarubona.
Buri mwaka tariki ya 4 Nyakanga twizihiza Umunsi wo Kwibohora. Uyu munsi hashize imyaka 27 u Rwanda rwibohoye. Ariko rwakwibohora rwagira ruracyari mu rugendo rwo gukomeza kwibohora, ntabwo rurarangiza kuko rwageze kure hatagira kure handi hashoboka. Rwibohoye amacakubiri mu bana barwo, ari na yo yarugejeje aho rwari ruri. Abana babo basubizwa agaciro kâ€™Ubunyarwanda rwari rwaranyazwe nâ€™abanzi bâ€™amahoro yarwo.
Urugendo rutoroshye rwo kwibohora ruracyakomeza nubwo aho rugeze ari aho kwishimirwa. Nidukomerereze aho tubohore imyumvire yacu. Iyo myumvire twapakiwemo imyaka myinshi, tukabuzwa gutekereza ngo duhitemo icyiza twemye. Iyo myumvire yâ€™ubuhezanguni, henshi yigwaga mu mashuri kandi ubuhezanguni iyo buguheranye buvamo indwara idakira imunga ubwonko ikabusiga butagikora, budashobora kukuyobora neza.
Turacyari mu rugendo rwo kwibohora ubukene. Muri urwo rugendo rwâ€™inkubiri, twibohore igihatse byose, ari cyo ingengabitekerezo yâ€™urwango, ari yo yavuyemo Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Ingangabitekerezo yahekuye benshi kandi hari abo yagize imbata. Tutayiranduye burundu twazasubizwa muri ya minsi icuraburindi ryasimbuye izuba, ijoro ridacya rigasimbura umucyo. Nitutayirwanya ngo tuyitsinde, nitutayitaho ngo tuyibohore nâ€™ibyo twibohoye twabiha ingufu zo kugaruka, tugasubira aho tutazikura. Ntitwibagirwe aho twavuye, ejo tutazasubirayo, agaciro twihaye kakazapfa ubusa.
Rubyiruko rwacu ni mwe mizero dufite, muzirinde kwikorera amateka mabi, mutigeze mugiramo uruhare. Mumenye kwibohora ubujiji, amateka mabi agumane banyirayo. Nimwibohore ingoyi yâ€™ubujiji ni cyo mukeneye mbere yâ€™ibindi. Igihugu kikujijura kiba kikwifuriza gutera imbere. Ndabifuriza kutagira ababyeyi gito bazabaraga ubuhezanguni kuko burya umubyeyi gito araga abana ibyamunaniye.
Aho turi hose turate u Rwanda, burya igihugu kiruta byose. Uyu munsi tuzahore tuwuzirikana kuko twawugezeho twabiruhiye. Kugira ngo uyu munsi ushoboke watwaye ibitambo byinshi. Kubyibagirwa ni ukwiyahura. Abana bâ€™u Rwanda bahasize ubuzima kandi nta cyabusimbura. Ntitugomba kwibagirwa uyu munsi, watumye abana bâ€™u Rwanda bagarura ubumuntu, amahoro agasimbura amahano, ubuhezanguni bukaba icyaha kuko nta wuhitamo aho avuka.
Ku Munsi nkâ€™uyu wo Kwibohora, ntidukangwe nâ€™ibihinda byâ€™inyangabirama zisebya u Rwanda ziririmba Jenoside ebyiri. Niba atari injiji mu mitwe ni injiji mu mitima cyangwa ubugome bwasimbuye ubwenge bakibagirwa amateka bazaraga urubyiruko.
Urugero muri nyinshi nabaha ni uru: hashize imyaka 75, Jenoside yakorerwaga Abayahudi mu Burayi ihagaritswe nâ€™ingabo za Amerika zagombye gutabara izâ€™u Burayi mu ntambara ya kabiri yâ€™isi yose. Izo ngabo zatwitse umugi wa Dresden uri mu majyepfo yâ€™u Budage. Bivugwa kandi ko uwo mujyi warimo inganda nyinshi, zicura intwaro zajyanwaga kurimbura Abayahudi.
Tariki ya 13 Gashyantare 1945, ingabo za Amerika nâ€™izâ€™u Bwongeleza zishyize hamwe zitwikisha za bombe uwo mujyi, ibyarimo byose birashya ndetse nâ€™abantu. Tariki ya 14 Gashyantare indege ziragaruka zihatera noneho toni 750 za bombe. Bivugwa ko hatewe toni 2978 mu mujyi wa Dresden. Hapfuye inzirakarengane zitabarika zirenga miliyoni, zirimo nâ€™Abayahudi bari bahahungiye Jenoside yabakorerwaga kuko intambara itarobanura.
Ubu amagambo avuga ko habaye Jenoside mu mujyi wa Dresden, asigaye mu bahezanguni bakumbuye ubutegetsi bwâ€™Abanazi twagereranya na Hutu pawa mu Rwanda. Abo na bo kandi bahaguruka iyo icyunamo cyâ€™Abayahudi cyegereje. Nyamara ibyo byatangiye kuvugwa, iyo Jenoside yakorewe Abayahudi igihagarikwa nâ€™ingabo zâ€™isi yose zishyize hamwe, ntibyatumye habaho ihakana nâ€™ipfobya bya Jenoside yabakorewe, kandi ntibivuze ko habaye Jenoside yakorewe Abadage.
Jenoside yakorewe Abatututsi yakozwe nâ€™Abanyarwanda, ihagarikwa nâ€™abana barwo nta munyamahanga ubafashije. Ahubwo amahanga yari kubafasha ni yo yabarwanyaga ngo idahagarara kubera kuyigiramo uruhare. Ni yo mpamvu kuvuga ko mu Rwanda habaye Jenoside ebyiri bitagomba kugira uwo bikanga kuko ari intambara tuzarwana igihe isi izaba ikimeze uko imeze none. Amateka akwiye kutubera urugero.
Uyu munsi ukwiye kuba uwo kwibaza uko twahangana nâ€™ipfobya nâ€™ihakana bya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kuko ari yo ntwaro abanzi basigaye bakoresha basebya igihugu cyacu nâ€™ubuyobozi bwacyo.
Ntidukwiye gutega amatwi abatubeshya demokarasi iwabo nta yihari, usinziriye atabibona ni uwisinzirije. Demokarasi ya mbere ni ukubaha amateka nâ€™indangagaciro byacu tuzaraga abo tubyara. Demokarasi ya mbere ni ukuba ufite ubuzima, icyo urya nâ€™aho uryama. Demokarasi ya mbere ni amahoro nâ€™umutekano.
Indangagaciro zâ€™ababivuga si zo zacu. Indangagaciro zabo ni nyamwinshi. Nyamwinshi yabo kandi si amoko ni politiki na yo bahora bahindura uko bashaka kuko buri wese areba inyungu. Nyamwinshi yabo zi ubwoko badupfunyikiye kuko turi ubwoko bumwe, twese turi bene Kanyarwanda. Iyo nyamwinshi badupfunyikiye ntayo iba mu Rwagasabo kuko turi ubwoko bumwe Nyarwanda. Badupfunyikiye nyamwinshi na bo batasobanukiwe, nyamwinshi yâ€™ibitekerezo bayihindura nyamwinshi yâ€™ubwoko buhimbano bwadutesheje agaciro bukatwambura Ubunyarwanda. Ubumuntu batwambuye bakatugira ikintu, uyu munsi twarabwisubije tububumbatire butaducika.
Ni nde wakwibagirwa uyu munsi muri 1994, abantu bakicwa bazira uko bavutse? Hashize imyaka 27, ubwirakabiri bwabyaye umucyo.
Ni nde wakwibagirwa aho inkotanyi zakuye u Rwanda? Ni nde wakwibagirwa ko zatanze ibitambo byinshi kugira ngo u Rwanda rutazimangana ku ikarita yâ€™isi? Ni nde wakwibagirwa ko zazanye amahoro amahanga aturebera, nubwo abenshi twasigaye mapfubyi? Ni nde? Ni nde? Ni nde wakwibagirwa bigakunda, uretse uwarwifurizaga kuba umuyonga?
Nkotanyi bana bâ€™u Rwanda, ni nde wakwibagirwa igiciro mwatanze, cyo gusiga ibyanyu mugasiga abanyu, mukitanga mutizigama inzara nâ€™inyota bitagira urugero, mugasiga imiryango mugasiga byose kugira ngo urwa Gasabo rugire ituze? Ni nde wakwibagirwa urubyiruko rutabonye intsinzi, rukagwa mu mashyamba rurwanira amahoro, ababyeyi bakamarira abana ku rugamba, hakaba hari abasigaye bigunze kandi bari barabyaye?
Gutanga umwana byasimburwa nâ€™iki? Gutanga amaraso ngo urokore ayandi twabinganya iki? Ni nde wakwibagirwa agaciro mwatweretse ko kudahora nyamara urwango rukiri rwose? Ni nde wakwibagirwa aho mwakuye impunzi mutibagiwe nâ€™abahekuye u Rwanda? Ni nde wakwibagirwa ubumuntu mwashubije inzirabwoba, maze mukishyira hamwe mukiyunga, mukatubera urugero rwo kubana nkâ€™Abanyarwanda, Ubwiyunge bukava mu byiyumviro bukaba bwarahindutse ihame nubwo urugendo rukiri rwose?
Muzabyare muzaheke, muzasubize ingobyi imugongo, maze mwuzukuruze ingoma ibihumbi, u Rwanda rukomeze rwibaruke intwari.
Gutuka Perezida wa Repubulika ni ukwikenya
bikaba akaga gakomeye iyo umututse aba yitirirwa izina ryâ€™Imana cyangwa ushyira Bibiliya imbere akayikurikirisha amagambo ameze nkâ€™ubumara bwica abayumva.
Ikindi kandi twabonye ko yaba mu mategeko mbonezamubano, muri za kirazira zâ€™umuco Nyarwanda no mu ijambo ryâ€™Imana kubaha ni ibwiriza mbonezabupfura, bikaba inkomoko yâ€™umugisha kâ€™ubikoze kandi gutukana bikaba icyaha, byagera ku gutuka ukuruta byo bikakubera akaga kagukururira umuvumo nâ€™urupfu.
Muri iki gice cya kabiri tugiye kurebera hamwe uburyo Imana ibona kandi ifata Perezida wa Repubulika mu buryo bwihariye, ingaruka zizanwa no kumutuka haba ku muntu ku giti cye (umututse), ku babyumva bakabishyigikira no ku gihugu muri rusange.
Umwanditsi wâ€™igitabo cyâ€™Umubwiriza muri Bibiliya igice cya 10:16-17, avuga uburyo Imana ifata umuyobozi mukuru wâ€™igihugu, ibyago nâ€™amahirwe abagituye bagira bitewe nâ€™imyitwarire ye.
Yagize ati "Wa gihugu we, iyo ufite umwami ari umwana muto, kandi ibikomangoma byawe bikaba ibiryakare, uba ubonye ishyano. Wa gihugu we, ube uhiriwe iyo ufite umwana wâ€™imfura ho umwami, kandi ibikomangoma byawe bikarya mu gihe gikwiriye, kugira ngo bigire amagara bitarimo isindwe."
Uyu mwanditsi akomeza asaba abantu kwirinda gutuka umwami. Agira ati â€œNtugatuke umwami ndetse ntukabitekereze, ntugatuke abakire uri mu nzu uryamamo, kuko inyoni yo mu kirere yagurukana ijwi ryawe, kandi igifite amababa cyabyamamaza.â€ (Umubwiriza 10:20).
Ubu butumwa bujya gusa neza nâ€™uburi muri 1 Timoteyo 2:1;2 hagira hati â€œIrya mbere ya byose ndaguhugurira kwingingira abantu bose no kubasengera no kubasabira no kubashimira ariko cyane cyane abami nâ€™abatware bose kugira ngo duhore mu mahoro tutabona ibyago, twubaha Imana kandi twitonda rwose.â€™â€™
Perezida wa Repubulika ni umuntu umwe rukumbi mu gihugu ufite inshingano zihariye, udafite undi wagereranya nawe, ni ikirango gikuru cyâ€™igihugu, akaba nâ€™umurinzi wâ€™ibindi birango byâ€™igihugu. Ni umugaba mukuru wâ€™ikirenga wâ€™ingabo zâ€™igihugu, ni umurinzi wâ€™itegeko risumba ayandi mu gihugu nâ€™andi mategeko arishamikiyeho. Uretse Imana yo mu ijuru, Perezida ni we wenyine mu gihugu uca iteka ryâ€™urupfu nâ€™ubuzima bikaba bityo.
Imana ifata Perezida wa Repubulika nkâ€™umuyoboro wâ€™ibyago cyangwa amahirwe nkâ€™uko twabisomye mu Umubwiriza kandi imufata nkâ€™umusingi wâ€™amahoro ku gihugu nkâ€™uko Timoteyo abivuga. Iyo igihugu gifite Umukuru wâ€™Igihugu mwiza kandi wubashywe nâ€™abenegihugu, kibona amahirwe nâ€™amahoro.
Intumwa Pawulo mu rwandiko yandikiye Itorero ryâ€™i Roma, yahuguriye abakirisitu kubaha ubuyobozi, ababwira ko kubaha ubuyobozi ari imwe mu nzira yo kubaho neza kandi ari uburyo bwo kubaha Imana ariko ku rundi ruhande yaberetse nâ€™ingaruka zizagera ku muntu wese utazubaha ubuyobozi.
Yabisobanuye muri aya magambo, agira ati â€œUmuntu wese agandukire abatware bamutwara, kuko ari nta butware butava ku Mana, nâ€™abatware bariho bashyizweho nâ€™Imana. Ni cyo gituma ugandira umutware aba yanze itegeko ryâ€™Imana, kandi abaryanga bazatsindwa nâ€™urubanza. Abatware si abo gutinywa nâ€™abakora ibyiza, keretse abakora nabi. Imyaka ijana irashize ishyaka CPC riri ku butegetsi mu Bushinwa ridatezuka ku ntego zaryo.
Harabura iminsi mike gusa ngo ishyaka riri ku butegetsi mu Bushinwa [Communist Party of China:CPC] ryizihize imyaka ijana rimaze ribayeho. Ku rundi ruhande abatware babwo barwana hagati yabo, bituma igihugu kigwa mu manga ndetse nâ€™abaturage bâ€™u Bushinwa barahazaharira.
Ibi byatumye abakunda igihugu bashakisha inzira zo kukizahura no gukura abaturage mu bibazo, ariko ntibyaborohera kuko yaba gukura abaturage mu bukene, gukora impinduka, gushyiraho amategeko agenga ingoma yâ€™ubwami ndetse no gushyiraho impinduka za demokarasi byose byaranze.
Iki gihe ni bwo ishyaka rya CPC ryavutse muri Nyakanga 1921. Guhera ubwo iri shyaka ryafashije abaturage kugera ku byishimo nyabyo ndetse no guhindura igihugu gishya.

Gusa nyuma yo kunyura muri byinshi no gukurikira intero igira iti â€œbohora ibitekerezo, ushakire ukuri ku bimenyetsoâ€, CPC yafashe umwanzuro wo gukora impinduka no kuvuga byose bigamije gukuraho ubukungu bwâ€™u Bushinwa.
Icya kabiri, CPC ntiyigeze ihindura icyerekezo, yagumanye intego yatangiranye yo guteza imbere abaturage. Kuko iterambere rishyirwaho nâ€™abaturage, rikaba iryâ€™abaturage kandi rigasangirwa nâ€™abaturage. Kurwanya ubukene ni kimwe mu ngero zifatika zigaragaza uku kudatezuka ku cyerekezo cyayo.

Ishyano rikomeye risigaye ryaragwiriye urwa Gasabo ni ukumva umuntu wifatira mu gahanga Perezida wa Repubulika akamutuka kandi ukabona abenshi babifashe nkâ€™ibintu bisanzwe, abandi bakabyita uburenganzira bwo kuvuga icyo umuntu atekereza nâ€™ibindi bigayitse.
Ku mbuga nkoranyambaga nka YouTube, Facebook, Instagram nâ€™izindi uhasanga abantu batandukanye, yaba abiyita abanyapolitiki, impirimbanyi zâ€™uburenganzira bwa muntu nâ€™abandi bavuga ko bari kugaragaza ibitekerezo byabo, banenga ibitagenda mu miyoborere yâ€™igihugu ariko ugasanga mu byo bita ibitekerezo hibanzemo kubahuka, kwibasira no gutuka Umukuru wâ€™Igihugu.
Ubusanzwe mu muco Nyarwanda gutukana ni kirazira naho mu muco wa Gikiristu gutukana bikaba icyaha. Mu ndangagaciro zâ€™umuco wa Kinyarwanda, buri muryango wose utoza abana gukura bubaha ariko cyane cyane bakubaha ababaruta.
Gusuzugura cyangwa kubahuka umukuru bifatwa nko kubura ikinyabupfura, akenshi bikagaragaza umwana wabuze uburere, iyo bigeze ku gutinyuka ugukuriye ukamutuka, bifatwa nkâ€™ishyano ryaguye bikururira ubikoze guhabwa ibihano bikomeye, byagera ku gutuka umubyeyi cyangwa umukuru wâ€™umuryango bikaba byakururira ubikoze kuvumwa no gucibwa mu muryango. Akenshi iyo umwana atutse umubyeyi we uwo mwana bakunda kumwita igikenya.
"Wubahe so na nyoko uko Uwiteka Imana yawe yagutegetse, kugira ngo uramire mu gihugu Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha, uboneremo ibyiza.â€(Gutegeka Kwa Kabiri 5:16,18.20; Abefeso 6.2,3)
Uretse no kuba Umukuru wâ€™Igihugu, Perezida wa Repubulika aba ari nâ€™umuntu, ufite ibyiyumviro byose, ushobora kubabara cyangwa kwishima, gukomereka haba mu marangamutima, mu mitekerereze no mu mwuka bitewe nâ€™amagambo mabi cyangwa ibitutsi bamutuka. Ni umuntu ufite ubumuntu kandi ufite uburenganzira nâ€™amategeko amurengera nkâ€™undi mwenegihugu wese.
Ikigeretse kuri ibyo kandi Perezida wa Repubulika aba ari umubyeyi mu buryo bubiri. Ubwa mbere ni umubyeyi, ufite umuryango we bwite, ufite abana nâ€™abamukomokaho bagomba kubahwa kandi bakarindwa gukomeretswa mu marangamutima nâ€™ibitutsi bitukwa umubyeyi wabo. Nkâ€™abandi bana bose, abâ€™Umukuru wâ€™Igihugu bakeneye kubona umubyeyi wabo yubashywe nkâ€™abandi babyeyi bose.
Ubwa kabiri, Umukuru wâ€™Igihugu ni umubyeyi wâ€™abenegihugu mu maso yâ€™abandi baturage bâ€™ibindi bihugu. Abenegihugu hose burya baba bagize umuryango mugari wâ€™abatuye igihugu runaka, ni yo mpamvu itegeko rya Repubulika yâ€™u Rwanda rigaruka ku ijambo rivuga ngo umuryango Nyarwanda, ni ukuvuga ko umuryango Nyarwanda ugizwe nâ€™Abanyarwanda bose kandi nta muryango utagira umubyeyi, uyu muryango Nyarwanda burya umubyeyi uba ufite ni Perezida wa Repubulika.
Abana bagize umuryango Nyarwanda, bafite inshingano zo kubaha no kubahisha umubyeyi cyangwa umukuru wâ€™uyu muryango, bakwiye kubabazwa nâ€™umuntu wese umwubahutse akamutuka, akamuvuga nabi ndetse bafite inshingano zo kumurinda no kugaragariza umuntu wese umututse ko batishimiye ko abatukiye umubyeyi.
Mu mategeko icumi Imana yahaye umuryango wâ€™inyokomuntu ibicishije mu kuyabwira umuryango wa Israel harimo itegeko rikomeye risaba umwana wese kubaha umubyeyi kandi rigaragaza nâ€™inyungu uzabikora azabona. Izo nyungu ni "ukuramira mu gihugu no kukibamo unezerewe" bivuze ko uwishe iri tegeko agerwaho nâ€™ingaruka zo kutumvira no kutubaha arizo "gukenyuka no kuba mu gihugu utanezerewe".
Itegeko ryâ€™Imana ni ihame riba rigomba kubahirizwa uryubahirije akabona umugisha uryishe akabona umuvumo. Kutubaha umubyeyi bizana umuvumo wo gukenyuka, kubaho utishimye ni yo mpamvu iyi nyandiko yacu twayihaye umutwe ugira uti "gutuka Perezida wa Repubulika ni ukwikenya."
Uretse kandi Perezida wa Repubulika nâ€™umubyeyi ukubyara, Imana isaba umuntu wese kubaha umuntu umukuriye. Bibiliya mu Gitabo cyâ€™Abalewi 19:32 hagira hati "Ujye uhagurukira umeze imvi, wubahe umusaza, utinye Imana yawe. Ndi Uwiteka. "Ni inshingano zâ€™abakiri bato kubaha abakuru kandi nâ€™abakuru na bo bafite inshingano zo kudasharirira abato nkâ€™uko Intumwa Pawulo yabyandikiye Itorero rya Efeso agira ati "1 Bana, mujye mwumvira ababyeyi banyu mu Mwami wacu, kuko ari byo bibakwiriye. Wubahe so na nyoko (iryo ni ryo tegeko rya mbere ririmo isezerano), kugira ngo ubone amahoro uramire mu isi. Namwe ba se ntimugasharirire abana banyu, ahubwo mubarere mubahana, mubigisha ibyâ€™Umwami wacu.â€ (Abefeso 6:1;4).
Iyo urebye ibyo ijambo ryâ€™Imana rimaze kutubwira mu bitabo dusomye, ukareba nâ€™ibikorwa muri ino minsi uhita usobanukirwa impamvu yo gukenyuka mu buryo butandukanye mu rubyiruko no kubaho abenshi bashaririwe nâ€™ubuzima. Abana benshi ntibacyubaha abakuru, ugera mu modoka ugasanga umwana aricaye na ecouteur mu matwi, umusaza wâ€™imvi zâ€™uruyenzi ahagaze, umwana akaba atamwimukira, ku murongo ahatangirwa serivisi zitandukanye usanga urubyiruko rubyigana nâ€™abasaza nâ€™ibindi ariko kubaha abadukuriye ni ihame kandi ni itegeko ryâ€™Imana riduha umugisha wo kurama no kubaho twishimye.
Biratangaza, birababaza kandi bitera kwibaza byinshi, aho ubona umuntu wiyita umukirisitu, umukozi wâ€™Imana afata Bibiliya akayihisha inyuma, undi akihisha mu mwambaro uriho umusaraba cyangwa ikanzu yâ€™abihaye Imana, akifatira Perezida wa Repubulika mu gahanga akamutuka akamwandagaza, cyangwa agahamagarira abantu kwigomeko no kwigumura ku mabwiriza yâ€™ubuyobozi bukuru bwâ€™igihugu kandi abandi bakirisitu na bo bakabireba cyangwa bakabyumva bagaceceka bakumva ntacyo bitwaye ariko ibi ni ishyano ryagwiriye igihugu cyacu kandi rikizanamo umwuka wo gukenyuka no kubaho abantu batishimye.
Intumwa Pawulo mu rwandiko yandikiye Itorero ryâ€™i Roma, yahuguriye abakirisitu baho kubaha ubuyobozi, ababwira ko kubaha ubuyobozi ari imwe mu nzira yo kubaho neza kandi ari uburyo bwo kubaha Imana ariko ku rundi ruhande yaberetse nâ€™ingaruka zizagera ku muntu wese utazubaha ubuyobozi.
Yabisobanuye muri aya magambo, ati "Umuntu wese agandukire abatware bamutwara, kuko ari nta butware butava ku Mana nâ€™abatware bariho bashyizweho nâ€™Imana. Ni cyo gituma ugandira umutware aba yanze itegeko ryâ€™Imana, kandi abaryanga bazatsindwa nâ€™urubanza. Abatware si abo gutinywa nâ€™abakora ibyiza, keretse abakora nabi. Mbese ushaka kudatinya umutware? Kora neza na we azagushima, kuko ari umukozi wâ€™Imana uguhesha ibyiza. Ariko nukora nabi utinye, kuko adatwarira inkota ubusa. Ni umukozi wâ€™Imana, uhoresha umujinya ukora nabi." (Abaroma 13:1;4). Aya magambo Pawulo yabwiye abaroma tuzayagarukaho mu gice cya kabiri cyâ€™iyi nyandiko.
Umuntu wese akwiye kwirinda gusuzugura, gutuka umukuriye byâ€™umwihariko Perezida wa Repubulika. Urubyiruko byâ€™umwihariko, dukwiye kwirinda kugwa mu mutego wâ€™abanyapolitiki, abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga mu buryo butandukanye bagambiriye kubabibamo umwuka wo kwigomeka no gutuka ababyeyi banyu, kuko kwifatanya nabo bituzanira umuvumo wo gukenyuka no kubaho tutishimiye ibyiza byo mu gihugu ariko ijambo ryâ€™Imana ritubwira ko nitwemera tukumvira tuzarya ibyiza byo mu gihugu ariko nitwanga tukagoma inkota izaturya.
Mu gice cya kabiri tuzarebera hamwe uburyo Imana ibona kandi ifata Perezida wa Repubulika mu buryo bwihariye, ingaruka zizanwa no kumutuka haba ku muntu ku giti cye (umututse), kubabyumva bakabishyigikira no ku gihugu muri rusange.
"Nimwemera mukumvira muzarya ibyiza byo mu gihugu. Ariko nimwanga mukagoma inkota izabarya", kuko akanwa kâ€™Uwiteka ari ko kabivuze." (Yesaya 1:19-20)
Gutanga igihugu mu maboko yâ€™ababisha ni ukwirahuriraho umuriro.
Kuva kera buri Munyarwanda yatozwaga kwimana igihugu mu maboko yâ€™ababisha, kurengera igihugu nâ€™abagituye, agaharanira ko u Rwanda rugira ijambo, rugasumbya icyubahiro nâ€™ishema ibindi bihugu. Abanyarwanda batozwaga kubaha no gusigasira indangagaciro, bakimika umuco wa kirazira.
Abanyarwanda batozwaga kandi no kubumbatira ubumwe, bakarengera ubusugire bwâ€™umuryango wo shingiro ryo kuramuka kwâ€™igihugu.
Uwahemukiraga umuryango yahamagazwaga muri gacaca, agakubitwa icyuhagiro kugira ngo asubire mu muryango agarukanye umutima wâ€™Igihugu, uwinangiraga umutima, yafatwaga nkâ€™umubisha, ntahabwe ijambo na gato, ntagere mu gitaramo cyâ€™abahizi. Guhezwa mu gitaramo cyari igihano gikomeye kubera ko byarakugoraga kuzagabana nkâ€™abandi.
U Rwanda rwubatswe kandi rwagurwa nâ€™ubutwari, aho buri wese yaharaniraga kutagaragarwaho nâ€™ubugwari. Ingabo ku rugamba zaharaniraga kudatanga igihugu mu maboko yâ€™ababisha.
Mu 1924, abakoloni bakuyeho Itorero ryâ€™Igihugu ryari irerero ryatozaga imico myiza nâ€™imyifatire myiza mu bantu. Gusenya ibikorwa byâ€™Itorero byatumye Abanyarwanda bacika igikuba, maze uburere nâ€™ikinyabupfura bikomwa mu nkokora nâ€™imigirire mburamumaro yâ€™imico mibi mvamahanga. Abakoloni bakuyemo Abanyarwanda umutima wâ€™Igihugu bityo bareka ubuntu nâ€™Ubunyarwanda bupfunditse ku bumwe bwabo.
Muri iki gihe hari abacurira u Rwanda urwango
Hari abamaze kugurana urukundo rwâ€™Igihugu indamu nâ€™inda nini, ubugome no kubura ubupfura, bashyira imbere inabi ngo imunge ineza. Ibyari ukurengera inyungu zâ€™igihugu, ba mpemuke ndamuke bamaze kubigurana kurusebya mu mahanga ngo bihungabanye umubano mwiza u Rwanda rufitanye nâ€™inshuti zâ€™amahanga. Aho bageze kwifuza ko u Rwanda rwakomanyirizwa nâ€™amahanga, ngo ubuhahirane nâ€™ubufatanye mu bikorwa byâ€™iterambere bicube.
Iyi myitwarire ikomeje kugaragara ku bacumuye ku Rwanda, bakabura umutima wo gusaba imbabazi. Harimo abasize boretse u Rwanda, bagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, inshuti zabo nâ€™ababakomokaho bayobotse umurongo mubi wo gushaka kurimbura u Rwanda. Hari nâ€™abanyamahanga batifuriza u Rwanda ineza kubera urwango barufitiye. Harimo abashinjwa ibyaha bitandukanye, harimo no kumunga umutungo wâ€™igihugu. Aba bose bakurikiranwa nâ€™ubutabera bwâ€™u Rwanda. Ntibifuriza u Rwanda nâ€™Abanyarwanda ituze nâ€™iterambere.
Bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambanga aho bahimba ibinyoma no gukabya inkuru, bagamije gushyira icyasha ku Rwanda. Bagaragaza ko u Rwanda rutubahiriza amahame yâ€™uburenganzira bwa muntu, aho bafata abakoze ibyaha bakabandikaho inkuru nziza zigamije kubambika ibyera, bagamije kwerekana ko u Rwanda rubarenganya, nyamara barakoze ibyaha ku manywa yâ€™ihangu.
Ibi byongeye kugaragara cyane, ubwo u Rwanda rwitegura kwakira Inama yâ€™Ibihugu bihuriye mu Muryango wa â€œCommonwealthâ€, hagaragaye bamwe mu Banyarwanda bavuga ko batavuga rumwe nâ€™ubutegetsi bwâ€™u Rwanda, basabaga u Bwongereza buyobora iyi nama ku rwego, kutemera ko iyi nama yabera mu Rwanda.
Ubusanzwe iyi nama ikaba igomba gusiga Ubunyamabanga Bukuru bwa â€œCommon Wealthâ€ bukorera mu Rwanda, muri manda yâ€™imyaka ibiri. U Rwanda rukaba rwiteguye gukuramo amahirwe aganisha igihugu mu iterambere rusange Abanyarwanda bakarushaho kunguka uburyo bwo gukora ibikorwa byâ€™ishoramari muri uyu muryango.
Harimo kumenyekanisha u Rwanda mu ruhando rwâ€™amahanga ku buryo abashoramari bashora imari mu Rwanda, Abanyarwanda bakabona imirimo, bakaronka amafaranga azamura iterambere ryâ€™imiryango yabo nâ€™igihugu.
Hagaragaye abiyita abanyapolitiki nâ€™abanyamakuru, bishimira ko iyi nama isubitswe, bamwe bakavuga ko nta kazi bazaba bafitemo, ko kandi nta nâ€™inshuti cyangwa bene wabo bafitemo akazi. Ibi bigaragaza ko aba biyitirira kutavuga rumwe nâ€™ubutegetsi bwâ€™u Rwanda, ari abanzi bâ€™u Rwanda, batarwifuriza iterambere nâ€™ituze.
Ni icyaha cyâ€™ubugome gutanga igihugu mu maboko yâ€™ababisha
Iyo uvutse mu gihugu uba uhanye igihango na cyo, kukigambanira aba ari ugutatira igihango. Ni ubugwari kwifatira ku gahanga igihugu cyakubyaye. Kuva u Rwanda rwabaho, cyari icyaha gutanga igihugu mu maboko yâ€™ababisha no gukora igikorwa cyashyira igihugu mu kaga.
Itegeko Ngenga ryo ku wa 14 Kamena 2012, mu ngingo zaryo 461 kugeza ku ngingo ya 469, byâ€™umwihariko muri iyi ngingo ya 461, risobanura ibyâ€™icyaha cyo kugirira nabi ubutegetsi buriho cyangwa Perezida wa Repubulika, rigateganya nâ€™ibihano byacyo.
Rigira riti â€œukora icyaha cyo kugirira nabi ubutegetsi buriho cyangwa cyo kubuhirika akoresheje intambara cyangwa izindi mbaraga zose; ukora, muri iyo migambi ivugwa mu gaka ka 1Âº kâ€™iki gika, icyaha kigamije kugirira nabi Perezida wa Repubulika; ahanishwa igifungo cya burunduâ€.
Aha twibutse kandi ko aba ahemukiye Abanyarwanda kubera ko ubutegetsi ari ubwabo nkâ€™uko biteganywa nâ€™Itegeko Nshinga mu ngingo yaryo ya mbere: â€œUbutegetsi bwose bukomoka ku Banyarwanda kandi bugakoreshwa hakurikijwe ibiteganywa nâ€™iri Tegeko Nshingaâ€.
Uyu ni umurage dukomora ku bakurambere bitanze bagahanga u Rwanda. Kirazira kugaba igihugu mu maboko yâ€™ababisha.
Abanyarwanda dukwiye kuba umwe mu kurengera ubusugire bwâ€™u Rwanda. Ku Ngoma yâ€™Umwami Cyilima II Rujugira, watwaye u Rwanda guhera mu 1675 kugeza 1708, rubanda rwarengeye u Rwanda bikomeye, ubwo u Burundi, u Bugesera, i Gisaka nâ€™i Ndorwa, bagambiriraga kugiria nabi u Rwanda. Kubera icyo gikorwa yafatanyije na rubanda rwamwumviye bagahigika ibihugu bine bikomeye, ni bwo hadutse imvugo igira iti â€œU Rwanda ruratera, ntiruterwaâ€.
Abashaka kwirenza igihugu baca muri rubanda, kandi akaba ari na rwo rugerwaho nâ€™ingaruka kurusha abarushoye mu mwiryane, dore ko bo baba barinzwe kandi bafite nâ€™uburyo bwo guhunga ako kaga bashoje.
Kudatanga igihugu mu maboko yâ€™ababisha, ni ukutemera ko kijyaho icyasha, ukakirwanira ishyaka mu Rwanda no mu mahanga. Abakoresha inzira ya politiki nâ€™itangazamakuru basebya u Rwanda, bamenye ko barimo gutatira igihango, bateranya rubanda nâ€™igihugu, dore ko abenshi bakora politiki nâ€™itangazamakuru binyuranye nâ€™amategeko. Igihango kizabasama.
Perezida Ndayishimiye yahawe urwâ€™amenyo kubera kwita Museveni â€™Umubyeyi wâ€™u Burundiâ€™
Ubuhamya bwo kurokoka kwa Ugiriwabo Gaparayi Justitia nâ€™igihango afitanye nâ€™Inkotanyi
â€œNdazivuga imyato kuko Inkotanyi ni ubuzimaâ€, ni umutwe wâ€™ubuhamya bwa Ugiriwabo Gaparayi Justitia wavukiye i Nyamata mu Bugesera bugaruka ku buryo yarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Ku wa 14 Gicurasi 2021, imyaka yari ibaye 27 ndokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ndokowe nâ€™Inkotanyi. Kuri njye uyu munsi nywufata nkâ€™uwâ€™umuzuko.
Ubwo urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda 1990 rwatangiraga nari nkiri muto. Icyo gihe rero sinasobanukiwe neza ibyabaye.
Umugambi wâ€™Interahamwe wari warateguwe kuva kera. Ndibuka mu 1992 iwacu mu Bugesera habaye igerageza rya Jenoside icyo gihe mu rugo baradusenyeye baradusahura turara twiruka tugana ku mashuri i Nyamata.
Iwacu bahageze ndi mu rwogero, uko nasohotse, ni ko nahunze ntambaye. Icyo gihe abaturanyi bamwe baricwa. Sinjya nibagirwa umubyeyi witwaga Josephine twari duturanye, wishwe icyo gihe.
Iwacu bari barize ndetse baranakoraga batangiye ubuzima bundi bushya ndetse biranaduhira ubuzima burakomeza. Icyo gihe nari mfite imyaka itandatu, nde ni bwo natangiye kumenya ko Abatutsi bicwa nâ€™ubwo nta mubyeyi washoboraga gusobanurira abana neza ibyo ari byo.
Mu buhemu bwinshi, urwango ndetse nâ€™ubugome, bateguye kumara icyitwa Umututsi wese mu Rwanda ku buryo umwaka wa 1994 waje ari rurangiza ndetse sinatinya kuvuga ko abakoze cyangwa abateguye Jenoside bari bazi ko ari imperuka ariko si bo Mana.
Ku wa 6 Mata 1994 ubwo indege yarimo Perezida Habyarimana JuvÃ©nal yaraswaga ntitwahise tubimenya ako kanya gusa uko amasaha yakomezaga gukura bigeze nko mu masaa Sita zâ€™ijoro ku muhanda twumvise urusaku. Icyo gihe umubyeyi wanjye yarabyutse ajya ku idirishya ngo amenye ikibaye yumva bari kuvuga ngo ni ukubahumbahumba bose dore uko bigenje ako kanya yahise akoma agatima ku byabaye mu 1992.
Niko kwihutira gufungura radio ahita yumva itangazo ko Kinani yapfuye birumvikana nkâ€™umuntu mukuru yahise abona ko ibyacu birangiye yatekerezaga ko bucya bamaze kutwica! Yaratubyukije atubwira ibyabaye.
Imfura yâ€™iwacu iramubwira ngo imperuka yâ€™Abatutsi irageze, iryo niryo ryasigaye mu matwi yanjye.
Twatangiye kwambara nkâ€™abiteguye guhunga, amapantaro dushyiramo. Mama yafashe amafaranga make aca ikabutura zâ€™abakuru ayashyiramo aradoda aratubwira ati "wenda ntazabura aho abafasha, wenda yazabarengera aho nzaba ntakiri kumwe namwe".
Bugicya Mama yatwohereje kwa musaza we ku musozi wa Nyiramatuntu [Nyamata] we arasigara ajya ku muyobozi wâ€™ishuri twigagaho kuko umugore we bari inshuti, yibwira ko ahari bazamuhisha. Bwarakeye umugore aramwegera aramubwira ati "mvira aha ugende sinshaka kubona intumbi yawe hano umugabo yambwiye ko bakwica uri ku rutonde rwâ€™abantu bagomba guherwaho".
Ni bwo yashatse uko ahava aza adusanga ku musozi twariho. Twari ku musozi utuyeho Abatutsi benshi kandi basanzwe bazi kwirwanaho, bumvaga bari buhuze imbaraga bagatsinda.
Ariko amazi ntiyari ya yandi nâ€™ubwo bagerageje uko bashoboye bagakoresha ingabo, amabuye nâ€™amacumu byarangiye Interahamwe zivanze nâ€™abasirikare ziturushije imbaraga turatsindwa, abantu bacu bakwira imishwaro.
Ubwo urugamba rwari rurimbanyije i Nyamata grenade zaraye zituragurika, twakwiye imishwaro turiruka, twirirwa tugenda mu ntege nke zâ€™abana nâ€™ababyeyi, tugera ku musozi wa Ntarama ahagana saa Kumi.
Umusozi wa Nyiramatuntu twari tuwitegeye wose wari wahindutse umuyonga bari gutwika inzu, inka ziruka tubona ko akacu koko kashobotse.
Twaraye aho, bukeye baravuga ngo dukomeze twambuke tujye ku Mugina wenda ahari byasaga nko kubunza umutima tuti ahari hariya ho nta kizahaba wasanga ari mu Bugesera gusa.
Sinari nzi ko umuntu yarara mu gihuru iminsi itatu igashira, sinari nzi ko umuntu yaburara ndetse akanabwirirwa iminsi igashira, indi igataha. Navuye mu Bugesera nâ€™amaguru ngera ku Mugina.
Twambutse Akanyaru dusanga Interahamwe ziradutegereje zitwambura ibyo dufite tugenda imbokoboko, gusa bo bari bataratangira kwica kubera ko Burugumesitiri wabo yari yabibujije ibikorwa byose byâ€™ubwicanyi.
Twashyikiye ku mashuri. Ntibyatinze rero batangiye kwiremamo udutero bakaza ariko burugumesitiri agategeka abapolisi kubihagarika. Twaje kuva aho twerekera ku kiliziya, tutarahagera igitero cyaraje tugihungira ku ivuriro ryari aho hafi ariko batumishamo amasasu.
Twaraye dushatse uko twinjira mu kiliziya yo ku Mugina. Bwaracyeye igitero kiraza, abakuru bari muri twe birwanaho bagisubiza inyuma, ariko si ko byakomeje kuko Interahamwe zo muri Ntongwe, abasirikare nâ€™impunzi zâ€™Abarundi zabaga mu nkambi baje ari igitero simusiga. Ariko byakozwe babanje gutumaho Burugumesitiri baramwica.
Icyo gihe abantu birwanyeho ariko biranga biba ibyâ€™ubusa baraza batemagura abari hanze abarimo imbere bakajya bateramo amagrenades bamishamo nâ€™amasasu uwo rifashe agapfa.
Iryo joro baraye baturaririye, bukeye akazi kabo karakomeza baca inzugi barinjira baratemagura. Bamaze kunanirwa baradusohora bashyira abagabo ukwabo nâ€™abagore ukwabo ngo bagiye kudushakira uko twajya i Kabgayi. Ariko si ko byagenze, abagabo babatemaguye tureba abagore nâ€™abana baradushorera batujyana ku Akanyaru.

Icyo gihe twari kumwe na murumuna wanjye wari muto kuko we yaronkaga ndetse na mukuru wanjye nakurikiraga wari wihishe ahatandukanye natwe gato.
Icyo gihe Interahamwe zaratuvumbuye mu rufunzo ziturasa amasasu menshi abo twari kumwe aho ni njye wavuyemo ndi muzima na murumuna wanjye waviriranaga kuko bari bamurashe ari mu gituza cya mama. Uwo nakurikiraga yari afite imyaka 13 ni we wabaye mama, aba na Papa, mbese yabaye byose. Yabaga ahetse murumuna wanjye wari wararasiwe mu gituza cya Mama. Igisebe cye gitangira kubora kugera nâ€™aho tubona ko umwana agiye kudupfira mu ntoki kuko nta nâ€™icyo kurya twabonaga cyo kumuha.

Mbega umunezero mbega amarira yâ€™ibyishimo mbega kwiruhutsa ubwo twabakubitaga amaso. Batubwiraga bati muhumure ntabwo mugipfuye.
Inkotanyi zaje zivura inkomere harimo na murumuna wanjye. Njye ndibuka no kugenda byari byanze batwuriza imodoka njye na murumuna wanjye. Tugeze i Nyamata baturamije amata ubuzima burongera buragaruka. Twageze iwacu dusanga inzu yacu Interahamwe zarayitwitse. Abajenosideri nâ€™abimitse ingengabitekerezo yâ€™amacakubiri nibirindwe nkâ€™icyorezo cyica.
U Rwanda ni igihugu gifite amahoro asesuye akaba ikiguzi kinini cyishyuwe nâ€™abari urubyiruko. U Rwanda rworetswe nâ€™ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside, ivangura nâ€™amacakubiri. Ingabo zari iza RPA zibohora u Rwanda, zihagarika Jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi mu 1994, u Rwanda rwongera gutahwamo ituze nâ€™umutima wâ€™u Rwanda wunga bene rwo.
Ntawe ukwiye kwifatanya nâ€™abishoye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994. Mu Rwanda, urubyiruko ruri hejuru ya 60%, nirwo rwibasirwa cyane nâ€™abashaka kuyobya intekerezo zabo cyane ko nabo bazi ko ari amaboko yâ€™igihugu.
Ni ejo hâ€™u Rwanda, ni amizero yo kuramuka kwarwo, ni abayobozi bâ€™uyu munsi nâ€™ejo, ni ababyeyi bâ€™u Rwanda, bakaba inkingi ya mwamba yarwo. Ni mbaraga zâ€™u Rwanda, nibo bazabazwa u Rwanda.
Mu buzima ntawe utagira ikimwaro iyo atsinzwe, yewe nâ€™iyo ibyo atsinzwemo byari bibi, azongwa nâ€™ikimwaro. Ni yo mpamvu nâ€™abahekuye u Rwanda, ubwo bishoroga muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 bifuza kugira uwo basangira icyo cyaha cyâ€™indengakamere.
Abakoze jenoside umubare munini bari urubyiruko, bimitse ingengabitekerezo ya jenoside nâ€™amacakubiri, maze mu 1994 bishora muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Ubu abo bose buzuye ikimwaro kimunga intekerezo zabo aho bari hose.
Iki kimwaro cyuzuye igisebo, bagiterwa nâ€™uko bishoye mu migambi mibisha, batsindwa nâ€™Inkotanyi zari mu Ngabo za RPA, zari zishamikiye ku Muryango wa FPR, kandi bari urubyiruko nkabo gusa bo bafite icyerekezo kizima na gahunda ihamye yo kubaka Igihugu.
Inkotanyi zabatsinze, zashyizeho inzego nâ€™ubuyobozi buhamye, zikuraho ubutegetsi bubi. Iyi niyo soko yâ€™ikimwaro gikabije interahamwe nâ€™abagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bahorana.

Baracyari abagaragu ba Hutu power, aho abahezanguni biyumvamo ubuhutu, bumva ko ari bo batura mu Rwanda bonyine kandi bakaruturamo nta Mututsi ururimo.
Iyi ngengabitekerezo ya Jenoside nâ€™amacakubiri ikomeje kuboneka muri bamwe mu Banyarwanda baba mu mahanga, harimo abakizererezwa nâ€™ikinyoma cyâ€™uko mu Rwanda nta mahoro ahari, ababaye mu muhanga ku bwo gushakira indamu nâ€™indonke mu kwiyita impunzi za politike nâ€™abakomeje kwihisha ubutabera kubera ko bavuye mu Rwanda baruhekuye.

Abakoze Jenoside buzuye ikimwaro. Imigambi mibisha yabo yo gushyira mu bikorwa ingengabitekerezo ya â€œHutu Powerâ€ yaratsinzwe kubera ko Inkotanyi zahagaritse Jenoside, maze zigarura u Rwanda interahamwe zari zimaze kugira itongo.

Aba bose amajwi yabo bishe arabahamagara, bahungabanye intekerezo na roho, ntibariho, babayeho nabi. Imitima yabo yabaye akahebwe, ubuzima bwabo burangwa no gutekereza nabi bakarota nabi.

Abato batari gito bâ€™u Rwanda, ntibazahumwe nâ€™igihu kibazitira kureba imbere, ngo basaye mu macakubiri nâ€™ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside.
